story:
Do you love vintage? Have you ever walked into a vintage store hoping to find that timeless retro look in your size and in perfect condition, only to be disappointed? Are you tired of contemporary shapeless and casual looks that flood todays market? Do you want to dress and feel like a lady in wearable clothing? Then let me introduce you to RECOLLECTION.

Fall 2013 collection preview. Rose Callahan photography.

A couple of years ago, having worked as a designer in New York's fashion industry for over a decade, I was fed up. Fed up with come-and-go trends, disposable clothing and my jam-packed closet that didn't excite me. However, I still loved fashion and particularly vintage fashion. Good vintage was getting harder to find and due to how fragile it is, I seldom wore the pieces I had. I checked out some vintage reproduction labels but their style felt too costume for me and the quality was poor. I wanted high quality designer vintage style in new condition and modern fit. This was something missing in today's market and seeing as I was a designer I thought, hey, why not start my own independent label!

I named my label RECOLLECTION which so far has seen a lot of success with press and in local stores in New York. I regularly get emails from women all around the world seeking my designs after discovering them in one of the many blogs it's been featured on. Last year I was a successful finalist in Design Entrepreneurs NYC, a mini MBA program offered to a select group of New York City-based designers. This gave me the business tools I needed to understand how to take the next step and launch an online store making RECOLLECTION globally available, wherever you are.


Fall 2013 collection preview. Rose Callahan photography.

I've created this project to help raise the funds needed to launch the online store. I've been working very hard on the new Fall 2013 collection as well as gathering a special selection of vintage accessories to compliment it, which will also be available through the store. Production is underway in New York's garment district and now I need to prepare the website for sales. Some of the additional expenses to start an online store include:  

  • Web development costs for design, E-commerce hosting, etc.
  • Photo shoot expenses such as photography, model fees, etc.
  • Inventory management & storage
  • Start-up packaging & shipping supplies
  • Marketing & promotion costs

If you would like to help make the RECOLLECTION online store a reality, I would be truly grateful for the support. Your generosity will not only be appreciated but rewarded. Perks begin at $10 and every pledge, no matter the amount, can help me reach my goal of $8,000. It's all-or-nothing with this project and to be successfully funded I have to reach my goal. If I am not only successful but surpass my goal, the additional funding will be used to grow my business. Short-term this means attending tradeshows (average cost $10,000 p/season) to meet new store buyers and expand my distribution outside of New York. Long-term this means developing RECOLLECTION as a lifestyle brand expanding my product categories to include: swimwear, lingerie, shoes, handbags, and jewelry. 

You can check out the RECOLLECTION press book to see who's been talking about us and stay up to date on Facebook, Instagram, Twitter & YouTube. Be sure to also check out my past collections on the website!

Thank you so much for your support and contributions, Sandra!

P.S. My closet isn't nearly as full anymore but it's much more stylish ;)

PERKS

Thank You Notecard

 

Inspired by my collection of vintage sewing patterns.

 

Tote Bag

Tote bag with designer fashion illustrations.

 

Customized Print

One-of-a-kind created for you!

 

Silk Scarf

Click here to see the 8 styles on offer.

 

Collection Sizing

Available sizes for the Fall 2013 collection.

 

Risks and challenges

The Tote Bag shown is a first prototype. We might need to adjust the final artwork slightly for bulk production. I expect to maintain the bags overall look but you might notice little changes to the artwork.

I will be personally designing and mounting each Customized Print. If demand for this reward happens to be very high it might delay delivery until October in some cases.

story:
Who are we?

We are a group of Masters students in London who are passionate about supporting other students and emerging artists. We know how hard it can be to prove your talent and skills and we want to provide a platform for others, like us, to showcase theirs.

The Lifestyle Club is a student club at Hult International Business school made up of Masters and Undergraduate students. Our aim is to develop our knowledge base and skills and develop our networks within the fashion and luxury industries.

 

 

Our team - a group of Masters students with interests in fashion and technology.

 

Upon graduating, we all want to work in luxury or fashion. We came up with the idea of the fashion show as a way to showcase our skills. This simple idea developed as we thought about how many other students throughout the UK and the world find it hard to show future employers what they can do.

How do we overcome that 'Catch 22' of needing more experience when its not easy to be hired? We develop our own event and show off our skills while supporting other students to do the same.

This fashion show will be for students and by students. From the designers to the makeup artists, hair stylists and event managers. It will include student input in every area possible.

Our goal is to produce a show that generates publicity for the designers and a truly successful event for all those involved to use in their job searches.

What is iFashion London?

iFashion London is a fashion show for students by students with a social media edge. As Gen Y's, we are digital natives. Our future buying power is in the billions. And we engage daily with brands online. We know how to do this, and we want to show the world what we can do.

The show will be open to all current and recent alumni at any London school that focuses on fashion design. We currently have 10 designers on board from schools such as the London College of Fashion, American Intercontinental University and Brighton. We're so excited to be supporting these students!W

 

We will organise the show, involving students in every part that we can. We want you to be a part of the online community we are creating in order to make this show as social as possible. We'll be organising a few little social competitions and opportunities online. We want you to be as engaged as we are!

Recently, we've added companies such as Electric Hair and Greasepaint to help the makeup and hair students who will be taking part. We couldn't do this without their support and are very grateful!

iFashion London is set to take place on July 10 and will travel out to our online community through social media. We'll be asking you to vote on the designs and the winner of the people's choice award will be awarded the inaugural iFashion London Show award!

 

We love London!

 

What are we asking for and what's in it for you?

We need £5,000 to cover the event costs. From venue to makeup to equipment to catering. We want to build a community online that supports our idea and from that, fund the costs.

If we don't reach our goal, we will begin to approach other like-minded businesses who support emerging designers to seek their sponsorship support. Ultimately, however, we would like this to be a global community sponsored event. We want everyone to be involved.

We aren't here to make money. We simply want to put on an amazing event. Any money not used to create this event will be donated to an arts charity or put towards the event next year.

What's in it for you? Besides being a part of a cool concept and supporting students who are trying to do something a bit different? Kudos! Share the campaign, retweet, share our statuses on Facebook and we'll thank you for it! We want you to be a part of this community! 

 

Our school - Hult House in London. This is where the planning happens!

 

How you are helping

We're business students looking to show off our skillsets and support other students to do the same thing. We're passionate about building opportunities for ourselves and others in our situation. The global economy still isn't great. The amount of students graduating with a Masters degree is huge. We want to set ourselves apart and we want to work hard to do so.

You don't just have to donate ££!

We want this to be a global event. We're going to be live streaming the show, having you all vote on your favourite designs and including you in every part of the show, every step of the way!

To get involved:

  • Share our campaign! Post or share it on Facebook, Tweet it, Pin it and like it on YouTube!
  • Like our Facebook page at https://www.facebook.com/hultlifestyleclublondon and follow the action leading up to the show!
  • Follow us on Twitter and retweet our updates! Follow @Lifestyle_Hult
  • Once you join the community, we'd love you to have your say!

We're so excited about this event and hope that you join us!

iFashion London Ltd is a registered UK business.

story:
Short Summary

It's our first season being out there. Our goal is to wear our colors proudly and support our boys throughout the season.
The campaign will help us with that visibility.

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • This funding goes to help us actually but the scarves we need for our group, if we don't reach our goal, we can't buy the scarves.
  • You helped with the scarves creation! Make the dream the reality.
  • What happens if we don't get there: We keep less of the money than if we had made it. We will keep track of those who bought this year and as money trickles in through the rest of the season once we hit the goal, then we can order.
  • If you enter an address at checkout we can ship it to you - but that's less $ for us, so you can also pick it up at match time. If you want to pick it up put that information in the address box.

What Happens Once This Campaign Ends

  • We order the scarves in excess of what people have purchased for sale at a higher price later.
  • We save a portion of the funds so that if we run out of scarves we can purchase another set of scarves to sell again!

Who Can Participate

  • Anyone can.
  • Use this campaign website to spread the word.
  • On this page, look to the right, and click your perk first. However, if you click "Contribute Now" don't forget to click on your Perk on the page that shows up!

We Need Your Support! Spread the Word!

We Need Your Support! Spread the Word!

story:
The O-band 365 is the first and only 'on your wrist' Oyster Card. The practical, fast, fun, discrete and new way to pay for your commute. You can also instantly display your Oyster Card balance on your O-Band 365.

The O-band 365

This is a unisex product for the London commuters and soon also the contactless payers...

The purpose:

You will never have to find your credit card sized TFL Oyster Card again. You can instantly display your Oyster balance on your wrist.

Simply "pair n place" this band around your wrist and touch in and out of any station or bus that accepts Oyster Card. Pair once and use just like a normal Oyster Card but with the added benefit of instantly knowing your Oyster balance - a one touch display will give you your Oyster balance on demand. Avoid queues and always know your balance.

The O-band 365 will revolutionise the way you travel, making it quick and simple to get to where you need to be. Never be the one who creates a bottle neck queue at the front of a barrier or bus trying to find your Oyster Card or not knowing your Oyster balance.

Comfortable on your wrist, the O-band 365 can fit snuggly under your watch or bracelet. The design itself is attractive to be a bracelet in itself.

Simple, discrete, quick and easy - welcome to the O-band 365.

The use:

"Pair and place" on your wrist and use just like you would your Oyster Card. View you Oyster balance at the touch of a button.

Top up, touch in, touch out, capped fares...all the same.

With the O-band 365 you will not get caught out by card-clash.



The technology:

Using the latest Radio-Frequency identification (RFID) chip and Bluetooth technology we have perfected a quick and easy way to pair your current Oyster Card or Contactless payment card to the O-band 365.

Simply pair once and you are good to go.


Rewards:

If we can get the full funding you will have delivered in October 2014 the first batch bands in the following quantities:

£25 funding = 1 O-band 365 (rrp £34.95)

£50 funding = 2 O-band 365s (rrp £69.90)

£100 funding = 3 O-band 365s in your choice of colours and personalised with your choice of wording or design

A final note..

We are in the pipeline to make the O-band 365 a form of Contactless payment to be linked to your contactless credit or debit card. As funders you will be the first to benefit from such technology in the near future... Please note the images are for illustrative purposes and the delivered product will be of similar colours, shape and size. 

Thank you for visiting my page and I hope you will help my project get the funding required.

story:
If you've ever played team sports or have ever worked in a team environment you have probably shared some great times and formed some amazing new friendships. I here to help the children of Salariin Kampuchea, Siem Reap, Cambodia to receive similar chances as we had as children. Right now we practice in a dirt field with no nets, no shoes but, a lot of heart! My goal is to help raise $500 dollars this will go towards the building of two 8'x6' soccer nets, a set of balls, cones and a new matching set of jerseys. So instead of spending $5 dollars on that extra venti, non-fat, sugar-free, triple shot, white mocha that you probably didn't really need, take the time to be apart of something exciting!  Thank you so much for spending the time to view the page and hopefully be apart of something more.

Yours truly Jason Erikson.

story:
Sweater and Shirt 

The sweater:

The T-shirt:

  • T-shirt works out a £10.50 sale price and then postage costs included in the fee.
  • Sweater is £30 and postage costs included as above.
  • We're using Euro sizing, so make sure you understand what that means before you start crying about getting the wrong size. Also, get a size bigger and grow into it, no one should be buying a medium and have it hanging off them, that's just weird and you shouldn't have "berserker strong" written on a bony frame.
  • You'll need to provide us with your size requirements when you purchase, if not we won't send it. Simple.
  • PRO EUROPA: All tshirts are purchased within the UK and the screen printing done by a UK company.

The sweater:The T-shirt:
T-shirt works out a £10.50 sale price and then postage costs included in the fee.
Sweater is £30 and postage costs included as above.

story:
Polarized Bamboo and Hardwood sunglasses that are as awesome and unique as you! 

burnt. began with a conversation about sustainability that was followed by a few beers and one big "what if...?".

The result - sustainable style that won't scorch the planet or break the bank. 

Our first mission - the launch of our flagship sunglasses in the fall of 2013. These bad boys are Polarized, UV 400 rated and totally customizable with your choice of Bamboo or Hardwood frames and reflective coloured lenses, or as we call them, windshields. We love our sunglasses and we hope you do to.

Inspired by the the bright sunglasses of the 80's and 90's burnt. is brining back the classic wayfarer style with a new twist! All burnt. frames are made from renewable origins unlike their plastic counterparts. 

Save Now Before the Campaign is Over 


Chesterman - Our classic bamboo frames, handmade and named after our favourite surf beach. Light, tight and a clean, classic fit available in blonde (natural) or carbonized (our favourite). Oh, and they FLOAT. Perfect for the beach or the boat.

For the spec techies: Chestermans are sized at 53-18-145.

Cowichan - Handmade dark hardwood frames. Slightly larger, they carry a trendy, modern profile that Steph and Krystal love but still look great on Mike's dad. Available in the full range of our polarized lens colours and shown here in Clayoqout green. Don't drop these ones in the lake, you won't get 'em back. We learned the hard way that hardwood doesn't float. 

A wider fuller profile at 54-22-140.

Sombrio - Just a little off the beaten path. A little trendy, a little classic, another local surf spot. Same size and shape as our Cowichan frames but with the distinctive wood grain of wood. Another handmade hardwood frame, you'll want to keep these ones out of the water unless you want to dive for them. Here with classic black lenses, or choose your favourite of our polarized lenses from below.

54 22-140 if you're counting. 

Chesterman - The oh so natural blonde version of our favourite style. 

Visit getburnt.ca for a look at our complete lineup. 

Our wicked windshields...7 layers of POLARIZED UV 400 awesomeness! Why are you still paying huge dollars for plastic frames and a brand name? Our polarized lenses will keep you from squinting just as well as any $200 pair of the same ol' same ol'. Be different wear wood!

What colour will you choose? Glacier blue, Clayoquot green, Classic black or burnt. orange?

Made of 100 % recycled cardboard each box is hand stamped, making them as unique as the contents within.

Located on Vancouver Island on Canada's west coast, burnt. is based in one of the few locations in the world where you can surf and snowboard in the same day. Inspired by the landscape around us, we have big ideas for the future. From closed loop bamboo rayon clothing designed with emerging artists (watch for socks - James has a thing for socks) to bamboo horticulture on Vancouver Island, we're dreaming big. Come with us. 

wear wood, get burnt.


co-founder - James                                                    co-founder - Mike

meet the rest of the burnt. team here

The result - sustainable style that
won't scorch the planet or break the bank. 

Our first mission - the launch of our flagship sunglasses in the fall
of 2013. These bad boys are Polarized, UV 400 rated and totally customizable with your choice of Bamboo or Hardwood frames and reflective coloured lenses, or as we call them, windshields. We love our sunglasses and we hope you do to.Inspired by the the bright sunglasses of the 80's and 90's burnt. is brining back the classic wayfarer style with a new twist! All burnt. frames are made from renewable origins unlike their plastic counterparts. Save Now Before the Campaign is Over Chesterman - Our classic bamboo frames, handmade and named after our favourite surf beach. Light, tight and a clean, classic fit available in blonde (natural) or carbonized (our favourite). Oh, and they FLOAT. Perfect for the beach or the boat.For the spec techies: Chestermans are sized at 53-18-145.Cowichan - Handmade dark hardwood frames. Slightly larger, they carry a trendy, modern profile that Steph and Krystal love but still look great on Mike's dad. Available in the full range of our polarized lens colours and shown here in Clayoqout green. Don't drop these ones in the lake, you won't get 'em back. We learned the hard way that hardwood doesn't float. A wider fuller profile at 54-22-140.Sombrio - Just a little off the beaten path. A little trendy, a little classic, another local surf spot. Same size and shape as our Cowichan frames but with the distinctive wood grain of wood. Another handmade hardwood frame, you'll want to keep these ones out of the water unless you want to dive for them. Here with classic black lenses, or choose your favourite of our polarized lenses from below.54 22-140 if you're counting. Chesterman - The oh so natural blonde version of our favourite style. Visit getburnt.ca for a look at our complete lineup. Our wicked windshields...7 layers of POLARIZED UV 400 awesomeness! Why are you still paying huge dollars for plastic frames and a brand name? Our polarized lenses will keep you from squinting just as well as any $200 pair of the same ol' same ol'. Be different wear wood!What colour will you choose? Glacier blue, Clayoquot green, Classic black or burnt. orange?Made of 100 % recycled cardboard each box is hand stamped, making them as unique as the contents within.Located on Vancouver Island on Canada's west coast, burnt. is based in one of the few
locations in the world where you can surf and snowboard in the same day.
Inspired by the landscape around us, we have big ideas for the future. From closed
loop bamboo rayon clothing designed with emerging artists (watch for socks -
James has a thing for socks) to bamboo horticulture on Vancouver Island, we're dreaming big. Come with us. wear wood, get burnt.co-founder - James                                                    co-founder - Mikemeet the rest of the burnt. team here

story:
Fantastic childhood, crazy juvenility, enchanting adolescence, bright company!A team of creative, talanted friends, which did not let us sit still, made us turn on our imagination. Each one of us tried to demonstrate individuality, it was a latent rivalry, nobody said it, but everyone understood it. One of us had an idea to unite two incompatible objects: a head gear and a display. This idea inspired us to creation of an innovational product. This is when we started to work hard on creation of a snapback, which would later be called CYCLOPS. When we had the first prototype made, we put it on and visit some friends, who said: «Guys, you can suprise the whole world with it!»

So, we are trying!

“Cyclops Cap” is a snapback, equipped with a high quality plastic corps which has a built-in video screen to display any kind of video or photo to emphasize your own personality.

“Cyclops Cap” is not just a fashionable device.

It is a new opportunity for a sports fan to show everyone his own favourite team. Your child can always enjoy his favourite cartoon or comics characters. It is a great chance to surprise your friends or just passersby. What is more, at UFC fight everyone will immediately understand who the winner is.

The fields where “Cyclops Cap” can be used are endless. First, you can place the important information about special offers on the caps of fast food restaurant workers. What is more, it can be a souvenir production designed according to all the countries all over the world.
It is extremely easy to operate this device. You should simply connect your smart phone to Cyclops using Bluetooth or Wi –fi, then you choose your favourite video or photo in the appendix and you are ready to surprise everyone! Thanks to Cyclops you will never remain unnoticed!

Just the way a telephone has stopped being only a gadget to make calls, “Cyclops ” caps have stopped being only hats.

Let’s try to create the future today thanks to “Cyclops” caps!

A unique opportunity to show your individuality as well as to express your desires, interests and the brightest emotions on the “Cyclops” caps’ screen.

All you have to do is empower your imagination and you will always be in the spotlight, emphasizing your own style.                                                                                               

           

Cyclo-1 – is a basic model, made of good quality cotton and superlight but strong plastic. It has all the necessary functions to feel the product best. Cyclo-1 is a base for all other lines of Cyclops brand, particularly in the programme of corporate sales, that symbolizes high technical specifications of the following model and a wide range of possibilities





Exclusive collection – is an exclusive line of Cyclops, made for those, who got used to possess only the best. Exclusive collection is Cyclops made of high quality material. Each of the caps from this line has each own combination of styles. Exclusive collection is a Cyclops for true collectors and aesthetics lovers.

Examples of future models, created by Cyclops Exclusive Collection are listed below:

Cyclops Nature Line – skilfull combination of smooth and braided leather underlines your style and ability to appreciate luxury. The case, that is made from the lightest wood in the world – Balsa, with gilded fittings makes this model a worthy exhibit of modern fashion.Cyclops Gold Line is the “gold reserve” of our brand. Gold Line is an exclusive line made using elements with golden hues. This model represents glamour and beauty. High-quality materials: suede, leather, vinyl and numerous design findings characteristic of the Gold Line will not leave you indifferent.Cyclops Carbon Line is bold, blazing and right-on… It’s no secret that carbon fiber is used to manufacture the best sports cars in the world and Formula-1 race cars. Carbon is both light and strong, but in addition it has attractive texture that fans of extreme sports and urban clothing style will love to wear.


Under standing the Cyclops device will be easy for everyone as the novelty of  this device is the idea itself, the idea of merging two different things.

We took the most popular headgear, a usual snapback, and our team of designers and engineers began to work together to create the body. Upon selecting the best design, we have equipped the Cyclops with a video player especially optimized for our tasks and appearance.

Achieving the most optimal weight of our device was also a specific and important criterion for us.Then we isolated the entire device from moisture.

* At the moment, we are constantly experimenting with our device, so Cyclops specifications are subject to change. In this case, we will notify all backers by mail. 

                    

                 

The application is primarily designed to control the cap easily without removing it from the head. It is also used to synchronize the cap with a smart phone or a PC.


The application functionality includes:

  • Full control of the video player on the cap

  • Synchronization between the cap and a PC to transfer data from devices to the cap

  • News from the company (promotions, discounts, events)

  • Cyclops Shop (with gift certificates and an opportunity to order a cap through the application)


  • Mini Text Editor to display text on the cap screen. 

We hope that this will make communication with disabled people much easier, so we call this functionality ‘easy talk’

                     

Cyclops is a unique and versatile product with a huge number of possible applications in various fields. It all depends on you, on your desires and fantasies. If you have decided to look into the future, then the Cyclops cap will help you with this. Let’s make together one small step on the long road to the revolutionary future of youth fashion industry.

Meanwhile, we invite you to choose a Cyclops cap that will help you and us to make this world a brighter place!

If you’re still reading this and have gotten to this part of the description then you are probably not yet sure about our product, so we can only offer you some gifts that you could get from us.

             

             

             

             

             

             

             

Below is a special color table from the Cyclo-1 collection. When choosing a gift, please leave a comment with the name of the desired  color of your cap.

For example:

John Travolta – Сyclo-1, Red Blood.

We are focused on the high quality of the final product.And we need to refine the product before launching it to the market.Since we plan to launch our own production, our calculations indicate that we need 250 thousand dollars for that.

Any amount collected above that will give us an opportunity to surprise the fans of our product with even more colorful Cyclops caps!

For example, if we collect five hundred thousand we could develop an exclusive collection of Cyclops with elegant and top - quality materials.

And it will also bring us closer to our plan to launch our basic concept of Cyclops with a flexible screen.

The technology of flexible displays is currently at an early stage of development across the world.In addition to numerous complexities associated with it,it also requires a lot of funding.Therefore, as soon as the amount of one million dollars is collected we will be ready at last to release a completely unique Cyclops line,which will undoubtedly be loved by everyone, so elegant,always ready to turn into a regular snapback,but with a very unusual design.Cyclops with a flexible screen, “Cyclops flex”.

                                           

     





FAQ

Frequently asked questions.

How much did the weight of a cap increase with a case and a screen?

The mean weight of a cap is around  100 gramms. The screen added additional 56 gramms to the total weight. Yet we are still working on it!

What is the screen’s resolution?

We use screens with 960x640 resolution (326 pixels per inch), 3.5″ diagonal, which allows to have a bright image even during the day time!

Is the device water resistant? it is important!

We have thought this through at the early stages of Cyclops creation. The case is sealed and does not let water inside. Charging port is also protected by a plug. Cyclops is totally protected!

Is there any radiation emission from this product? is there any harm to the body?

Our team took this question seriously. We have spent a lot of time and funds to medical research ( and are still working and will be working on this question). We were able to decrease harmful effects on a body, mostly by using LCD display, which does not produce radiation. Our device has much less of Specific Absorption Rates (SAR), than on mobile devices, which makes it safer than your mobile phone. There is no need to worry!

What types of video format are supported?

At the moment, Cyclops support MP4, MOV, M4V and AVI video formats. Yet, we are working on creation of universal Video player! We are sure that by the time of your purchase, you will not worry about such question.

In what colors will be Cyclops available?

Our color palette is very rich. Currently, we have 4 lines of Cyclops, in each of them there will be different models, materials and colors.

  • Cyclo-1

  • Cyclops Gold

  • Cyclops carbon

  • Nature line

Official information will be available on our website very soon

Are there speakers on Cyclops?

Cyclops do not produce sound! First of all it is a questions of necessity. However, time will tell...

Is there a possibility of an electric shock?

It is not possible! All electronics is placed inside the sealed case! No need to worry!

Where and when can I buy Cyclops, outside indiegogo.com?

All of those, who do not participate in our project on indiegogo, can subscribe to our product and receive all information on cyclops.com.

For how long does the battery let device work?

Cyclops is capable of 8 hour of non-stop video playback. We are still working on improving it.

story:
The Project | The most beautiful, tough and sustainable denim jacket for dogs. This jacket is a sleeveless, miniature version of the jackets we have been making for humans for years now. Made in Italy using sustainable premium raw denim. We believe in "Buy Less, Buy Better".

No more cheap made-to-discard fashion for humans or pets! We already created the jacket, now we are looking for funds to upscale production and to make the jacket even more sustainable, using Candiani denim from partially recycled fabric.

About us | We are Amsterdenim, a small, independent Dutch jeans brand. Operating from our denim lab in Amsterdam, a former garage, we develop premium goods for the gentleman rebel. We cater to "the biker and the banker". We love denim, life and freedom. We are originally a menswear denim brand. Now it is time to expand, offering premium denim goods for dogs.

Why Indiegogo | First of all, we like how Indiegogo sounds like Indigo. As our main focus is to create and produce jeans for human beings, doing a second, bigger production run is something we are looking support for to get funded. We're also keen to present our brand to a whole new audience. With your support we can continue to rebel and become even more sustainable.
 

The Jacket | There are many types of dog jackets but none like this! This jacket is something you only buy once, not to use a few times and throw away. Made in Italy using premium Candiani denim fabric. Raw denim fades over time, becoming more beautiful and personal the longer you have it and wear it. The bottom of the jacket is curved to prevent your dog to wet his jacket, in the back there is a hole for the dog collar ring to attach to the leash.

French Bulldog Stitch wearing the FREDDY dog jacket and Jeremy the original FREDDY trucker.

Connect the leash through this hole in the jacket.

The lining is made from fake fur teddy so soft and warm that it will make bunny rabbits jealous. 

 

Tico is a 9 month old French Bulldog from Spain, wearing size S
 
 
The jacket will be made in Italy by Trend Srl, using sustainable Candiani Denim fabric, keeping the same high level of quality of the jacket we have now. If we manage to get enough support, this premium denim dog jacket will be produced in Italy this Winter, ready for shipment around February 2021. Candiani is known as "The Greenest Mill in this Blue World".
 


Sustainability is the way of the future. Sourcing the right materials and producing close to home are important, just as producing the right goods. One of the reasons for this project is also to find out which exact sizes we need to produce to avoid any waste. Perhaps the most important factor in sustainability however, is usage. It would make a huge difference if we would use the goods we have more and if we wash them less often. Using premium quality materials to create quality products that will be cared for and used and enjoyed for a long time instead of discarded.

 

SUMMARY: This jacket is a sleeveless, miniature version of the jackets we make for humans. Made in Italy using partially recycled premium Candiani denim fabric. We already created the jacket, now we are looking for funds to upscale production and to make it even better!

  • Premium Candiani raw denim fabric, partially recycled denim
  • Super soft fake fur teddy lining, as in our jackets for humans
  • Inside pocket for dog whistle or name tag with Candiani label
  • Curved design at bottom to keep the jacket neat and clean
  • Tonal AMSTERDENIM embroidery on back, hole for dog leash on back
  • Ltd perks: Shootout, Upcycled bracelet, Shopping vouchers, Poop bags holders!

 

SIZING: We developed sizes S to XXL, suitable for almost any size dog. Size XS is now added. 

How to measure your dog to find the right size:

The Perks

These are the perks we're offering to backers:

€    2 Shout Out | Special thank you shoutout on our Instagram, with love from Amsterdam
€    5 Good Luck | Wish us good luck and receive 3 lucky rivet pins. FREE worldwide shipping.
€  20 Bracelet | One of 36 upcycled denim bracelets by Denim Dutchie. Retail value: € 30
€  55 Early Bird | The Dog Jacket. Limited to 24 pcs. Size XS to XXL. Retail value € 79,99
€  65 Dog Jacket | Help us decide which size to produce and to fund it. Retail value € 79,99
€ 100 Voucher | € 150 shopping at our webshop. Limited to 100. Great gift for the holidays.
€ 200 Paris Deluxe | Go over the top with this exclusive custom Jacket. Value: priceless!

ADD-ON | Handmade Italian Poop Bags Holder by The Denim Dog, ltd to 12 pcs per style

Signature lucky Amsterdenim rivet pin which you can remove or replace anywhere you want. 

BRACELET - Denim bracelet made by Denim Dutchie from upcycled Amsterdenim jeans

Denim Dutchie | Petra loves to work with denim. Re-use the blues! She designs, upcycles and re-uses. From old jeans she makes upholstery, aprons and wristbands. For this project she made 36 (numbered) denim bracelets by hand, from the inside seam part of Amsterdenim jeans. 

EARLY BIRD - Premium Denim Dog Jacket at an extra special price, first 24 backers

It's all about momentum. If we get a fair amount of backers right at the start of this campaign, it will become more visible to other potential backers. 


DOG JACKET - Premium Denim Dog Jacket at a special price! Size XS to XXL

Stitch is a 4 year old French Bulldog from The Netherlands, wearing size M.

€ 100  VOUCHER - Shopping voucher at www.amsterdenim.com worth € 150

Ideal gift for the holidays. Ready to use immediately after campaign ends. Works on any item.


ADD-ON's

These can be selected as an add-on perk. first come first served! These items are available as add-on to the denim dog jacket only. We managed to get our hands on a limited number of deluxe dog poop bags holders, hand made in Italy by The Denim Dog.

Working with denim is in The Denim Dog Founder Silvia Rancani's Design DNA. Italian born Silvia has always worked in the denim fashion industry. Silvia designs beautiful Luxury Dog Accessories from her headquarters in Amsterdam

Deluxe Poop Bags Holder "A" | Soft and light, easy to attach to your leash or your jeans belt loop. Handcrafted in Tuscany, Italy from Italian vegetable-tanned bull leather, Italian no-fade Berto’s denim and detailed with antique finishing hardware. Size is 9cm x 8cm and it contains perfectly a standard poop bag roll or dog treats! Limited add-on for € 20, Retail: € 30

It comes in 2 variants, as all our matching products: Raw denim & Black leather with antique silver hardware or Raw denim & Cognac leather with antique gold hardware. Comes in a paper box and with denim paper hangtag. Dyed, molded, and stitched by hand, 100% Made in Italy.

Deluxe Poop Bags Holder "B" | leather dog poop bag holder is a stylish dog accessory that is small and perfectly formed for carrying around those essential poop bags. Looking for a dog poop bag holder for leash? The strap and clip adds versatility so you can attach to the dog leash or your handbag strap or your jeans belt loop. Handcrafted in Tuscany, Italy from Italian vegetable-tanned bull leather, Italian no-fade Berto’s denim and detailed with antique finishing hardware.. Size: 9cm x 6cm and it contains perfectly a standard poop bag roll..or dog treats!

It comes in 2 variants, as all our matching products: Black leather & Raw denim with antique silver hardware or Raw denim & Cognac leather & Raw denim with antique gold hardware. Comes in a paper box and with denim paper hangtag. Dyed, molded, and stitched by hand, 100% Made in Italy. Color may vary slightly. Limited add-on for € 25, Retail: € 40

PARIS DELUXE | Limited, exclusive and completely over the top! From reserved stock on hand, we will create 3 stunning custom jackets, with the help of Zig Zag Borduurservice in Amsterdam. One we are shipping to Paris Hilton, the other two can be yours! Example of custom embroideries they made on our FREDDY heritage jacket:


Once the campaign is finished, we will contact you and get started right away. This needs to be done and shipped before X-Mas! We start with choosing a font and design for your dog's name. Choose the color of the yarn and let us know what else you want us to add. We will show you many options for embroidery designs, patches, studs, ruffles, the sky is the limit! It hoes without saying that this package comes with a deluxe poop bags holder.

The objective | The funding goal of € 5.000 is set to acquire a sufficient amount of Candiani denim and do a production of several hundeds of dog jackets. Upscaling production will lower the cost per jacket and will allow us to further improve it. As we're not selling the dog jackets we have on hand to retailers at present, it is hard to predict which sizes we need. With this project we can find out precisely how many pieces per size we should produce. This reduces the amount of jackets we would otherwise "blindly" produce in sizes that perhaps nobody needs.

 

What happens if we don't reach our goal? | We will deliver all perks wether we reach our funding goal or not. However, if we do not reach our funding goal it would mean that we would not be able to spend as much time and energy in this project as we would want to. Our main business remains making clothing for humans and we need all the resources we have to be able to keep doing this. If we manage to find enough people to support this project and our cause to make premium denim goods for humans and dogs in a sustainable way, we will keep doing so!

BACKGROUND

The idea for the denim dog jacket arose when recording the video below in 2019 where Dutch singer-songwriter Douwe Bob is wearing the human version of the FREDDY jacket;


It all started with a birthday gift for our brand ambassador, Douwe Bob. We downsized our most popular denim jacket, the FREDDY heritage jacket, to fit his Shih Tsu dog Tammy. Cutting and sewing parts of an existing jacket, our first dog jacket prototype was made at the end of 2019. We received so much positive feedback, that we decided to further develop it and produce a few dozen. The first batch is sold via our webshop only and will be sold out soon.

REWARD

If you've backed this project you can get extra rewards by referring friends! Earn shopping vouchers for our webshop by referring this project. 1-2 referrals: 10% discount voucher | 3-4 referrals: 30% discount | 5 or more referrals: 50% discount on www.amsterdenim.com

Referring friends is easy:

1. Log into your account on Indiegogo and 

2. Click on the sharing buttons near the top of our campaign page, which automatically shares your unique link via email or social media. 

You can also copy your unique link by clicking on the link button and paste that into your social media updates or emails. When your friends click through your unique link and contribute to our project, their contributions will be registered under your name. 

You can track your referrals by clicking on your user name on the top right of the page, then going to "My Contributions" and clicking on the "Referrals" tab.

At the end of the campaign, we will tally how many referrals you have and deliver your reward!

__________________________________________________________________________________

Video / photos: Tim Kasper @tmkspr www.tmkspr.com | Model: Tico @soyticorico
Product photos: campaign-store.com | Model: Stitch @lolaenstitch and Jeremy Ziessen
Gentleman Rebel Harley: @janfillem | Model: Sebastien @siegenthaler | Douwe Bob
Contributors: Trend Srl | Candiani | The Denim Dog | Denim Dutchie | Amsterdenim Jeans

story_txt:
The Project | The most beautiful, tough and sustainable denim jacket for dogs. This jacket is a sleeveless, miniature version of the jackets we have been making for humans for years now. Made in Italy using sustainable premium raw denim. We believe in "Buy Less, Buy Better".

No more cheap made-to-discard fashion for humans or pets! We already created the jacket, now we are looking for funds to upscale production and to make the jacket even more sustainable, using Candiani denim from partially recycled fabric.

About us | We are Amsterdenim, a small, independent Dutch jeans brand. Operating from our denim lab in Amsterdam, a former garage, we develop premium goods for the gentleman rebel. We cater to "the biker and the banker". We love denim, life and freedom. We are originally a menswear denim brand. Now it is time to expand, offering premium denim goods for dogs.


Why Indiegogo | First of all, we like how Indiegogo sounds like Indigo. As our main focus is to create and produce jeans for human beings, doing a second, bigger production run is something we are looking support for to get funded. We're also keen to present our brand to a whole new audience. With your support we can continue to rebel and become even more sustainable.
 

The Jacket | There are many types of dog jackets but none like this! This jacket is something you only buy once, not to use a few times and throw away. Made in Italy using premium Candiani denim fabric. Raw denim fades over time, becoming more beautiful and personal the longer you have it and wear it. The bottom of the jacket is curved to prevent your dog to wet his jacket, in the back there is a hole for the dog collar ring to attach to the leash.

French Bulldog Stitch wearing the FREDDY dog jacket and Jeremy the original FREDDY trucker.

Connect the leash through this hole in the jacket.

The lining is made from fake fur teddy so soft and warm that it will make bunny rabbits jealous. 

 

Tico is a 9 month old French Bulldog from Spain, wearing size S
 

 
The jacket will be made in Italy by Trend Srl, using sustainable Candiani Denim fabric, keeping the same high level of quality of the jacket we have now. If we manage to get enough support, this premium denim dog jacket will be produced in Italy this Winter, ready for shipment around February 2021. Candiani is known as "The Greenest Mill in this Blue World".
 


Sustainability is the way of the future. Sourcing the right materials and producing close to home are important, just as producing the right goods. One of the reasons for this project is also to find out which exact sizes we need to produce to avoid any waste. Perhaps the most important factor in sustainability however, is usage. It would make a huge difference if we would use the goods we have more and if we wash them less often. Using premium quality materials to create quality products that will be cared for and used and enjoyed for a long time instead of discarded.
 

SUMMARY: This jacket is a sleeveless, miniature version of the jackets we make for humans. Made in Italy using partially recycled premium Candiani denim fabric. We already created the jacket, now we are looking for funds to upscale production and to make it even better!


Premium Candiani raw denim fabric, partially recycled denim
Super soft fake fur teddy lining, as in our jackets for humans
Inside pocket for dog whistle or name tag with Candiani label
Curved design at bottom to keep the jacket neat and clean
Tonal AMSTERDENIM embroidery on back, hole for dog leash on back
Ltd perks: Shootout, Upcycled bracelet, Shopping vouchers, Poop bags holders!

 
SIZING: We developed sizes S to XXL, suitable for almost any size dog. Size XS is now added. 

How to measure your dog to find the right size:


The Perks
These are the perks we're offering to backers:
€    2 Shout Out | Special thank you shoutout on our Instagram, with love from Amsterdam€    5 Good Luck | Wish us good luck and receive 3 lucky rivet pins. FREE worldwide shipping.€  20 Bracelet | One of 36 upcycled denim bracelets by Denim Dutchie. Retail value: € 30€  55 Early Bird | The Dog Jacket. Limited to 24 pcs. Size XS to XXL. Retail value € 79,99€  65 Dog Jacket | Help us decide which size to produce and to fund it. Retail value € 79,99€ 100 Voucher | € 150 shopping at our webshop. Limited to 100. Great gift for the holidays.€ 200 Paris Deluxe | Go over the top with this exclusive custom Jacket. Value: priceless!
ADD-ON | Handmade Italian Poop Bags Holder by The Denim Dog, ltd to 12 pcs per style


Signature lucky Amsterdenim rivet pin which you can remove or replace anywhere you want. 

BRACELET - Denim bracelet made by Denim Dutchie from upcycled Amsterdenim jeans



Denim Dutchie | Petra loves to work with denim. Re-use the blues! She designs, upcycles and re-uses. From old jeans she makes upholstery, aprons and wristbands. For this project she made 36 (numbered) denim bracelets by hand, from the inside seam part of Amsterdenim jeans. 
EARLY BIRD - Premium Denim Dog Jacket at an extra special price, first 24 backers
It's all about momentum. If we get a fair amount of backers right at the start of this campaign, it will become more visible to other potential backers. 

DOG JACKET - Premium Denim Dog Jacket at a special price! Size XS to XXL

Stitch is a 4 year old French Bulldog from The Netherlands, wearing size M.
€ 100  VOUCHER - Shopping voucher at www.amsterdenim.com worth € 150
Ideal gift for the holidays. Ready to use immediately after campaign ends. Works on any item.

ADD-ON's
These can be selected as an add-on perk. first come first served! These items are available as add-on to the denim dog jacket only. We managed to get our hands on a limited number of deluxe dog poop bags holders, hand made in Italy by The Denim Dog.

Working with denim is in The Denim Dog Founder Silvia Rancani's Design DNA. Italian born Silvia has always worked in the denim fashion industry. Silvia designs beautiful Luxury Dog Accessories from her headquarters in Amsterdam
Deluxe Poop Bags Holder "A" | Soft and light, easy to attach to your leash or your jeans belt loop. Handcrafted in Tuscany, Italy from Italian vegetable-tanned bull leather, Italian no-fade Berto’s denim and detailed with antique finishing hardware. Size is 9cm x 8cm and it contains perfectly a standard poop bag roll or dog treats! Limited add-on for € 20, Retail: € 30

It comes in 2 variants, as all our matching products: Raw denim & Black leather with antique silver hardware or Raw denim & Cognac leather with antique gold hardware. Comes in a paper box and with denim paper hangtag. Dyed, molded, and stitched by hand, 100% Made in Italy.

Deluxe Poop Bags Holder "B" | leather dog poop bag holder is a stylish dog accessory that is small and perfectly formed for carrying around those essential poop bags. Looking for a dog poop bag holder for leash? The strap and clip adds versatility so you can attach to the dog leash or your handbag strap or your jeans belt loop. Handcrafted in Tuscany, Italy from Italian vegetable-tanned bull leather, Italian no-fade Berto’s denim and detailed with antique finishing hardware.. Size: 9cm x 6cm and it contains perfectly a standard poop bag roll..or dog treats!

It comes in 2 variants, as all our matching products: Black leather & Raw denim with antique silver hardware or Raw denim & Cognac leather & Raw denim with antique gold hardware. Comes in a paper box and with denim paper hangtag. Dyed, molded, and stitched by hand, 100% Made in Italy. Color may vary slightly. Limited add-on for € 25, Retail: € 40

PARIS DELUXE | Limited, exclusive and completely over the top! From reserved stock on hand, we will create 3 stunning custom jackets, with the help of Zig Zag Borduurservice in Amsterdam. One we are shipping to Paris Hilton, the other two can be yours! Example of custom embroideries they made on our FREDDY heritage jacket:

Once the campaign is finished, we will contact you and get started right away. This needs to be done and shipped before X-Mas! We start with choosing a font and design for your dog's name. Choose the color of the yarn and let us know what else you want us to add. We will show you many options for embroidery designs, patches, studs, ruffles, the sky is the limit! It hoes without saying that this package comes with a deluxe poop bags holder.
The objective | The funding goal of € 5.000 is set to acquire a sufficient amount of Candiani denim and do a production of several hundeds of dog jackets. Upscaling production will lower the cost per jacket and will allow us to further improve it. As we're not selling the dog jackets we have on hand to retailers at present, it is hard to predict which sizes we need. With this project we can find out precisely how many pieces per size we should produce. This reduces the amount of jackets we would otherwise "blindly" produce in sizes that perhaps nobody needs.


 

What happens if we don't reach our goal? | We will deliver all perks wether we reach our funding goal or not. However, if we do not reach our funding goal it would mean that we would not be able to spend as much time and energy in this project as we would want to. Our main business remains making clothing for humans and we need all the resources we have to be able to keep doing this. If we manage to find enough people to support this project and our cause to make premium denim goods for humans and dogs in a sustainable way, we will keep doing so!

BACKGROUND
The idea for the denim dog jacket arose when recording the video below in 2019 where Dutch singer-songwriter Douwe Bob is wearing the human version of the FREDDY jacket;

It all started with a birthday gift for our brand ambassador, Douwe Bob. We downsized our most popular denim jacket, the FREDDY heritage jacket, to fit his Shih Tsu dog Tammy. Cutting and sewing parts of an existing jacket, our first dog jacket prototype was made at the end of 2019. We received so much positive feedback, that we decided to further develop it and produce a few dozen. The first batch is sold via our webshop only and will be sold out soon.

REWARD
If you've backed this project you can get extra rewards by referring friends! Earn shopping vouchers for our webshop by referring this project. 1-2 referrals: 10% discount voucher | 3-4 referrals: 30% discount | 5 or more referrals: 50% discount on www.amsterdenim.com
Referring friends is easy:
1. Log into your account on Indiegogo and 
2. Click on the sharing buttons near the top of our campaign page, which automatically shares your unique link via email or social media. 
You can also copy your unique link by clicking on the link button and paste that into your social media updates or emails. When your friends click through your unique link and contribute to our project, their contributions will be registered under your name. 
You can track your referrals by clicking on your user name on the top right of the page, then going to "My Contributions" and clicking on the "Referrals" tab.
At the end of the campaign, we will tally how many referrals you have and deliver your reward!

story:
Only a handful of shape-wear shirts exist which are designed for men. Built from innovative technologies, the Fit-Shirt is a first-of-its-kind men’s shape-wear with an unprecedented combination of features.

The Fit-Shirt by Y-Curve helps you look good while helping you stay fit and healthy. Designed to not stretch, it pushes your belly-fat up, flattening your stomach to provide lumbar support and taking pressure off the lower back.

By compressing and sculpting your chest, the Fit-Shirt makes your chest look wider and firmer.

Using an X-shaped cut and by compressing your torso, the Fit-Shirt is able  help straighten your back and better correct your posture.


Designed to look exactly like an everyday t-shirt the Fit-Shirt is made from a smooth, fine and wrinkle-free fabric in a figure-flattering slim cut.  

The inner-coating also offers additional protection against the elements and provides comfort.
\

Find the perfect fit for any occasion or season from our array of color options.

Never worry about spills, stains, or dirt ever again. Using the Ultra-Ever Dry ® coating, Fit-Shirt is oil-repellent and super-water-repellent, meaning most liquids will never leave a trace. It is also dust, corrosion and bacteria resistant meaning it will even clean itself of bacteria when you’re not wearing it.

Designed from unique and high quality fibers and using an intelligent fabric structure, the Fit-Shirt will keep its shape after years of washing and drying and daily active wear. 

2-Way Stretch Fabric 80% Nylon/ 20%: Targeted support to the muscles : 4-Way Stretch Body Fabric- 80% Coolmax/ 20% Lycra: Lycra helps to keep the body cool and dry, pulls moisture away from the body.



Y-curve is a high-tech clothing startup. Aiming to develop menswear that is practical, durable and fashionable all at the same time, we engineer our products to be good-looking and life-lasting, without compromising comfort.  

Y-curve have been working for the past three years with a Hong Kong-based manufacturer which has over 30 years of experience in apparel production and with exports across Europe and America. They are also the owner of several self-developed technologies and patents and are able to provide and meet any number of pledges.

story:
Sleep is one of the most powerful tools for a better tomorrow—we can literally sleep our way to becoming happier, healthier, smarter and faster. Sleep is key for our health and the right temperature is key for our sleep.

  • Transforming sleep comfort (temperature management, moisture regulation, fit & comfort, super soft touch) as proven in laboratory and consumer testing.  
  • Natural high-tech fibre: Combining all the benefits of natural and technical fibres.  
  • Body mapping for sleep: Integrated functional zones with extra moisture-wicking areas where we tend to sweat.  
  • Swedish design, Swiss textile engineering, sustainably made in Europe: From the design and textile engineering to the sourcing of yarn and garment production, Dagsmejan sleepwear is made in Europe with leading partner companies committed to a sustainable production process. 

Dagsmejan sleepwear is ideal if: 

  • You live an active life and for the hours you spend in bed you want to get the best possible recovery 
  • You sometimes get hot and sweaty during the night and want a cooler more restful sleep
  • You love to feel exceptionally comfortable while you sleep
  • You travel—even if you can’t choose your bed or duvet you at least want to know you can rely on your sleepwear to help you get a good night’s sleep

 

 

 

Easy-care: Dagsmejan sleepwear is of course also machine-washable and made to last. 

The Dagsmejan sleepwear collection gives you total freedom of choice—you can mix and match all of our garments (styles, colours and sizes). Our sleepwear is made of Nattwell® fabric: 95% natural high-tech fibre based on Micro Modal for incredible softness and temperature and moisture management, and 5% elastane for optimal stretch, comfort and fabric recovery. 

On popular demand we have advanced the introduction of the sleep t-shirt for men, now available at unique perk prices! The t-shirt is available in midnight blue and dark grey and has all the benefits of the rest of the Dagsmejan sleepwear. 

 

Make your pre-order today and start to enjoy supreme sleep comfort after shipment in October 2017. Find the pre-order that is just right for you and take advantage of our fantastic introductory discounts. 

Thanks to extensive research into our nightly temperature shifts and sweat patterns, as well as sleep position and movements, we have been able to design a unique range of clothing optimised for maximum sleep comfort.

  • Body mapping for sleep: We have integrated specially-designed temperature and moisture-control zones into Dagsmejan sleepwear to help maintain your optimal sleeping temperature throughout the night.
  • Ultimate comfort in style: We move on average 50 times per night so it is key that our sleepwear move with us.  

To ensure an ideal fit and supreme comfort, 50 men and women of varying ages and sizes tested Dagsmejan sleepwear. We received feedback on every aspect of our sleepwear—from seams and waist bands to the lengths of the sleeves and the feel of the fabric—this feedback has been incorporated into our designs. 

Thanks to extensive research the key has been found to enhance the properties of the MicroModal fibre, giving you Nattwell®—a breakthrough new fabric used in all Dagsmejan sleepwear. The natural moisture absorption properties of the fibre’s core remain unchanged, while the outer layer is adapted to make it water resistant and repel moisture. This gives the Nattwell® fabric revolutionary moisture and temperature management properties.

Nattwell® fabric and the Dagsmejan sleep design® have been proven in laboratory testing to be super soft as well as to offer superior moisture management and thermal properties which greatly enhance sleep comfort. 

We have worked with Torbjörn Åkerstedt, professor at Stockholm University and one of Europe’s most renowned experts on sleep, to get to the bottom of what impacts our sleep comfort and quality. By understanding our nightly temperature and sweat patterns, as well as sleep positions and movements, we were able to design a unique range of clothing optimised for sleep.

Together with Professor Åkerstedt we have also developed a sleep booklet offering you holistic tips on how to get a better night’s sleep. This booklet is shipped with your Dagsmejan sleepwear. 

The inspiration for Dagsmejan came from our passion to lead a full life. Balancing a busy lifestyle, it is key for our body and mind to get the fuel it needs to function and that fuel is sleep. That’s when it struck us how strange it is that we are still wearing the same type of pyjamas we did 50 years ago. In sportswear a functional revolution has taken place but we still spend one third of our lives in one of the least innovative and purpose-driven garments around.

This is why we founded Dagsmejan, dedicated to developing the most innovative sleepwear that will help you enjoy the quality of sleep you need and deserve. The Dagsmejan team and ecosystem consists of sleep scientists, textile engineers, and research and manufacturing partners from leading institutions and companies across Europe. We are united by our passion and vision—to find new ways to improve our lives through a better night’s sleep.

Catarina & Andreas, 

Co-founders Dagsmejan Ventures AG, St Gallen, Switzerland

In our quest to create the most comfortable sleepwear ever we sought out the very best collaboration partners from across Europe. We worked with Swedish designers to merge form and function. We took advantage of optimal textile engineering in Switzerland, building on the country’s long heritage of producing the finest-quality garments. We use beech wood grown in Europe, and our fibres are knitted by a world-class manufacturer in Austria, with over 100 years of experience in complex fine-knitting. Finally the garments are sown together in Portugal.

We are now ready to distribute worldwide and spread the joy of supreme sleep comfort across the planet!

Worried about finding the right size? Use our size guide below and if you have any questions just let us know and we will guide you to the right fit.

 

Risk and challenges

Management: Both Catarina and Andreas had considerable experience in executive positions before founding Dagsmejan. They know what it means to set up and manage a complex supply chain and production system geared to the highest quality standards.

Research and development: Thanks to our extensive research and testing carried out with leading partners in the fields of smart textiles and sleep we have been able to ensure that Dagsmejan sleepwear truly delivers on its promises. Thorough laboratory testing has enabled us to develop optimal fibre and knitting techniques that are proven to deliver superior temperature regulation and moisture management, as well as a super soft touch. The sleepwear’s ergonomic comfort was also tested extensively in consumer fit trials.

Production: To ensure that we deliver sleepwear of the highest quality Dagsmejan collaborates with leading partners, that also produce garments for top companies in sportswear and apparel. From the sourcing of the yarn to creating the final garment—all steps in the production process take place in Europe and are OEKO-TEX® certified to ensure we offer the safest, best-quality product possible.

Worldwide distribution: Dagsmejan works with established warehousing and logistics partners in the US, EU and Switzerland, which enables us to deliver as fast, hassle-free and cost-efficiently as possible.

story:
Combattre tous les jours pour rester en vie, je l'ai fait. Je m’appelle Josianne Monette et je suis survivante de deux cancers.  La vie m'a offerte une deuxième chance et je réalise enfin mon rêve de mettre sur pied une entreprise pouvant donner espoir aux combattants du cancer. 

Je propulse EKKLO, une ligne de vêtements et d’accessoires ludiques, positifs et porteurs d’espoir. Des produits de grande qualité, écoresponsables et fabriqués au Canada. EKKLO,  c’est aussi une nouvelle boutique en ligne qui deviendra à coup sûr, une référence pour les combattants du cancer et tous ceux qui souhaitent supporter la cause. Grâce à votre implication et à cette campagne de financement participatif, je pousserai EKKLO encore plus loin afin de faire une réelle différence dans la cause contre le cancer.

Having to fight for your life, day after day, I know what that’s like too. My name is Josianne Monette and I’m a two-time cancer survivor. I’ve created EKKLO, a line of inspiring clothing and accessories designed to generate hope. Our products are high quality, eco-friendly and Canadian-made. EKKLO is also an online boutique that promises to become the go-to destination for everyone fighting cancer first hand and their supporters. With help from you and this fundraising campaign, I will take EKKLO even further to make a real difference for the cause. 

EKKLO lance d’abord des collections de tuques légères et de foulards faits de bambou apportant chaleur et confort. Nous allons communiquer avec vous pour le choix de votre modèle et couleur.

EKKLO is initially launching collections of toques and scarves made of bamboo, a soft material that’s lightweight, warm and comfortable. You will receive a separate survey email for choosing your favorite design and color.

Mon parcours, ma vision des choses
J’ai reçu un premier diagnostique de cancer du sein le 26 mai 2014. Je travaillais dans une agence de publicité, j’avais 37 ans, un fils et une envie folle de repousser mes limites et d'accomplir un Ironman pour mon 40e anniversaire. Ma vie a basculé. J’ai alors découvert que j’étais porteuse d’un gène très rare (TP53) m’obligeant à être suivi par huit spécialistes pour le reste de ma vie. Un an plus tard, un deuxième cancer, cette fois-ci du col de l’utérus.

My story and vision
I was first diagnosed with breast cancer on May 26, 2014. I was 37, had a job at an ad agency and a son at home. Up to that point, my goal had been to push my personal limits and complete an Ironman for my 40th birthday. And all of the sudden, everything changed. I found out that I carried a very rare gene—TP53—which meant I’d need to be followed by eight specialists for the rest of my life. A year later, a second cancer surfaced; this time in my cervix.

Aujourd’hui, je suis en vie et je veux redonner, partager et humaniser cet enfer afin que les gens d’un peu partout sachent qu’ils ne sont pas seuls.

Today, I’m more alive than ever. I want to give back, share my story and help bring a badly needed human touch to the fight against cancer. I want people everywhere to know that they are not alone.

Porter EKKLO, c'est porter la vie.
Mon aspiration avec EKKLO? Offrir aux combattants du cancer et à tous les supporteurs, une inspiration pouvant les suivre partout et les aider à traverser les revers de cette maladie. 

Wear EKKLO and join the cause
What inspired me to create EKKLO? I wanted to provide those fighting cancer—patients, survivors and their supporters—with a source of inspiration that they can carry with them everywhere and help them through the battle. 

Voici en images, le parcours de fabrication de nos produits!
Derrière EKKLO, il y a des valeurs, des gens et beaucoup de passion.

Here is a video of our manufacturing process!
EKKLO is the product of people, values and plenty of passion.

 
Une créativité sans limites!
D’autres produits seront bientôt proposés, tels que la trousse de survie du combattant et la collection super-héros, destinée aux enfants.

Tons of ideas!
Other products will soon be available, such as our Survival Kit and Superhero Collection for children fighting the battle.

Un succès assuré
Mon passé m’a donné les acquis nécessaires pour lancer cette entreprise. Mon présent me donne les mots justes pour atteindre les combattants et les supporteurs. Ma résilience et ma foi me donnent la force d’en rire, d’en pleurer et de dire les vraies choses.

EKKLO vivra à travers les produits, mais également sur mes plateformes sociales. Des anecdotes, de l’humour, des larmes, de l’espoir. EKKLO sera ma voix, mais aussi celle de tous ceux qui auront envie de se joindre à la cause.

Success guaranteed
My past has given me the knowledge I needed to start this business. My present allows me to find the right words to talk to patients and supporters. My resilience and faith give me strength to laugh, to cry and to tell it like it is.

EKKLO will live through its products and connect with community on social media. We’ll share stories, laughter, tears and hope. EKKLO will be my voice, but also that of all those who want to join the cause.

Et maintenant? À vous de jouer!
J’ai donc besoin de 50 000$ par l’entremise de cette campagne pour faire d’EKKLO, la marque de prédilection des combattants.

What’s missing?
Right now I need to raise $50,000 to make EKKLO the brand of choice for those fighting cancer. I need your support. 

Les médias!

Journal de Montréal
http://www.journaldemontreal.com/2017/06/20/ekklo

Cogecotv Laurentides
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=reb0DbtfAVs

96,9 CKOI

http://www.ckoi.com/mention/soutenez-la-lutte-c...

Accès LE Journal des Pays d'en Haut
http://www.journalacces.ca/actualite/vetements-...

Inspiria
http://inspiria.ca/ekklo-le-reve-dune-survivante/

TPL Moms
http://www.tplmoms.com/2017/05/21/du-style-pour...

Présidente/fondatrice
Josianne Monette: https://www.linkedin.com/in/josianne-monette-08...
info@ekklo.ca
450 694-0146

Directrice artistique & +++
Stéfanie Plourde: http://spdesigngraphique.com

Stratège marketing et mentor & ++
Annie Verrier, Performa Marketing: http://performa-marketing.com/fr/

Rédaction et création de contenu & ++
Marie-Michèle Imbleau: https://www.linkedin.com/in/mariemicheleimbleau

story:
about us

Inspired by the designer's father's humor, energy, and confidence, the designer (Brooke Goldman) attributes her creative nature and passion for fashion, to her late father. Channeling his absence in her life she endeavored to create a namesake collection. District seemed the fitting name, expressing an edge and self- expression that she seeks to express in each piece, the word stems from her father's name's German roots. The name traces back to a German word meaning "district", thus becoming a foundation for the collection.

inspiration

The collection was founded seeking to express a freedom of expression, clothes for every mood and any occasion. Statement items, each that can be mixed together and worn every which way... inspiring creativity, personality, and expression as she wears them. The items channel the idea that anyone can wear their favorite top, jacket, layer around town on a casual day with slouchy jeans and loafers and can transform the piece with great heels at night.... Clothes that become one with a mood.

fashion

Walking through a tunnel in a busy city, down an old tiled road, looking out from a high rise at the city lights... fabrics and colors that are as sophisticated, sexy, and edgy as the person wearing them... on each journey she seeks out.

funding

Your funds will be vital at every turn as each dollar will contribute to our fabric chioces, designs, pattern making, cutting, dying, construction, marketing and more -- all for our upcoming line's launch!

story:
What is the SM-1: The SM-1 is a compact shoulder stabilizer for cameras and handheld camcorders. It allows for smooth camera movements and can be compressed into a tabletop dolly in seconds.  

SM-1: With every $500 donation, your name will be entered into a draw for the chance to win your very own SM-1!

What is the SMD: The SMD is for anyone who already owns a shoulder mount but would like to add a tabletop dolly to their gear. The SMD uses parts from the SM-1 and can be easily upgraded into an SM-1 with few accessories. 

SMD Dolly: With every $250 donation, your name will be entered into a draw for the chance to win your very own SMD!

The SM-1 and SMD are designed to work with most DSLR cameras and consumer camcorders. It is optimized for DSLRs such as the Canon 5D Mk2, the T2i, the Nikon D3000, or the D7000, and it is also compatible with handheld camcorders.

What's the money for? Backers for this project will be helping to create the first production run of the SM-1

  1. Your pledges will be used to create all the manufacture drawings needed to machine each aluminium piece. 
  2. Your pledges will also enable me to move forward with orders for each of the 59 different parts of the SM-1.
  3. Your pledges will also be used to create the mould needed to make the shoulder pads.
  4. And finally to make all the shoulder pads for the SM-1

When will I receive my perks? As soon as the campaign comes to a close all perks that include clothing will be ordered. The winners of the giveaways will be picked and notified they won. And any perk that includes a rig will receive weekly updates, if you wish, until the last piece of aluminum is cut, anodized and ready to be shipped.

What makes the SM-1 stand out from all the rest? The SM-1 is the first collapsable shoulder stabilizer that can also be used as a tabletop dolly. 

Will there be future MANtini products? Yes, the SM-1 is only the start of what Mantini has to offer.

Can I help you in any other way? Indeed! You can do so by sharing the link to this campaign on your Facebook, Twitter, Google+. Talk about it in forums, on YouTube, on Vimeo. Email your friends and family about it, you can also invite your friends to "Like" MANtini’s Facbook page follow Mantini on Twitter check out my Youtube the Mantini Website and please make some noise! :)

story:
Feel and be beautiful everyday with our Plus Series Moisturizing Masks.  Each product is uniquely designed to moisturize your skin depending on your needs.

 

Feeling a little drab?  Try our +Plus Series Brightening Moisturizing sheet mask to reveal your inner radiance.  Your skin will feel brighter and radiant like a ray of sunshine!

 

Need a perk me up? Feel the difference in your skin's elasticity with our +Plus Series Elasticity Moisturizing sheet mask. Your skin will feel supple, hydrated and pampered!

 

Feeling stressed?  Relax and indulge in our +Plus Series Soothing Moisturizing sheet mask.  Effective in soothing sun-exposed skin, feel the difference in how it can help comfort stressed skin, leaving you feeling refreshed and rejuvenated.

 

Want to feel transformed?  Our +Plus Series Hyaluronan Moisturizing sheet mask will leave your skin feeling hydrated, supple, and glowing with pride.

 

From our design inspiration to what our sheet masks deliver, our launching products are meant to pamper and make you feel beautiful.

Become a part of a community of compassionate beauties to help paw it forward.  Let’s face it, compassion looks gorgeous on you!

Our products are NEVER tested on animals.

 

 

 

We’re very proud to have gotten this far on our own.  They say passion and determination are two most important factors in helping you realize your dreams.  We sure had plenty of both to propel us to this day.

As a THANK YOU for being our early supporter, we’re very excited to offer 2000 units of products as “perks”.  All Net Proceeds from our campaign will be donated to Best Friends to get our partnership and commitment off to a strong start!

Success of this campaign is critical in not only achieving this ambitious goal, but even more critical in our long-term vision to increase our footprint to help you feel beautiful and pampered while saving even more animals in need.

 

The Sharing Co. is a beauty brand founded on the basis of sharing and giving.  Our Founding Partners have a shared vision of creating amazing beauty products designed to inspire compassion and pawing it forward to animals in need.

Why sheet masks?  Just like inner beauty and compassion requires the right mindset, we believe a well-moisturized skin is an essential foundation to any beauty regimen.  Besides, who doesn’t want to be pampered in the comfort of your own home AND give back to animals in need at the same time?!

The Sharing Co.’s inspiration was drawn from Cane's Bucket List, our Founding Partner & President's rescue Pit Bull Terrier who went on a bucket list journey while battling terminal cancer.  Cane's most notable Bucket List item was #15- The notion of Pawing It Forward by raising awareness, promoting adoption, and capturing their remaining moments to illustrate that life, really is about positive change.

Our Founding Partners were greatly moved by such compassion and unselfish love that we came together with a shared vision of creating amazing beauty products.  Products that is designed to inspire compassion and instill the unified voice of pawing it forward to animals in need.

We chose to partner with Best Friends Animal Society because their cause perfectly aligns with Cane's - to raise awareness, promote adoption and to connect with rescue companion animals.

 

Best Friends Animal Society® is the only national welfare organization focused exclusively on ending the killing of dogs and cats in America’s shelters.  Best Friends runs the nation’s largest no-kill sanctuary for companion animals, as well as lifesaving programs in partnership with rescue groups and shelters across the country.  Since its founding in 1984, Best Friends has helped reduce the number of animals killed in shelters nationwide from 17 million per year to about 2 million.  Best Friends believes in taking a positive and collaborative approach to saving lives.  With our vast knowledge, technical expertise and on-the-ground network of partners, we will end the killing and Save Them All.

 

 

By combining our passion for beauty products and love of animals, we wanted to draw our design inspiration from shelter animals in need.

DESIGN STORY, +SOOTHING

Familiar with 101 Dalmatians?  Just after the anticipated release of Disney’s remake of 101 Dalmatians in the ‘90s, a sharp increase in shelters of the beloved breed was observed.  Our design inspiration underscores the importance of selecting a companion that fits in with your lifestyle vs. superficial appearances.  They’re more than a pet, they should be considered a part of your FAMILY.

 

DESIGN STORY, +ELASTICITY

The color and patterns are inspired by the lovable Tabby Cat.  Of the astounding number of animals in shelters nationwide, about half are said to be cats.

 

DESIGN STORY, +BRIGHTENING

Notice the paw prints in our design? We love watching animals play in the snow because their excitement is so adorable and heartwarming.  Spending quality time with your companion animal not only strengthens the bond you share, but the memories you create will become timeless treasures that can never be replaced.

 

DESIGN STORY, +HYALURONAN

If you look at the design carefully, the pattern mirrors a close-up of a Pit Bull Terrier’s face.  Despite their innately loving and sweet nature, Pit Bull Terriers are one of the most misunderstood and euthanized dogs in shelters across the country.

 

 

Our manufacturing facility in South Korea is certified with a ISO9001. ISO9001 is the international standard that specifies requirements for a quality management system(QMS). Organizations use the standard to demonstrate the ability to consistently provide products and services that meet customer and regulatory requirements.
