lovable Tabby Cat.  Of the astounding number of animals in shelters nationwide, about half are said to be cats. DESIGN STORY, +BRIGHTENINGNotice the paw prints in our design? We love watching animals play in the snow because their excitement is so adorable and heartwarming.  Spending quality time with your companion animal not only strengthens the bond you share, but the memories you create will become timeless treasures that can never be replaced. DESIGN STORY, +HYALURONANIf you look at the design carefully, the pattern mirrors a close-up of a Pit Bull Terrier’s face.  Despite their innately loving and sweet nature, Pit Bull Terriers are one of the most misunderstood and euthanized dogs in shelters across the country.  Our manufacturing facility in South Korea is certified with a ISO9001. ISO9001 is the international standard that specifies requirements for a quality management system(QMS). Organizations use the standard to demonstrate the ability to consistently provide products and services that meet customer and regulatory requirements.

story:
Workouts; they give us energy, goals to achieve, but most of all, they make us feel good. At Iron Roots, we don't only want you to feel good about your workout but also about what you’re wearing during your workout.

More than 90% of all athletic apparel is made from plastics like polyester and nylon. Every time when you wash them, tiny pieces of plastic get released. These tiny pieces are called microplastics, and they can end up polluting our oceans.
 


At Iron Roots, we make the alternative; natural athletic apparel made from sustainable and high-performance materials like hemp, beechwood, and eucalyptus. These materials are all made from plants, and thus don't release microplastics when washed.

For our first microplastic free sports shorts, we have selected eucalyptus trees as our raw material. The eucalyptus trees are grown in Europe in FSC managed forests and processed in Austria, where we work with our partner to create a high-performance, odor resistant material called TENCEL™ Lyocell. The fabric of our sports shorts is 100% made from TENCEL™ Lyocell.


Besides being microplastic free, our shorts also have some other key features which will enhance your sporting experience.
 


One thing we were always missing in other sports shorts was zippers. While you are actively training, it is easy to lose your keys or other small items. To prevent this, we have added lightweight zippers to our shorts.
 


To ensure that our production happens fairly, we produce our sportswear within Europe. Together with our partner factory in Turkey, we have produced these fabrics, which will be made into shorts by our partner factory in Greece.


Here is what the supply chain looks like for the Iron Roots Eucalyptus Performance Shorts:

 




The following perks are available when you become a backer:
 


Here are the size charts for the available styles:
 


Before the launch of this crowdfunding campaign, we have already done all of the prototyping required to make the shorts. As the timeline below indicates, we aim to have the shorts out for shipping in May 2021. Due to COVID, there might be a small delay, but we don't expect this to happen.
 


Available in limited amounts, you're also able to get our Hemp Tote Bag together with the shorts exclusively through our crowdfunding campaign. Made from a strong woven 45% hemp and 55% organic cotton fabric, you can carry all your training gear in style.



Carbon neutral shipping
All the CO2 that is emitted during the shipping process of our products is compensated. We work with an organization, who carefully calculates our CO2 impact of shipments and then compensates this by planting trees in South America. The compensation certificate can be found on our website.

Risks and challenges
This is not our first production run. In 2018 we launched our first products and since then we've been bringing high-performance, microplastic free sportswear to conscious athletes around the world through our website www.ironroots.com other online and offline channels.

However, delays due to unforeseen obstacles are always a risk. But we made sure our schedule allows for delays. Also by only working with the best manufacturers, we are confident that we can work through any obstacles.

At all times, we will be as transparent as possible and keep you up to date on our progress!

story:
Timeless, Sustainable & Empowering Swimwear 

At Salomé Swim the goal is to make beautiful and functional swimsuits, while striving for sustainability and women's empowerment. I started the company a year ago, and since then I have not stopped working to make this goal into a reality.  

Now I am expanding into new styles and also working towards producing them in my home town, Santo Domingo, Dominican Republic. I will be working with local artisan women to craft my designs, and at the same time support my community. With your help I can continue to create beautiful and eco-friendly swimwear, while also supporting my country and representing my community. 

 

BACKGROUND

Designed by Dominican, Brooklyn-based stylist Sheyla de los Santos (me! hi!), Salomé has always been conceived as a means to support and empower women. I have worked in fashion in New York for almost a decade, styling celebrity, editorial, film and commercial shoots to support my passion for design. I am a proudly curvy woman who has fit a wide variety of body types and has seen first-hand how so many of the pieces we love in a magazine do not fit real bodies right, and are not made ethically or sustainably. I've always known my own designs would be made differently. 

More than just a brand, Salomé strives to create a culture of support and community, a space for women to feel welcome, safe and celebrated. 

 

 

WHY

Inspired by the women in my family and named after them, this collection represents more than just my swimsuits, it represents the possibility of working with women that just like my mother and my aunts, are hard workers, strong and resilient.  

My first production was made in New York, and it was educative and a true experience, but it was always my dream to take it to Dominican Republic. Being able to bring work to my country, no matter how small, fills me with great joy. This campaign is my commitment to continue making eco-friendly swimwear and bringing this work to strong and resourceful women in Dominican Republic.

With your help I can continue my mission of creating sustainable swimwear and start a new chapter by bringing this production to Dominican Republic.

 

THE COLLECTION 

"Del Carmen" capsule collection represents classic swimwear pieces and the personalities of the women that inspired them. There are three styles in this collection, Josie and Belkys below and María (still in development). The high leg cut, bust support and flattering feminine shapes are key design elements of SALOMÉ swimsuits and present in this collection.

Josie is inspired by my mother's elegance, 90's nostalgia and zest for life. Josie is designed with women of all shapes in mind, big bust of smaller bust will be comfortable equally in this delicate, playful and functional one piece. 

Belkys is my aunt, she is fun and sexy, with a side of sweet and I believe so is this bikini!
Fun colors, a sexy shape and sweet and gentle fabric that hugs you, supports you and feels good to have on. The top was designed adjustable to facilitate and ensure that perfect fit and the bottoms can be worn as high rise to the waist or down for a regular fit. 

Colors options: (red color is an approximate, but very close to the real color)

 

SIZE CHART 

 

THE FABRIC

This collection will be made with ECONYL® recycled nylon. This is very important to me because they use nylon waste that was in landfill and oceans, regenerate it and create a new product that we can use, that is great quality and helps the planet in the process. 

Their fabric is highly durable, amazing quality and soft to the touch and against the skin. 

 

WHY BACK SALOMÉ

I need people like You! People who support small and female founded business, who care about the environment and love a fun, functional and beautiful swimsuit! 

Your support will help me to: 

 

PROGRESS TO PRODUCTION  

At this time, I have already finished the prototypes for Josie and Belkys. María the 3rd style that completes the collection is still in development and will be ready to go into production at the same time.

All funds raised will go towards production of this collection, as well as the eventual marketing, promotion and distribution of this line. I aim to complete the production for this collection by spring, and I am so excited to use this platform to help raise funds, begin pre-sales and grow my SALOMÉ COMMUNITY! This is your chance to be a part of something special!​
Thank you for your support!

story:
TraceBrace is a startup founded by six high school students, who want to be change in the small messed up country & in the world. It all started on a hackathon organised by UN Women. The main goal was to create an IT solution for violence prevention against women, where we created the first prototype of TraceBrace. TraceBrace is a bracelet which sends previously entered SOS messages in the TraceBrace app on your phone. At the end of the message your location is added! We won the first place and earned six months support by UN Women. Since their support ended, we need your help to bring this product to the world & make the change!

 

All around the world, women and girls face sexual harassment and other forms of violence in public spaces. In many cities, a large majority of women and girls have experienced some form of violation, ranging from unwanted sexual remarks or groping to rape and gender-related killings.

Public safety of women and youth is much lower compared to that of adult males, especially in situations when moving at night through back alleys, going to concerts, parties, etc.

Statistics shows us that:

  • About 1 in 3 (35%) of women worldwide have experienced either physical and/or sexual intimate partner violence or non-partner sexual violence in their lifetime. [1]

  • In our country (Bosnia & Herzegovina) every second woman has experienced at least one type of violence during her lifetime, and that almost every fourth has experienced physical violence during her lifetime. [2]

  • Violence causes more than 1.6 million deaths worldwide every year. [3]

[1] - Global estimates published by WHO (World Health Organization)

[2] - Prevalence and characteristics of violence against women in B&H 2013

[3] - Krug EG et al., eds. World report on violence and health. Geneva, World Health Organization, 2002. Via CDC

We are constantly engaged in field of violence prevention trough many NGOs who are eligible on that field. The final product was developed through UN Women project „Standards and Engagement for Ending Violence against Women and Domestic Violence in Bosnia and Herzegovina“ financially supported by the Swedish International Development Cooperation Agency (Sida).

As financial support of UN Women and SIDA ended, we want to continue with the production. But to do that, we need money for equipment that we were renting during their support. Required equipment for production: 3D printer, working space and electronic parts. 

Yes, of course that you get one of our amazing perks, but is there anything more that you can get except the acknowledgement that you were the one who supported that global change we want to be!? Isn't that why are you here? 

So what are we trying to achieve: 

But how are we planning to achieve this? Well, through manufacturing and distributing this product all over the world. This will make communities much safer. Also, our background with UN Women gives us huge credibility in this field.

Do you like what we are doing? Would you like to be person that will help us change the world?  If your answers are YES, find out how can you help us on other ways:

  • You could share our campaign with others who also want to change the world or maybe get our cool perks. 
  • By clicking the Facebook icon at the beginning of this page you can share this campaign on your Facebook profile with your friends.
  • If you are interested in details about our project we might have missed to mention, feel free to reach out to us on social media!

Whatever you do to support us will be appreciated! Thank you for: 

"Being the change that we wish to see in the world."

Prof. Eddie Edhem Čustović from La Trobe university

 

Al Jazeera Balkans article

http://balkans.aljazeera.net/blog/tuzlanski-genijalci-od-vrece-koja-puni-mobitel-do-narukvice-koja-salje-sos-poruke?fbclid=IwAR2u0oBosyVaAY-FeFTiSQP7wcaNmCuA75bylql-CLfCtGJPIt_Gw_tQnIs

 

Insert from FTV news

 
Insert from SLON news
 
Insert from  TV1 news

 

Insert from morning show ("JUTRO ZA SVE") - live: 

 

TraceBrace je startup pokrenut od strane šest srednjoškolaca, koji žele biti dio promjene u maloj zamršenoj državi i svijetu, Sve je započelo na hackathonu kojeg je organizvao UN Women. Glavni cilj takmičenja je bio da se napravi IT rješenje koje će spriječiti nasilje nad ženama, a gdje smo mi kreirali prvi prototip narukvice TraceBrace. TraceBrace je narukvica koja šalje prethodno unesene SOS poruke unutar TraceBrace aplikacije na vašem mobitelu. Na kraj poruke se dodaje vaša lokacija! Osvojili smo prvo mjesto i zavrijedili 6 mjeseci podrške od UN Women kako bi razvili finalni proizvod. Kako je njihova podrška prestala, trebamo vašu pomoć da plasiramo ovaj proizvod u svijetu i napravimo promjenu!

Širom svijeta, žene i djevojčice su žrtve seksualnog nasilja na javnim mjestima ali i ostalih vrsta nasilja. U mnogim gradovima, veliki dio žena i djevojčica su iskusile neku vrstu nasilja, krenuvši od neželjenih seksualnih dobacivanja, primjedbi i dodira pa do silovanja i ubistava na bazi spola.

Javna sigurnost žena i djevojčica je mnogo manja poredeći je sa sigurnošću odraslih muškaraca, posebno u situacijama kretanja noću po stražnjim ulicama, odlazaka na koncerte, zabave itd.

Prema podacima iz statistike:

  • Otprilike 1 od 3 (35%) žene širom svijeta je iskusila fizičko i/ili seksualno nasilje od strane njihovih partnera ili osoba koje im nisu bili partneri u životu. [1]

  • U našoj državi (Bosna i Hercegovina) svaka druga žena je žrtva najmanje jedne vrste nasilja u toku svog života a svaka četvrta djevojčica je bila žrtva fizičkog nasilja u svom životu. [2]

  • Nasilje uzrokuje više od 1.6 miliona ubistava širom svijeta svake godine. [3]

[1] - Globalne procjene objavljene od strane WHO (World Health Organization)

[2] - Rasprostranjenost i obilježja nasilja nad ženama i djecom u BiH 2013. godini,

[3] - Krug EG et al., eds. Svjetski izvještaj o nasilju i zdravlju. Ženeva, World Health Organization, 2002. Via CDC

Mi smo stalno angažovani u polju sprječavanja nasilja kroz mnoge kvalifikovane nevladine organizacije. Finalni proizvod je razvijen kroz UN Women projekat "Standardi i angažman za zaustavljanje nasilja nad ženama i nasilja u porodici u Bosni i Hercegovini" koji finansijski podržava Švedska agencija za međunarodni razvoj i saradnju (SIDA).

Mi želimo nastaviti sa proizvodnjom, ali istekla je finansijska podrška organizacija UN Women i SIDA. Kako bi to učinili, potreban nam je novac za opremu koju smo koristili tokom njihove podrške. Ono što je nama potrebno jeste: 3D printer, novac za iznajmljivanje prostora i elektronički dijelovi.

Naravno da ćete dobiti jedno od naših pakovanja, ali možete li dobiti išta bolje od saznanja da ste upravo VI bili dio onih koji su podržali promjenu u svijetu? Zar niste zbog toga ovdje?

Šta želimo, dakle, postići?

Ali kako to planiramo učiniti? Proizvodnjom i distribucijom ovog proizvoda širom svijeta. Ovo će društvo učiniti sigurnijim. Takođe, naša pozadina rada sa UN Women daje nam velik kredibilitet u ovom polju.

Sviđa vam se ovo što radimo? Da li želite biti osoba koja nam je pomogla promjeniti svijet? Ako je vaš odgovor DA, možete nam pomoći i na druge načine:

  • Možete podijeliti kampanju sa drugim osobama koje žele učiniti promjenu u svijetu ali i dobiti jedno od naših pakovanja.
  • Podijelite kampanju sa prijateljima na Facebooku, tako što ćete kliknuti na ikonu Facebooka na početku ove stranice.
  • Ukoliko vas zanimaju dodatne informacije a koje nismo naveli prije, možete nas kontaktirati putem društvenih mreža!

Na koji god način nam pomogli, bit ćemo vam zahvalni! Hvala vam što: 

"Predstavljate promjenu koju želimo vidjeti u svijetu."

Javna sigurnost žena i djevojčica je mnogo manja poredeći je sa sigurnošću odraslih muškaraca, posebno u situacijama kretanja noću po stražnjim ulicama, odlazaka na koncerte, zabave itd.
Prema podacima iz statistike:

Otprilike 1 od 3 (35%) žene širom svijeta je iskusila fizičko i/ili seksualno nasilje od strane njihovih partnera ili osoba koje im nisu bili partneri u životu. [1]
U našoj državi (Bosna i Hercegovina) svaka druga žena je žrtva najmanje jedne vrste nasilja u toku svog života a svaka četvrta djevojčica je bila žrtva fizičkog nasilja u svom životu. [2]
Nasilje uzrokuje više od 1.6 miliona ubistava širom svijeta svake godine. [3]

[1] - Globalne procjene objavljene od strane WHO (World Health Organization)
[2] - Rasprostranjenost i obilježja nasilja nad ženama i djecom u BiH 2013. godini,
[3] - Krug EG et al., eds. Svjetski izvještaj o nasilju i zdravlju. Ženeva, World Health Organization, 2002. Via CDC

Mi smo stalno angažovani u polju sprječavanja nasilja kroz mnoge kvalifikovane nevladine organizacije. Finalni proizvod je razvijen kroz UN Women projekat "Standardi i angažman za zaustavljanje nasilja nad ženama i nasilja u porodici u Bosni i Hercegovini" koji finansijski podržava Švedska agencija za međunarodni razvoj i saradnju (SIDA).




Mi želimo nastaviti sa proizvodnjom, ali istekla je finansijska podrška organizacija UN Women i SIDA. Kako bi to učinili, potreban nam je novac za opremu koju smo koristili tokom njihove podrške. Ono što je nama potrebno jeste: 3D printer, novac za iznajmljivanje prostora i elektronički dijelovi.

Naravno da ćete dobiti jedno od naših pakovanja, ali možete li dobiti išta bolje od saznanja da ste upravo VI bili dio onih koji su podržali promjenu u svijetu? Zar niste zbog toga ovdje?



Šta želimo, dakle, postići?


Ali kako to planiramo učiniti? Proizvodnjom i distribucijom ovog proizvoda širom svijeta. Ovo će društvo učiniti sigurnijim. Takođe, naša pozadina rada sa UN Women daje nam velik kredibilitet u ovom polju.


Sviđa vam se ovo što radimo? Da li želite biti osoba koja nam je pomogla promjeniti svijet? Ako je vaš odgovor DA, možete nam pomoći i na druge načine:

Možete podijeliti kampanju sa drugim osobama koje žele učiniti promjenu u svijetu ali i dobiti jedno od naših pakovanja.
Podijelite kampanju sa prijateljima na Facebooku, tako što ćete kliknuti na ikonu Facebooka na početku ove stranice.
Ukoliko vas zanimaju dodatne informacije a koje nismo naveli prije, možete nas kontaktirati putem društvenih mreža!

Na koji god način nam pomogli, bit ćemo vam zahvalni! Hvala vam što: 
"Predstavljate promjenu koju želimo vidjeti u svijetu."

story:
What is ZOURI?

ZOURI is an eco-vegan footwear project that uses plastic litter from the Portuguese coast in the production of a sandals collection.  

 

COLLECTING PLASTIC LITTER FROM THE OCEAN

Together with local organizations and volunteers, we are collecting plastic debris from our ocean and beaches. With the first clean up action , we collected 1,5 tons of plastic debris in 11 beaches of Esposende, Portugal. 

Our goal is to create a network with all defensors of the oceans: public institutions, NGOs, schools, companies, and community for a big take action regarding the theme of plastic oceans.

ECO-VEGAN & ORGANIC

The plastic debris is being transformed into raw material, mixed with natural materials like cork, natural rubber and pineapple leaves fabric - Pinatex.  

All raw materials are sustainable. The natural rubber, cork and jute all are completely natural and organic. We wanted since the beginning to step aside from microfibers, leather and synthetics. We want to be clear, Zouri is probably the most ecologic sandal ever made.

 

ETHICAL & FAIRTRADE

It is in the heart of Portugal, Guimarães, that local artisans produce all ZOURI sandals.

They guarantee that every pair of sandals has the same detail and perfection. When you receive your sandals you will see a letter with all materials used in the sandal, quantities, and location of plastic and the name of the person that made your Zouri.

 

ZOURI - Sandals from the Ocean

Eco-Vegan Footwear. Made in Portugal.

 

 

 

All models are made with cork, natural rubber, Pinatex (pineapple leaves fibres fabric) and plastic litter from the ocean. Plastic collected April 2018, Esposende Portugal by 600 volunteers.

Comfortable and Stylish Vegan Sandal  

Available in four colours: black, brown, paprika and nature.

Sizes: 35-45

 

HOW TO CHOOSE SIZE

A. Put a sheet of paper on the floor and place it so that one end touches a wall.

B. Put your foot on the sheet making sure that the heel is against the wall.

C. Mark where your foot ends.

D. Measure with a ruler in cm. the distance between the heel and the tip.

E. With the measurement look at our table to know what is your perfect size.

 

 

Watch our interview with Smack Media:

 

YOUR SUPPORT IS IMPORTANT.

We are starting the production and we need to invest in materials and support the costs of transportation of the plastic litter from the beaches.

We offer a special product price for everyone who supports ZOURI in this phase.

story:
TNTON--The Smart & Interactive Glasses

A glasses with OV camera that records everything you want in live videos and images

TNTON glasses provides a revolutionary way for you to enjoy and capture every moment of your life. There is a mini OV camera on the frame, to record everything you want in videos and images, it's controlled by touch and voice. And what's more, we equipped multi-functional features to make it more interactive: WIFI & Bluetooth connection to share and upload easily, USB charging port for power supply, listening to music and picking up phone calls, Cloud platform to store. 

 

Removable lens

There are three different lens in every package: Bright color, Dark, Transparent color. You can choose the bright color len for outdoor, try the other two color lens when you are in the room. Make your life colorful.

 

At A GLANCE-- What you can do with TNTON

 

Mini OV camera

Our team has created  this Ingonic chip to guarantee a good performance camera to record high-quality videos and images. It's anti-shaking and water-resistant, you can wear it while you are cycling, running, even on rainy days. 

32 Bit XBrust CPU: Anti-shaking feature, make it possible to capture good photos when you are moving. 

MIPS: Low power consumption. TNTON's standby time is 5 days, and continuous using time is 4 hours.  

VPU: 720P resolution videos at 30 fps. It's the same specs as OnePlus 6,  to store your memory in high-quality videos and images

 

Take photos with cool gestures

This is our gesture control area, you can use every function of TNTON glasses with different gestures. it's cool to create a gesture to use it. 

 

Live videos

We all are thrilled and enjoy the feelings to interact with others, to share or learn something, and that's why our TNTON glass was created. Whether you are a parent to capture a happy moment of your children & family party, or you are an adventurer to record the beautiful scenery, even you are a gamer to share win moment, this TNTON glasses will be a good choice. 

Share it with your friends

Sync to your phone, share every image and video you record with your friends, anywhere and anytime you want. Or you can upload your favorite ones in the cloud for permanent storage.

 

USB Charging Port

There is a USB port on TNTON frame, you can charge it with a power bank, and full charge it at any time you're going to use it, It's convenience. Want to use it immediately? Just go and take it, That's OK!  And we will provide you with a USB earphone, so you can pick up the phone call or listen to music while you are wearing it. It must be cool.

Receive & Send Message

Once TNTON glasses is connected to your phone, it will send you a tip every time you receive a new message or email in case you leave something important behind. Of course, you can turn it off if it bothers you too much.

 

WIFI & Bluetooth connection

With the built-in WIFI/BT modular, TNTON could automatically connect to your phone hotspot, no cost of your phone traffic, to upload videos to your phone. the maximize 20M bps make your transmission smoothly. Meanwhile, you can speak and say Hi to Siri and Alexa to enjoy the convenience of smart voice assistant. 

 

How to use voice and gesture control 

 

Ergonomic design

The frame is adjustable. You can wear it at any length that suits you well. Its light frame is only 36g, your ear will not be painful after a long period of wearing.

 

Explore a new world with TNTON

3264x2448 Photos

 

1080P videos

 

Titanium alloy frame

It's durable and has a good thermal resistance performance. The camera still works well when your TNTON falls from 3 meters high. 

 

Water-resistant

IP54 material, you can wear it on snow, foggy, and rainy days. 

 

FAQs

1. What's the weight of TNTON?

The weight of one TNTON glasses is 36g. Its adjustable frame could suit you well.

2. What's your CUP and the amount of system memory?

TNTON CPU is M200, 1,2GHz, and system memory is 8G. 

3. Can I wear it when I'm swimming?

Just do it. Our TNTON is water-resistant, and it will OK for you to explore the underwater world. 

4. How long will it take to ship worldwide?

Once this campaign ends, we will fulfill the order and send you the tracking number. We will ship you according to the different countries and choose the right logistic ways to make sure you can get it within two weeks

5. Can I change the shipping address?

Yes. But remember to check your email when this campaign ends, because we will send a survey to confirm the shipping information with you. If there is any item you want to fix, just update it. 

6. What's your warranty?

We provide two years warranty in case there is any manufacture or shipping problem. If there is anything wrong with the product after you receive it, just contact our team, we will reach back to you in 4 hours  

 

Please help us spread the words, Thanks!

story:
Thank you for visiting!

Welcome to this exciting opportunity, you'll be very glad you found us... 

Now, we have a lot to talk about but first, who are we and what do we want to do?

Who Are We?

Scomadi Ltd is a British Company registered in 2005.

Formed through the partnership between Frank Sanderson of Scooter Innovation Ltd and Paul Melici of PM Tuning Ltd who between them have over 60 years of experience in the scooter industry. 

They have created this new scooter based on the iconic styling of the Series 3 Lambretta scooter models. 

The idea behind the brand was originally started in a garden shed by asking the question “How can we make a classic scooter capable of doing what modern scooters can do today?"

The solution? "Lets build “A Modern Classic”"

The truth is that many scooterists love the look and feel that the classic scooter style has to offer but unfortunately modern day riding dictates the need for a scooter that is better suited to the congested pot holed filled roads of today. 

So now, at the close of 2014 and with your help, they want to build on the 50cc model created from this idea and already in production and make it bigger and better.

6 times better to be exact.


Introducing the NEW Scomadi 300cc Scooter "A Modern Classic"


The new 300cc is to become the future of iconic looking scooters, with the build and reliability of modern day vehicles.

With your help Scomadi will be able to put this model into full production and create something that will go down in the history books as a true great.

--- Update note on quantities available ---

We have had a number of enquires as to how many scooter will be available in June 2015.  To set things straight the first 100 will be available by June 2015.  The 150 number is a typo on our part which when done could not be changed.  The reason we couldn’t correct the error is that as soon as an order is placed the sales board is frozen and you can’t adjust it….and as soon as we went live we had a pledges right way so it was frozen, this is done to stop adjustments after people have pledged and potentially caused issues.  We should have caught this but we didn’t so it is what it is.  We will put a note on the site today to clear this up.  Thank you.  The 100 in June will be the first production standard 300’s so anyone buying these will be in the first “100 group”.

Following the June run a further wave of production 300cc Scooters will be available starting around 3 months after this. 

From October 2015 we are offering a limited edition of 100 “Signature Series 300 Scooter’s”. These unique scooters are individually hand tuned and come with a performance exhaust, Fuel mapping and filter systems, sports suspension and adjustable braking as well as your very own personal colour scheme.  They will come with a unique serial numbered plaque on them donating the limited edition “Signature Series and will be hand signed by the co-founders.  If you require a full spec on these then please let us know by email, maybe give us your number and we can call you if you prefer.  Always happy to try and clear queries up.


--- What Is Our Goal? ---

Our goal in this is simple - to raise enough funding to put the 300cc into full production and making it available to the masses in quicker time. We are  able to make the Scooters in small quantities but with the your help we can make  them in the quataties needed and faster too.

We have thought about this long and hard and using our extensive knowledge of the business we know that if we can raise £200,000 we will be able to get this modern icon into full production and into people's hands.


The idea behind the IndieGoGo campaign - to see if the scooter community would get behind and support us so we would be able to produce more and faster to meet demands by the public.  You will appreciate we are a small company and don’t have the deep pockets of other larger automotive companies.  However, with or without the support of the IndieGoGo campaign the Scooters will be getting built and delivered – that is certain.


How Can You Help?

In order to do this we wanted to make this campaign something very special to be a part of.

So not only will you be helping make this 300cc model a reality but you will also have the chance to take a home pieces of EXCLUSIVE and LIMITED EDITION memorabilia - anything from a keyring or shirt, right the way through to the first ever Scomadi production prototype built in carbon (300cc model)

Here are just a few of the perks we have on offer - make sure you check all the others out, we have made sure there is something for everyone, no matter what level of involvement you can offer.


SANTA POD - The Home of European Drag Racing – A great Christmas idea for anyone.!

The ultimate track day event for bikers/scooterists. Santa Pod is the most famous drag racing track outside America, attracting the best drivers and race teams in European Drag Racing. Affectionately known as the 'POD', Santa Pod is the place to race!  Few motorsport venues can offer such thrilling 'close to the action'

Tucked away in the corner of Northwest Bedfordshire is one of the most famous racetracks in the world - Santa Pod Raceway.

There will be a VIP Scomadi marquee, corporate hospitality and a range of new scooters to view and some insights to what’s planned in the future. The founders will be on hand to answer all your questions.

Take a performance tuned 125cc and 300cc down the ¼ mile strip (2 or 3 runs depending on time and weather).

Have this recorded for a memory of the day. Also win a prize for the fastest time! If the weather permits watch a Scomadi go for a world ¼ mile record attempt.

What a great present, or why not treat yourself, it’s one of the PERKS - £300 for an unforgettable day at the “POD”.  Book yours now.

=================================================================

Two new “ProArt” Perks available now

The Scomadi 300 posed on a bridge and a picture of a Scomadi at Santa Pod, fantastic ProArt, These would look fantastic on any wall, check out the perks now.


Original Carbon Scomadi 250cc Scooter - Serial Number 1 (£29,000)


You Really Will Make a Difference

Anything you can contribute towards the goal will help bring this modern classic to production, you really will be a part of something that will be talked about for years to come, we appreciate each and ever donation that brings us all closer to our goal.

Thank you all for reading and we hope you can get involved - please feel free to share this with anyone and everyone that you know, even if you don't contribute the word of mouth will make the world of difference.

Use the share tools made available to you on IndieGoGo, post on your Facebook, Tweet about it and tell your friends, Scooter Clubs and Family...

Let's make history!

story:
About Wear a Pear Shoe Snaps

Wear a Pear Shoe Snaps remain attached to children's shoes so that they can easily snap to store and unsnap to wear. Teaching children this little habit will save families time and stress so they can quickly get to where they're meant to be. 

            

  1. Keep shoes "peared"
  2. Hang dirty cleats or shoes over the strap of bag (instead of inside)
  3. Color-coded to teach children left from right

UNIQUE Perks!

Because Wear a Pear was created by an artist (and mother of 3) there are exciting art perks in addition to the new Wear a Pear products! Check them out below, then pick a perk on the right of your screen and spread the word about Wear a Pear! 

NEW PERKS!!!

On That Farm $250

  • One of a kind, hand-painted 10 x 10" stretched canvas painting created for the lullaby series. Only 1 available.

BLACK FRIDAY PRINT DEAL $100

  • Receive one of ONLY 10 signed and numbered, 18 x 12” archival fine art prints on watercolor paper of the oil painting “A Drowning Noise” (original is sold). Plus 2 sets of Wear a Pear Shoe Snaps for ONLY $100.


Wear a Pear Shoe Snaps (of course!)

Pick your favorite color Wear a Pear shoe snaps and include them in baby shower, birthday and stocking stuffer gifts! (Available colors here: Shoe Snaps)

WAP Bands 

WAP Bands are our newest product. They are elastic headbands that *snap* in place to keep bangs and part in perfect shape! Choose your favorite style (available styles can be found here: WAP Bands)

No Crease Hair Ties

We sell these at Wear a Pear because we love them...and hope that you do too! (available styles here: hair ties)

   

Original Art & Limited edition prints! 

Because I'm an artist and creating is my strength (but spreading the word is yours), I've included some limited edition art in edition to Wear a Pear Products. This is work that has been exhibited in museums and galleries across the U.S. and Europe so it is for higher level perks, but will hopefully be exciting for some!

    

1. Mockingbird      2. Diamond Ring       3. Looking Glass

If that Mockingbird Won't Sing, 72x48", mixed media on sewn canvas

Raising Paper Dolls, acrylic on pieced canvas, 44 x 78"


Why We Need Your Help

Launching a new product is exciting and challenging. Our biggest concern is to get the word out so that people our looking for this product in stores and online. But we also need help getting through this first year of distribution as our patent costs are $5-7000. We've set goal at 4500, because every little bit will help! And most importantly, we hope that this campaign will help spread the word about this simple new parenting solution!

Awards & Grants

This was our first year in distribution, and we are now carried in twelve shops across four states and have received awards by both Baby Maternity and Creative Child Magazine, so we have a great start but need to keep us on the shelves! 

       

What Parents Say.


“No matter how great your shoe storage solution is – it’s almost a given that as the mad morning rush out the door ensues, one of the kids won’t be able to pair their shoes.” ~ Babyology

If you are a travel family like us, this is a must have! ~Tre Harrington, Nonperfect Parentin

“An ingenious set of shoe snaps which easily keep pairs of shoes together..” ~ Cassandra Roth, Bottlesoup.com

“They’re barely noticeable when on, but can save you the chaos of frantically digging for that lost shoe.” ~ Shecki, Greatly Blessed

“Even though they are meant for kids shoes, I have even used them on my own flip flops that I can never seem to find both of.”~Amy Bentley, Mommy Hotspot

“Who should get them? Anyone!” ~ScrunchyMama.com


Other Ways You Can Help?

Even if you can't support financially, you can still help by sharing through word of mouth, email and social media. Product awareness is key to success!

Thank you!!

story:
Short Summary

Welcome, my name is Paulino Pereira, a 3rd generation optician and founder of the Paulino Spectacles brand of hand crafted luxury vintage eyewear.

In today's world of mass production, commodity styles and outsourcing for the cheapest cost, I conceived the Paulino collection as a way of reviving the heritage and art of hand crafted eyewear in Portugal.

I have a passion for this heritage and, in particular, the creation of new frames using traditional methods. Frames that can arouse an emotion in the wearer because of the feel of the high quality acetate, the lush colours and the real sense of hand crafted artisanship found in each pair of spectacles or sunglasses.

Every frame is produced in the only remaining factory of its type in the Iberian Peninsula (there used to be over 40). With not a single computer in sight, each frame is tooled by hand using only the very finest organic acetate that ensures a level of finish matching the vision and design qualities of Paulino Spectacles.

The production process is arduous and take several days to complete. From the hand made moulds that start off the production process - using rasps, saws and files - through to the manually operated pantograph that cuts the frame one by one, and to the tumbling of the frames (a process that takes at least 48 hours) which smooths the surface and prepare them for hand polishing. It all takes time and makes for a high end product (frames retail for 322€ upwards), but the end result is worth it  - frames with their own unique personality and comfort, which mass production can never match in terms of that hand finished quality. Even the lenses are scratch/impact resistant anti reflex and come with ultra violet protection.

Feedback
The reaction I have had in a short space of time has been way beyond expectations. Monocle Magazine singled out Paulino Spectacles as one of the new elegant brands to look out for in future citing it as "fresh and exciting" in its Style Directory and without any major marketing activities, which costs money, the Paulino Collection can now be found in some of the finest boutique stores in London, Paris, Madrid, Barcelona and Lisbon - with more in the pipeline.

What we need and what you get
And so we feel it's time to take Paulino Spectacles to the next level. With your support, and with the target we set up we can obtain funding to shore up our working capital, buy raw materials, develop our packaging and produce greater amounts of frames which, as mentioned, takes a long time. If we exceed our target then the sky's the limit - trade fairs, greater online presence, more sophisticated marketing activities. So it will be great to receive your support in this journey. A journey which can take us to such diverse places as the USA, Canada, Hong Kong and even China, from where we have already had a great deal of interest.

And we want to make it worth your while so check out our perks. We can't offer gimmicks but we can provide the opportunity to own a pair (or more) of what I believe are the highest quality hand crafted frames and sunglasses at substantially reduced rates. Just pick the perk that suits you best.

A selection of Paulino Spectacles frames and sunglasses
(16 different models and over 68 colour combinations - YOU CAN SEE THE FULL SELECTION OF MODELS in the pdf attachments in the gallery)


 

 

 

Please feel free to visit the Paulino Spectacles website - at www.paulinospectacles.com -  where you can find more about the philosophy, history and manufacturing process of the frames, as well as see what the press says about us.

If you have any questions, just ask. It will be my pleasure to answer any queries you may have..

Thank you

story:
The High-Low Heel

My Story

My name is Russ Alaimo, and I'm the creator of the High-Low Heel. I'm an entrepreneur from Hallandale, Florida. My passion for creating  has led me to pursue an idea that began with a simple trip to the horse races. As my friend struggled to see over the crowd, I envisioned a collapsible shoe device that could easily transform her flats into high-heels. Today I'm in the process of getting my product licensed to a shoe company and hope to eventually create my own brand of footwear. I believe 100% in this product and my determination and persistence has kept my invention moving forward. Now I need your help. By contributing to this campaign, you will be helping me bring this unique idea to life.

About The High-Low Heel

The High-Low Heel features a collapsible high-heel stem that folds up underneath the shoe where it is concealed. My current prototype is featured in the video and explains how the device works. After extending the heel, a small covering is placed on the rear of the shoe for a great aesthetic. Since shoe companies are interested in seeing an excellent prototype when considering licensing, I plan to use funds generated through Indiegogo to build an improved model. 

The High-Low Heel & The American Cancer Society

In 2005, I lost my father to cancer. His death came only three weeks after his diagnosis, as there was no options for treatment. After witnessing the rapid deterioration of his health, I realized the need for more fail safes in the system in order to catch this diesease early enough to intervene. With more screening, lives can be saved. This is why I plan to donate a significant percentage of gross funds to The American Cancer Society following the licensing of the High-Low Heel.

By contributing to this campaign, you have an incredible charitable opportunity. When the High-Low Heel is licensed to a manufacturer, the percentage donated to the American Cancer Society will be significant. This means that by joining our team now, your contribution to this cause will become exponentially greater into the future as your investment assists me in licensing the shoe. I hope that every dollar invested into this campaign will translate to 100 donation dollars to the American Cancer Society. This cause is very important to me and I appreciate any contribution you can make. 

I Need Your Help!

Even if you are unable to contribute financially, you can still help me reach my goal. By making noise in your community and through your social media outlets, you can encourage others to join the campaign! Thank you for reading and I look forward to hearing from you.

story:
Please also take a look at our campaign updates, very exciting stuff is happening!


My Story.

Hello.  

I love toys.  Cool toys.  

I also love speed and performance.

A New Level of Quality in Your Kids’ Toys

Your children deserve toys that embody the best in aesthetics, technical design, and versatile fun. That’s why we created MiniMobiles. I've spent the past 25 years designing hundreds of products for other companies, and now it's time for me to launch my own line of amazing toys. 


Cool Toys that Perform Without Friction

MiniMobiles roll, spin, and twirl smoothly and quickly, and they look great doing it. Through German-manufactured precision bushings and bearings made from a proprietary, self-lubricating polymer, they are able to move with significantly less friction than any other toy on the market. That is the secret to their impressive motion.

MiniMobiles is supported by an award winning Italian transportation designer who is working on a wide range of upcoming MiniMobiles in 2015 and beyond. When not working on MiniMobiles, he develops concept cars for the automotive industry. He's an amazing asset to this new type of toy company.

Why We Need Your Help

MiniMobiles needs your help to take a big step closer towards production. We are now working on high-quality working prototypes from our original designs. After producing our helicopter, rocket, and car prototypes, we’ll be attending the New York Toy Fair in February 2015 and will display the new line of MiniMobiles to the world for the very first time.

Branching Out

We are forming partnerships with strategic players in the toy industry who will support manufacturing, safety-testing, sales, order-taking, returns, call centers, warehousing, distributing and advertising. But first, we need to get these three beautiful prototypes to the NY Toy Fair so that we can meet with key buyers and begin taking orders. This will be the catalyst that launches MiniMobiles into ultimate success, and allow us to get this line of toys tooled up (molds made) and into production.


What We Need & What You Get

We need $6,700 to CNC machine the three prototypes and have them professionally sanded, painted, polished, and assembled. We're working with a very high quality prototyping firm in China, and they're offering their best fees for their services. They've made prototypes for other high end toy manufacturers and they know what they're doing.

Get Involved in the Process

We want Indiegogo supporters to be on the private list of people we turn to for design feedback, ideas and decision making. You'll be able to log into my website and see the concept sketches, view the pictures, and watch the videos of MiniMobiles coming into fruition! It will be a form of selective crowd sourced participation. That's a priceless experience!

We're also offering authentic coupons redeemable for 75% off of an estimated $40 retail price when the MiniMobiles are ready for distribution. Our schedule will put us in production Q2 2015,

So, what if we don't receive all of our necessary funds?

We won't attend the NY Toy Fair without at least 3 prototypes, this is based upon input from industry insiders. To launch a line of toy vehicles requires at least 3 in the line. So, we'll use whatever funds we do receive to begin building prototypes as quickly as we can. But, we'll have to postpone the February NY Toy Fair and instead, shoot for the ASTRA show in June 2015 (if we have the 3 prototypes by then).


Risks & Challenges

I've received very positive feedback from the toy industry's key players. However, that doesn't mean these same players will place orders. They have to see, touch, and feel high quality prototypes before a decision like that can be made.

In the big picture, there are a myriad of risks with bringing a product to market. I've done it many times before and I know that the chances of success can be slim at times. However, I have successfully done it before and with your financial and strategic support, I can do it again!


Tell Your Friends

You should already see the enormous value of MiniMobiles. We’d like to serve as an inspiration for other entrepreneurs and startup enterprises to get out there and release their innovations to the world through the crowdfunding model. We know a lot of people who need a solution like this, so tell your friends to contribute so we can promote it to the world. Sharing this campaign on your social media profile is just as valuable to us as an actual financial pledge.


Thank You.

My lovely wife Lara and I thank you.  Our two fun kids, Bridget and Maxwell, also thank you.  This has been my dream and to have supporters out there like you just amazes me.  Thank you very much!!!

story:
Short Summary

Thank You for readind the summary of my project.:

  • My name is Raphael Ricardo,i'm a valuable member of the most popular internet marketing Forum ( WarriorForum).You can see my profile here http://www.warriorforum.com/members/ericando12.html 

  • My current blog is ; http://www.raphaelricardo.com/ 

  • i start this campaign to raise money to cover my next product launch.I work right now to launch a brand new Ecover software for authors,internet marketers,Kindle publishers and more.

  • According Publisher weekly,Ebooks bring over $1.54 Billion in Revenue http://www.publishersweekly.com/pw/by-topic/digital/retailing/article/59725-damage-estimate-shows-1-54-billion-in-e-book-revenue.html

What You will Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  1. Incredibly Easy And Powerful
  2. Create High-Converting eBook Covers For All Your Projects...
  3. ...Turn Your Cover To 3D In One Single Click
  4. Intuitive Drag And Drop
  5. Hundreds Of Built-In Graphics

The Impact

  • With this new Marketing tool,You can easily create in seconds your own custom Ecover
  • Start your Ecover Design agency and sell each ecover for $97 
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Benefits


Contribute Today and Save monthly Fees.
This Software will be sold to the public for $27/ month
Incredibly Easy And Powerful

Edit your pages with our 100% live editor. The unique eBook cover software means no need to refresh, preview or reload. You see the changes you make to your content and layout live on the page.


Create High-Converting eBook Covers For All Your Projects...


Choose a background, add your author name, a title and use some of the built-in effects and graphics to beautify your design. The sky is the limit with our eBook cover design software. From the get-go, we built Instant eBook Presence with high-resolution graphical elements so that you can project a professional brand instantly.


...Turn Your Cover To 3D In One Single Click

Once your design is ready, you may download it as a flat cover, or if you wish click on the 3D button to turn it into different types (hard cover, soft cover, CD box, etc) of 3D covers. Our eBook cover software is incredibly easy and simple to use.

Intuitive Drag And Drop

Create powerful eBook cover designs, even if you have zero design experience, with this custom ebook cover design software.

Simply launch the software and start designing (100% WYSIWYG).


Hundreds Of Built-In Graphics

Over 300 high resolution graphics, icons and logos to fit ANY cover design you might need.

These include labels, ribbons, avatars, offline business icons and more.

You can also share your amazing designs with using the incredible eBook cover design software.


Point, click and customize any of these templates in real-time. Our custom eBook cover design generator includes designs for various types of online and offline niches.  

Other Ways You Can Help 

If you don't have money to help,Please share this project with your friends on Facebook,Twitter and more.

Thank you for reading

Incredibly Easy And Powerful


Create High-Converting eBook Covers For All Your Projects...

Intuitive Drag And Drop

Hundreds Of Built-In Graphics

   The Impact 
With this new Marketing tool,You can easily create in seconds your own custom Ecover Start your Ecover Design agency and sell each ecover for $97  Make it real for people and build trust. 
  Benefits

Contribute Today and Save monthly Fees.
This Software will be sold to the public for $27/ month

Incredibly Easy And Powerful


Edit your pages with our 100% live editor. The unique eBook cover software means no need to refresh, preview or reload. You see the changes you make to your content and layout live on the page.

Create High-Converting eBook Covers For All Your Projects...

Choose a background, add your author name, a title and use some of the built-in effects and graphics to beautify your design. The sky is the limit with our eBook cover design software. From the get-go, we built Instant eBook Presence with high-resolution graphical elements so that you can project a professional brand instantly.

...Turn Your Cover To 3D In One Single Click
Once your design is ready, you may download it as a flat cover, or if you wish click on the 3D button to turn it into different types (hard cover, soft cover, CD box, etc) of 3D covers. Our eBook cover software is incredibly easy and simple to use.


Intuitive Drag And Drop
Create powerful eBook cover designs, even if you have zero design experience, with this custom ebook cover design software.
Simply launch the software and start designing (100% WYSIWYG).

Hundreds Of Built-In Graphics
Over 300 high resolution graphics, icons and logos to fit ANY cover design you might need.
These include labels, ribbons, avatars, offline business icons and more.
You can also share your amazing designs with using the incredible eBook cover design software.

Point, click and customize any of these templates in real-time. Our custom eBook cover design generator includes designs for various types of online and offline niches.  

Other Ways You Can Help 

 If you don't have money to help,Please share this project with your friends on Facebook,Twitter and more.
Thank you for reading

story:
The Mommy behind Skights:

Lil’ tights by Skights – “Dress fo Sock-cess”….  It was December, 2011 and I was out shopping with a friend of mine.  Her son was 16 months at the time and she wanted to purchase tights for him.  I was shocked because I remember when I was taking my eldest who is now 13,  (wow how the time flies) out in the winter I would put pyjama bottoms underneath his pants to keep his legs warm.  Stylish? No, however functional.  Unfortunately, my excitement quickly turned to disappointment when I found out my girlfriend planned on purchasing traditional “girls tights” in neutral colours to put on her son.  She told me she didn’t care and that her only concern was to keep her little “Bubba’s” legs warm. 

Prior to Skights, like every mom with boys, I had tried everything to keep them warm, from uncomfortable pj’s under their pants to over protecting them with snow suits.  When I saw my friend putting tights on her son I said to myself this was crazy and there had to be a better answer for ALL the moms of little boys. 

That night I started on the journey to create Skights: functional, practical, stylish and made in Canada. 

Skights are easy to put on, are warm, padded at the knee for little crawlers. If your little one is potty training and waits until the last second to tell you “it’s potty time” no need to worry, as they can be worn on their own your little one will not need to fuss with buttons or zippers that can be cumbersome at times.

They are also fantastic if your wee one refuses to sleep with blankets.  If your little one is anything like mine, there is nothing you can do to keep their blanket on them at night and in the morning their tiny toes would be “ice cold’.  Lil’ tights can be worn comfortably underneath any piece of clothing and thanks to their design are not easily removed by little hands.  Our tights are also great for the outdoors family.

Our local community, Ontario agrees with me.  Skights are now featured in 11 local stores and national media like “Parents Canada” have praised our product.

Now I need your help in getting Skights to moms and dads across Canada.





Why We Need Your Dollar Bills:

In creating Skights, I have taken a journey that 3 years ago I never thought was possible.  The process has pushed me beyond anything I thought I was capable of doing and allowed me to meet some pretty awesome people along the way.

I have had the pleasure to work with Mommy Bloggers from across the US and Canada, Retailers, Parenting Experts, Editors from local and national magazines or moms just like you.  The message has been consistent,” We love your product”, “I wish I had these when my kids we young” “How can we order them”. When I created Skights I was doing it for moms and dads everywhere.  Anything that can make the job a little easier is always welcomed.  Skights is where we are because of YOU, and once again we need YOUR help so we can continue along our journey. 

Funds provided by backers would be used to produce additional styles and colours as well as designs with a little feminine flare.

No man or should I say “woman” is an island and with your backing YOU join our team bringing us one step closer to making our dream a reality. 





The Impact: 

Skights was created for Moms and Dads just like you.  We ALL know how rewarding AND challenging parenting can be. As a mom it gives me great satisfaction to know I have created a product that will keep my little guy warm.  Let's face it, as parents we feel great when our kids do.  Lil tights by Skights is just that product, protecting your little ones from their knees to their toes.  Have your little one step out into the world

                                             "Dressed for Sock-cess”

 

Risks & Challenges

One of our challenges we face is creating Skights in colours and styles that appeal to our consumers.  Functionality was of the utmost importance  when I created this product however as a parent I understand baby's "gotta look good" and be comfortable.  Working with a manufactuer who has over 30 years experience in the hoisery industry  we believe we can continue to bring our customers fun, funky and functional wear. 


    Other Ways You Can Help:

    Money may not be an option for everyone however something as simple as spreading the word about us and our campaign is much appreciated.  Oh and why request for $999 in funds?  Well nine is my favourite number and I figured, third time a charm.

story:
We are happy to announce that almost all wallets are shipped!

Wir sind glücklich, alle Portemonnaies* der Kampagne ausgeliefert zu haben! In unserem Shop findet ihr alle Kampagnen-Designs des Paprcuts Geldbeutels, sowie richtig hübsche Kosmetiktäschchen / Mäppchen, Tabakbeutel & Handyhüllen aus dem Tyvek®!

We are happy  that we delivered all wallets of the campaign! In our shop you can find all paprcuts wallets, as well as beatiful cosmetic bags / pencil cases, tobacco pouches and smartphone cover made out of Tyvek®.


*We are still lacking of some adresses! If you contributed at this campaign and are wondering why you have not gotten a wallet - please check your mails or get in touch with us!

English subtitles for the video are available. ↑

Jump down for the English version of the text. 




Warum Crowdfunding?

Wir sind Paprcuts.de, ein komplett eigenfinanziertes Offline Start-Up. Unser Anspruch ist es, intelligentes Produktdesign, außergewöhnliche & individuelle Gestaltung sowie regionale & nachhaltige Produktion zu verbinden.

Am Standort Deutschland ist das allerdings nicht günstig. Wir müssen jede neue Designlinie in großer Auflage vorfinanzieren. Da wir neue Portemonnaies produzieren wollen, brauchen wir dafür eure Unterstützung. Helft mit, indem ihr eine Vorbestellung für euren neuen Geldbeutel jetzt und hier macht - zu unschlagbaren Preisen! Die Auslieferung erfolgt spätestens 1,5 Monate nach Kampagnenende.

Die Produktion ist gesichert - doch es geht weiter!


Die Designlinien 

Regular Size: Kleiner geht nicht! Hier haben wir uns an der Größe der Bankkarten orientiert. Das ist die bisherige Paprcuts-Größe! Ab den Zwanni muss man die Scheine falten. Dafür passt es wirklich in jede Hosentasche! (Aufgeklappt: 6,9 cm * 22 cm)

Big Size: Ab jetzt neu bei uns - weil uns schon einige Leute gefragt haben. Das Portemonnaie, in das man auch den alten Perso & den Fünfziger bekommt! Natürlich auch mit Münzfach. (Aufgeklappt: 7,8 cm * 22 cm)


Die Neon Designs (Regular und Big Size)


Welche Farbe magst du am liebsten? Verziert und zusammengehalten sind die ausgewählten Farbkombinationen mit einer Zickzack-Naht in Neonfarbe! Hiermit nochmal danke an unsere Lieblingsnäherin Swantje für die tolle Arbeit.
Die Neondesigns sind als Regular Size und als Big Size verfügbar.

Die Illustrationen (nur als Regular Size)

Die Sehnsucht nach dem Wasser begleitet den Menschen von klein auf. Mit diesen Portemonnaies hast du das Meer immer bei dir. 

Die Illustrationen haben wir nur als Regular Size.


All Time Classics (nur als Big Size)


Wir wurden oft danach gefragt: Das Portemonnaie, in das man auch den alten Perso & den Fünfziger bekommt. Ab jetzt mit unseren beliebtesten Motiven! Natürlich auch mit Münzfach.

Die All Time Classics haben wir nur als Big Size.



Das Portemonnaie




Geldscheine, Bank- und Businesskarten, ein Foto von der Ex. Mehr brauchst Du nicht und genau das macht die bunten Portemonnaies so praktisch. Wozu alles reinpacken, wenn man eigentlich nur feiern will?!

Wenn doch mal mehr mit soll? Easy! Das Material Tyvek®ist super dehnbar! Unsere Paprcuts wachsen demnach mit ihren Aufgaben und passen sich deinem Inhalt an. Große Scheine werden gefaltet

Kleingeld? Ist überbewertet! Wenn’s trotzdem rein muss, mit unserem superdünnen, hart praktischen Münzfach seid ihr ganz vorne mit dabei. Das verwendete Dual Lock Verschluss System ist viel klüger und ausdauernder als ein normaler Klettverschluss.




Unser Portemonnaie im Alltag


Unser Portemonnaie macht sich durch seine Kompaktheit super beim Weggehen, ob auf Parties & Festivals oder für's Kino. Auch als Begleiter bei allen Outdoorsportarten wie Snowboarden, Skaten oder Kiten eignet sich das Portemonnaie perfekt. Benutzen werdet ihr es irgendwann sowieso immer und jeden Tag, das könnt ihr uns glauben!

Die Produktion ist gesichert - doch es geht weiter!

Die Mindestproduktionsmenge der neuen Portemonnaies ist erreicht! Wir möchten uns dafür bei unseren vielen Supportern bedanken! Deswegen erhält jeder Unterstützer am Ende der Kampagne einen Rabattcode für unsere wunderschönen Kosmetiktaschen. Die Höhe des Rabattes steigt mit der Fundingsumme: 

15.000 € = 15 % Rabatt
16.000 € = 16 % Rabatt
.
,
50.000 € = Max. 50 % Rabatt!

Danke für die tollen Emails und Euer Engagement!

Made in Berlin. Not in 广东省.

Wir sitzen mitten in Berlin Kreuzberg. Hier entwerfen wir für euch die wunderschönen Paprcuts Accessoires! Um faire Produktionsbedingungen sicherzustellen und da es für uns Sinn macht unser Umfeld zu unterstützen, gilt bei unseren Produkten: Drucken, Falten, Nähen - alles wird in Berlin und Umgebung hergestellt und in enger Zusammenarbeit mit sozialen Projekten produziert.



Die Deals


Über Paprcuts.de

Schlanke Accessoires aus reißfestem und wasserfestem Tyvek. Federleicht, super dünn und reduziert - dafür steht Paprcuts.de. Wir sind eine Gruppe junger Verrückter aus Berlin, die ein Ziel verfolgen: wunderschöne, praktische und innovative Produkte produzieren. Zudem legen wir großen Wert auf Nachhaltigkeit. Daher ist Tyvek zu 100% recycelbar, sollten unsere Produkte irgendwann mal den Geist aufgeben.


Risiken

Der Produktionsprozess von Tyvek-Portemonnaies unter fairen Bedingungen in Deutschland ist kein einfaches Unterfangen. Da wir jedoch seit zwei Jahren Erfahrung in der Verarbeitung des Materials gesammelt haben, können wir garantieren, dass die Portemonnaies mit der entsprechenden Bestellmenge pünktlich ausgeliefert werden. 


Unser Zeitplan

August / September:
Kampagne Crowdfunding

September:
Organisation der Bestellungen, Einkauf des Materials und Start der Produktion. Danke schon mal vorab für eure Unterstützung!

Oktober:
Qualitätskontrolle, Verpacken und Ausliefern eurer Bestellungen. HipHipHurray!!

November:
Jede(r) UnterstützerIn bekommt einen Gutscheincode für Weihnachtsgeschenke. Dieser ist nur für unsere Crowdfunder, niemand anders bekommt diesen Special Deal!

Wenn das kein Grund zum Feiern ist!!


Let's stay in touch!



FAQ 

Für alle Anfragen, Ideen, Einladungen zum Eisessen, …nutzt bitte folgende Mailadresse: crowdfunding@paprcuts.de;

Wie kann ich mich für ein Design entscheiden? Ich habe einen Perk gekauft aber nicht die Möglichkeit gehabt, ein Design auszuwählen.

Keine Panik. Wir schicken innerhalb von 3 Tagen eine Mail rum. Darin kannst du über einen Link ganz einfach eintragen, welches Design du haben möchtest.

Wie lange hält das Portemonnaie und die Naht?

Ewigkeiten! Ehrlich! Ein paar unserer Freunde haben noch immer die ersten Prototypen, die mittlerweile schon 3 Jahre alt sind.

Jetzt mal Butter bei die Fische: Wie viel passt denn da überhaupt rein?

Einiges! Wir benutzen unser Portemonnaie jeden Tag. Locker passen rein: 10 Scheckkarten, 20 Businesskarten, 5 Taxiquittungen, 7 Restaurantbelege, Scheine, Münzen und ein paar Kassenzettel.

Wie kommen wir an eure Produkte, wenn wir einen Shop haben?

Für den Handel haben wir natürlich spezielle Einkaufspreise. Entweder bucht ihr das Shop-Paket direkt in den Deals auf der rechten Seite oder ihr kontaktiert Nils unter folgender Mail: post@paprcuts.de.

Was für ein Material ist das jetzt nochmal genau?

Es nennt sich Tyvek. Einfach mal Google fragen, die erzählen dir alles darüber.

Kann ich per Überweisung oder anderen Methoden bezahlen?

Ja, das geht. Bitte überweise das Geld auf folgendes Konto:

KtNr: 351 383 107 BLZ: 100 100 10 Institut: Postbank

IBAN: DE67 1001 0010 0351 3831 07 BIC: PBNKDEFF

und schreibe eine Mail an crowdfunding@paprcuts.de mitsamt deiner Adresse und deinem Designwunsch. Wir buchen dann den Perk für dich.


English Version


Why crowdfunding?

We are Paprcuts.de, a completely self-financed offline start-up. We have the goal to bring together intelligent product design, exceptional and individual style as well as regional and sustainable production processes.

Now, we would finally like to produce new designs! And therefore we need your support. You can help us pre-financing our new line of designs. The complete amount collected through funding will be used for the production of the wallets. We will send your wallet directly to your doorstep about a month after the end of the campaign.

Minimal production is funded - but it's not over yet!


The Designs 

Regular Size:  It is not possible to make it smaller! We oriented ourselves at the size of bank cards. That's the original Paprcuts-Size! The twenty Euro bill you have to fold. But it fits really in every trouser pocket! (Opened: 6.9 cm * 22 cm)

Big Size: This is new! A lot of people asked us - That's the wallet that can carry a 50 Euro bill unfolded. Because you wanted it. And we wanted it too. Naturally we made it with a coin pocket. (Opened: 7.8 cm * 22 cm)


Neon Design (available as Regular & Big Size)

Which color do you prefer? Decorated and held together by a neon colored stitching! We would like to thanks our favorite sewing worker Svantje for her awesome work. 

The neon editions are available in Regular Size and Big Size.

Illustrations (only as Regular Size)

The desire for the eternal water accompanies us our whole life. With this wallet you are carrying the sea in your pocket.

The illustrations are only available as Regular Size.


All Time Classics (only as Big Size)

A lot of people asked us for it: Get our all times classics as a big wallet and pack it with pictures, cards and whatever you like to carry with you.

The Classics are only available as Big Size.


Our Wallets


Our wallet is so compact, you don’t even notice it in your pants or handbag when you go out… partying, to festivals, the cinema or wherever. Plus: if you’re a fan of outdoor sports like snowboarding, skating or kite surfing our wallet is your ideal companion! Eventually you will use it always and every day, trust us with that!


Every day life with our wallet - it's beautiful!


Minimal Production is Funded - but it's not over yet!


The production of the new wallet designs is confirmed! We are very grateful for your commitment! Every supporter will get an exclusive voucher code for our cosmetic bags at the end of the campaign. The discount gets higher the more the funding amount grows:

€ 15,000  = 15 % Discount!
€ 16,000 = 16 % Discount!
.

.

€ 50.000 € = max. 50 % Discount!

Thanks again for all the feedback and support!


Made in Berlin. Not in 广东省.

We are based right in the middle of Berlin Kreuzberg. Here we design our super nice Paprcuts accessories for you. To guarantee fair production conditions and because it makes sense for us to support the local market, we stick to the following guidelines: Printing, folding, and sewing - everything is produced in Berlin and surroundings in close cooperation with social projects.


Funding



Paprcuts.de

Sleek accessories made out of tear- and waterproof tyvek. Ultra light, super thin and minimalistic - that’s what Paprcuts stands for. We are a team of young crazy people from Berlin who have one goal: to produce super nice, practical and innovative products. On top of that, sustainability is an important issue for us. Therefore is Tyvek 100% recyclable, once our products cease to perform at one point - which has barely been the case yet!



Risks

The socially and environmentally sustainable production process of Tyvek wallets made in Germany is not an easy task. However, since we already have two years of experience in the making of this product, we can guarantee that the wallets and the respective number ordered will be delivered on time. 

Timetable

August/September:

Crowdfunding campaign

September:

Organisation of orders, purchase of materials and start of production. Thank you all very much already for your valuable support!

October:

Quality control, packaging and delivery of your purchases. Hip, hip, hooray!!

November:

Every supporter receives a voucher code for Christmas presents. Those codes will only be made available for our crowdfunding supporters!


Let's stay in touch!


FAQ

For questions, ideas or remarks of any kind as well as for invitations to go for some icecream, please use the following email address: crowdfunding@paprcuts.de

How can I tell you which particular design I would like to have? I bought a perk, but couldn’t pick a design.

Don’t panic. We will send out an email every 2-3 days. It will contain a link where you can pick your favourite design.

What’s the life expectancy of this wallet?

It lasts forever! Really! Some of our friends are still using the first prototypes which are almost 3 years old.

Will the stitching last?

Yes! Really! Not lying! Not joking! Please have a look at: “What’s the life expectancy of this wallet”?

But seriously: How much can you actually fit in there?

A lot! We use the wallet every day. You can fit easily in there: 10 hard plastic cards, e.g. bank cards, 20 business cards, 5 taxi receipts, 7 restaurant receipts, bank notes, coins and a few counter receipts.

How can we get your products for our shop?

For the retail segment we have of course special purchasing prices. You either book the retail package on the right-hand side of this page or you send an email to Nils: post@paprcuts.de.

What kind of material was it again?

It is called Tyvek. Google will tell you everything about it!
