seine Kompaktheit super beim Weggehen, ob auf Parties & Festivals oder für's Kino. Auch als Begleiter bei
allen Outdoorsportarten wie Snowboarden, Skaten oder Kiten eignet sich das
Portemonnaie perfekt. Benutzen werdet ihr es irgendwann sowieso immer und jeden
Tag, das könnt
ihr uns glauben!

Die Produktion ist gesichert - doch es geht weiter!
Die Mindestproduktionsmenge der neuen Portemonnaies ist erreicht! Wir möchten uns dafür bei unseren vielen Supportern bedanken! Deswegen erhält jeder Unterstützer am Ende der Kampagne einen Rabattcode für unsere wunderschönen Kosmetiktaschen. Die Höhe des Rabattes steigt mit der Fundingsumme: 
15.000 € = 15 % Rabatt16.000 € = 16 % Rabatt.,50.000 € = Max. 50 % Rabatt!Danke für die tollen Emails und Euer Engagement!

Made
in Berlin. Not in 广东省.

Wir
sitzen mitten in Berlin Kreuzberg. Hier entwerfen wir für euch die wunderschönen Paprcuts
Accessoires! Um
faire Produktionsbedingungen sicherzustellen und da es für uns Sinn macht unser Umfeld zu
unterstützen, gilt bei unseren Produkten: Drucken, Falten, Nähen - alles
wird in Berlin und Umgebung hergestellt und in enger Zusammenarbeit mit
sozialen Projekten produziert.





Die Deals










Über
Paprcuts.de

Schlanke
Accessoires aus reißfestem
und wasserfestem Tyvek. Federleicht, super dünn und reduziert - dafür steht Paprcuts.de. Wir sind eine Gruppe junger Verrückter aus Berlin, die ein Ziel
verfolgen: wunderschöne,
praktische und innovative Produkte produzieren. Zudem legen wir großen Wert auf Nachhaltigkeit. Daher ist Tyvek zu 100% recycelbar, sollten unsere Produkte irgendwann mal den Geist
aufgeben.



Risiken
Der Produktionsprozess von Tyvek-Portemonnaies
unter fairen Bedingungen in Deutschland ist kein einfaches Unterfangen. Da wir
jedoch seit zwei Jahren Erfahrung in der Verarbeitung des Materials gesammelt
haben, können wir garantieren, dass die Portemonnaies mit der entsprechenden
Bestellmenge pünktlich ausgeliefert werden. 

Unser Zeitplan
August / September: Kampagne Crowdfunding
September: Organisation der Bestellungen, Einkauf des Materials und Start der Produktion. Danke schon mal vorab für eure Unterstützung!
Oktober: Qualitätskontrolle, Verpacken und Ausliefern eurer Bestellungen. HipHipHurray!!
November: Jede(r)
 UnterstützerIn bekommt einen Gutscheincode für Weihnachtsgeschenke. 
Dieser ist nur für unsere Crowdfunder, niemand anders bekommt diesen 
Special Deal!Wenn das kein Grund zum Feiern ist!!
Let's
stay in touch!


 








FAQ 

Für alle Anfragen, Ideen, Einladungen
zum Eisessen, …nutzt
bitte folgende Mailadresse: crowdfunding@paprcuts.de;
Wie
kann ich mich für
ein Design entscheiden? Ich habe einen Perk gekauft aber nicht die Möglichkeit gehabt, ein Design auszuwählen.
Keine
Panik. Wir schicken innerhalb von 3 Tagen eine Mail rum. Darin kannst du über einen Link ganz einfach
eintragen, welches Design du haben möchtest.
Wie lange hält das Portemonnaie und die Naht?
Ewigkeiten!
Ehrlich! Ein paar unserer Freunde haben noch immer die ersten Prototypen, die
mittlerweile schon 3 Jahre alt sind.
Jetzt
mal Butter bei die Fische: Wie viel passt denn da überhaupt rein?
Einiges!
Wir benutzen unser Portemonnaie jeden Tag. Locker passen rein: 10 Scheckkarten,
20 Businesskarten, 5 Taxiquittungen, 7 Restaurantbelege, Scheine, Münzen und ein paar Kassenzettel.
Wie
kommen wir an eure Produkte, wenn wir einen Shop haben?
Für den Handel haben wir natürlich spezielle Einkaufspreise.
Entweder bucht ihr das Shop-Paket direkt in den Deals auf der rechten Seite
oder ihr kontaktiert Nils unter folgender Mail: post@paprcuts.de.
Was
für
ein Material ist das jetzt nochmal genau?
Es nennt sich Tyvek. Einfach mal Google fragen, die erzählen dir alles darüber.
Kann
ich per Überweisung
oder anderen Methoden bezahlen?
Ja,
das geht. Bitte überweise
das Geld auf folgendes Konto:
KtNr:
351 383 107 BLZ:
100 100 10 Institut:
Postbank
IBAN:
DE67 1001 0010 0351 3831 07 BIC: PBNKDEFF
und
schreibe eine Mail an crowdfunding@paprcuts.de mitsamt deiner Adresse und
deinem Designwunsch. Wir buchen dann den Perk für dich.




English Version





Why crowdfunding?
We are Paprcuts.de, a completely self-financed
offline start-up. We have the goal to bring together intelligent product
design, exceptional and individual style as well as regional and sustainable
production processes.
Now, we would finally like to
produce new designs! And therefore we need your support. You can help us
pre-financing our new line of designs. The complete amount collected through
funding will be used for the production of the wallets. We will send your
wallet directly to your doorstep about a month after the end of the campaign.
Minimal production is funded - but it's not over yet!


The Designs 
Regular Size:  It is not possible to make it smaller! We oriented ourselves at the size of bank cards. That's the original Paprcuts-Size! The twenty Euro bill you have to fold. But it fits really in every trouser pocket! (Opened: 6.9 cm * 22 cm)
Big Size: This is new! A lot of people asked us - That's the wallet that can carry a 50 Euro bill unfolded. Because you wanted it. And we wanted it too. Naturally we made it with a coin pocket. (Opened: 7.8 cm * 22 cm)

Neon Design (available as Regular & Big Size)

Which color do you prefer? Decorated and held together by a neon colored stitching! We would like to thanks our favorite sewing worker Svantje for her awesome work. The neon editions are available in Regular Size and Big Size.


Illustrations (only as Regular Size)







The desire for the eternal water accompanies us our whole life. With this wallet you are carrying the sea in your pocket.
The illustrations are only available as Regular Size.

All Time Classics (only as Big Size)

A lot of people asked us for it: Get our all times classics as a big wallet and pack it with pictures, cards and whatever you like to carry with you.

The Classics are only available as Big Size.





Our Wallets









Our wallet is so compact, you don’t even notice it in your pants or handbag when you go
out… partying, to
festivals, the cinema or wherever. Plus: if you’re a fan of outdoor sports like snowboarding, skating
or kite surfing our wallet is
your ideal companion! Eventually you will use it always and every day,
trust us with that!

Every day life with our wallet - it's beautiful!











Minimal Production is Funded - but it's not over yet!





The production of the new wallet designs is confirmed! We are very grateful for your commitment! Every supporter will get an exclusive voucher code for our cosmetic bags at the end of the campaign. The discount gets higher the more the funding amount grows:
€ 15,000  = 15 % Discount!€ 16,000 = 16 % Discount!.
.
€ 50.000 € = max. 50 % Discount!Thanks again for all the feedback and support!

Made in Berlin. Not in 广东省.
We are based right in the middle of
Berlin Kreuzberg. Here we design our super nice Paprcuts accessories for you.
To guarantee fair production conditions and because it makes sense for us to
support the local market, we stick to the following guidelines: Printing,
folding, and sewing - everything is
produced in Berlin and surroundings in close cooperation with social projects.



Funding










Paprcuts.de
Sleek accessories made out of tear-
and waterproof tyvek. Ultra light, super thin and minimalistic - that’s what Paprcuts stands for. We are a team of young
crazy people from Berlin who have one goal: to produce super nice, practical
and innovative products. On top of that, sustainability is an important issue
for us. Therefore is Tyvek 100% recyclable, once our products cease to perform
at one point - which has
barely been the case yet!



Risks
The socially and environmentally sustainable
production process of Tyvek wallets made in Germany is not an easy task.
However, since we already have two years of experience in the making of this
product, we can guarantee that the wallets and the respective number ordered
will be delivered on time. 
Timetable
August/September:
Crowdfunding campaign
September:
Organisation of orders, purchase of
materials and start of production. Thank you all very much already for your
valuable support!
October:
Quality control, packaging and
delivery of your purchases. Hip, hip, hooray!!
November:
Every supporter receives a voucher
code for Christmas presents. Those codes will only be made available for our
crowdfunding supporters!

Let's stay in touch!





FAQ
For questions, ideas or remarks of
any kind as well as for invitations to go for some icecream, please use the
following email address: crowdfunding@paprcuts.de
How can I tell you which particular
design I would like to have? I bought a perk, but couldn’t pick a design.
Don’t panic. We will send out an email every 2-3 days. It
will contain a link where you can pick your favourite design.
What’s the life expectancy of this
wallet?
It lasts forever! Really! Some of
our friends are still using the first prototypes which are almost 3 years old.
Will the stitching last?
Yes! Really! Not lying! Not joking!
Please have a look at: “What’s the life expectancy of this wallet”?
But seriously: How much can you
actually fit in there?
A lot! We use the wallet every day.
You can fit easily in there: 10 hard plastic cards, e.g. bank cards, 20
business cards, 5 taxi receipts, 7 restaurant receipts, bank notes, coins and a
few counter receipts.
How can we get your products for
our shop?
For the retail segment we have of
course special purchasing prices. You either book the retail package on the
right-hand side of this page or you send an email to Nils: post@paprcuts.de.
What kind of material was it again?
It is called Tyvek. Google
will tell you everything about it!

story:
SEE SEATING CHART BELOW WHEN YOU SELECT A PERK

VENUE IS GUARANTEED so buy your tickets NOW on the Early Bird Discount!!


Ultimate Ninja Athlete Association brought to you by Hammer Strength Apparel is a Ninja Obstacle course competition series held at gyms across the country.  Ninja Athletes have been competing at these gyms to qualify for the Championship Finals ,  which will be on August 6, 2016 at Santa Ana Star Center.   You have seen many of these athletes on TV , now come and watch them LIVE as they compete for over $27,000 and the title of the ULTIMATE NINJA ATHLETE !!   Purchase your early bird tickets now and get the best seats !

All of your donations include tickets to the event and many more perks.  Lets get these well deserved athletes that have spent long hours in training to reach the finals and give them an awesome venue to compete for the chance to become the First ULTIMATE NINJA ATHLETE !!!

ALL TICKETS AND OTHER PERKS WILL BE AVAILABLE AT SANTA ANA STAR CENTER WILL CALL WINDOW with your name on the day of the Event- August 6, 2016.   We will personally deliver ALL Tickets donated to Children or Families, directly to the Charities.   For directions to Santa Ana Star Center - www.santaanastarcenter.com 


www.hammerstrengthapparel.com



We will hold the UNAA Final Championships at Santa Ana Star Center on August 6, 2016 , located in a suburb of Albuquerque called Rio Rancho, New Mexico.  There you will find one of the top Venues around that hold over 7,000 people.  There is not a bad seat in the house and we hope to fill the venue with screaming fans rooting for their favorite Ninja Athlete to become the first Ultimate Ninja Athlete.


All 30 gyms across the country will qualify hundreds of athletes to narrow down to the Top 120 UNAA Athletes to move on to the Final Championships. We have both a men’s and women’s class and will award the Top 5 finalist in each class, totaling $27,000 in cash awards.

With the huge popularity of Ninja Gyms popping up all across the country we wanted to be sure to have a place for these athletes to put their training to use in our Area and Regional Qualifiers.  Anyone can join the UNAA and compete in the Area Qualifiers for a chance to move on to the Regionals and ultimately to the Finals.

Unfortunately, being our first year, it is difficult to rent such a large venue and also to build the massive Ninja Obstacle course for our Final Championships.  Please Help us to raise the money needed to bring the qualifying athletes to the Santa Ana Star Center on one of the toughest obstacle courses ever built and to compete in front of thousands of fans that will be cheering them on.



So why did we start UNAA?  Well,  we started it based upon the TV show American Ninja Warrior.  We all love competing and many of us submitted our videos to be on the show.  Unfortunately many of us did not get picked.  We later found out that over 50,000 videos were submitted and only 700 get picked to be on the show.  So that left 49,000 plus athletes that had been training and preparing with no place to compete.  Many gyms across the country were having local competitions,  but we wanted to have a big National qualifying series competition with a  large payout.

So ,  this is where We come in.  Who are we?  Charlie Mitchell is the COO and Head Official.  He is passionate about the sport and is the manager at our local gym in Albuquerque called Ninja Park.  He has a military and fitness background.   My name is Bob Clark, the CEO and Director and I come from a background in sales and business ownership.  I currently work at a local TV station here in Albuquerque and I also own a Motocross track called Sandia MX.  I have been in the promoting business for over 20 years and  between Charlie and myself we have conducted over 200 events from Motocross and Mud Bogs to Concerts and 5K Mud Runs to Ninja Warrior obstacle course events.


We still love the show American Ninja Warrior and because of the show ,  it allows us the opportunity to open up the UNAA for all those athletes that not only did NOT make the show,  but also for those that are on the show and want another option in competition to win some big money for all their hard work and training.  We are starting this first year with $27,000 total payout for Men and Women classes through Top 5.  Our ultimate goal and dream would be to one day provide enough revenue to the Top 10 athletes ,  that they could actually make a living doing what they are so passionate about. 

For more details on the UNAA go to www.ultimateninja.net

All of your donations include tickets to the event and many more perks. 

ALL TICKETS AND OTHER PERKS WILL BE AVAILABLE AT SANTA ANA STAR CENTER WILL CALL WINDOW with your name on the day of the Event- August 6, 2016.   We will personally deliver ALL Tickets donated to Children or Families, directly to the Charities.   For directions to Santa Ana Star Center - www.santaanastarcenter.com

story:
In ALQUIMIA we are committed to make the world a better place by empowering mothers through convenient clothing to accomplish extended breastfeeding while being free to carry out an exciting life. 

 

As we started to prepare for the arrival of our first baby, we wanted to learn everything that we could about how to better raise our child. During that process we found that breastfeeding was a crucial part of the process, We also faced the problems that mothers all around the world face.

There was no clothing line that offers the mothers the possibility of comfortably feed their baby without sacrificing style. 

With your help, we will launch a clothing line specifically designed to make the experience of breastfeeding as positive as possible while allowing the mothers to shine with style. 

 

What We Need & What You Get

We need funding to launch our first production batch at economical costs. We have so far produced a few prototypes, but in order to buy the materials (fabrics, buttons and accessories), start the shop where we will be manufacturing and arrange the logistics of delivery to the USA, we need a minimum batch size.

By funding ALQUIMIA through Indiegogo, you will receive the product of your choosing from our site. Funders can choose multiple types of Perks. There are small perks like our stickers and water bottles that will highlight their support of the breastfeeding effort of mothers all around the world. Funders can also request specific clothing items and they can also order packages in order to prepare or help a loved one to get ready for the breastfeeding life.

We are 100% committed to make ALQUIMIA a reality that will eventually support millions of moms to have a more satisfying nursing experience. That is why if we do not reach our target on this campaign, we will make sure all funders receive their perks. 

 

    *Once the order is placed you will recieve an email asking for sizing options.

     

    The Impact

    Breastfeeding is the most valuable gift any one human can give to another one... and it happens at a massively large global scale. However, in many parts of the developed world, conditions are starting to push mothers towards importantly deficient alternatives. 

    We want to put a dent into this trend by changing the conditions. We want to allow the convenience tradeoffs for mothers to be reduced so they are more likely to follow the beautiful love path of breastfeeding. 

    We found that this is the best way to put our team´s business management and marketing experience into making a difference for the generations of the future that are just now arriving to this world.

     

     

      Risks & Challenges

      There are always plenty of risks to manage when starting a small business. Every process of the company may present hidden challenges that did not come up during the initial planning stages. 

      Knowing this and being certain that we are not perfect, we have discussed our business plan and our operational process with industry experts in order to discover the "unkown unknowns". We have dig deep into the process of fabric procurement, fashion design, manufacturing, distribution, online retail and online marketing. 

      The complete list of the risks associated is longer than this whole document, however we can highlight the main risks and briefly mention the containment plan for each:

      Product and branding design not fitting with target

      • We have talked to dozens of mothers interested in breastfeeding about the design principles and styles. The indiegogo campaign will be the first test of fire to see if there is acceptance of the designs outside of our semi-immediate social circle.  
       

      Demand uncertainty

      • Starting through indiegogo will allow us to control and plan for the demand in advance. We will closely monitor the campaign statistics and in that way we will be able to better predict how much production will be required by the end of it. If demand is higher than expected, we will be able to limit the amount of request for any given model; if demand is small, we will be able to produce a small production batch so we do not end up deep in the red.
       

      Manufacturing quality  

      • It is crucial for us that ALQUIMIA clothes are of the highest quality. We have carefully selected the people that will handle the manufacturing based on their professional reputation and sample products. We have worked with them in several rounds of prototype productions to make sure that the quality are in every detail of every item so that we do not encounter problems in the first production run.
       

        Other Ways You Can Help

        If for some reason you cannot fund at this moment, you can still do plenty to help the breastfeeding cause we are supporting. Please get the word out about what we are doing by: 

        Sharing via social media Sharing via social media 

        • Sharing this site via social media.
        • Recommending this personally to people that might be interested in ALQUIMIA.
         
        Thank you! We send you all of our love!
         
         
         
         
         
         
         
         
         

        Special thanks to:

         

        Make up

        Marian Aguilar

         

        Video Postproductión

        Jesus Varela for Nautilus

         

        Director, Producer & Colorgrading

        Juan Van Dusen Beristain for Nautilus 

        juan.vandusen@gmail.com 

         

        Photography

        Fer Juaristi. Wedding Photographer http://ferjuaristi.com/

         Photogarage by Ale Menchaca

         

        Location

        Sophia Pan & Bistro 

        http://sophiapanybistro.com/

Other Ways You Can Help
If for some reason you cannot fund at this moment, you can still do plenty to help the breastfeeding cause we are supporting. Please get the word out about what we are doing by: 
Sharing via social media Sharing via social media 

Sharing this site via social media.
Recommending this personally to people that might be interested in ALQUIMIA.

 
Thank you! We send you all of our love!
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Special thanks to:
 

Make up
Marian Aguilar
 
Video Postproductión
Jesus Varela for Nautilus
 
Director, Producer & Colorgrading
Juan Van Dusen Beristain for Nautilus 
juan.vandusen@gmail.com

Fer Juaristi. Wedding Photographer http://ferjuaristi.com/

http://sophiapanybistro.com/

story:
We are a new and ambitious watch label from Germany and our vision is to bring a sustainable change to the watch industry. LIAN & MÉZ is not just a brand name, it is an ethical statement within fashion industry against animal violence, pollution and harm to the environment. „Fifth Season“ collection sums up our brand values and ethics by offering stylish wrist watch produced in responsible and sustainable way. We act to make difference and it does, because „Sustainability can not be measured, it has to be worn.“

Our straps are made in Germany from the innovative material Piñatex. The advanced technologies are used to create a totally sustainable, high-performance, natural textile. Piñatex is better known as the perfect eco-friendly, vegan leather substitute. 

BENEFITS OF PIÑATEX 

It is totally sustainable, high performance, durable material.

Neither animals nor pineapples are harmed to produce Piñatex as it is made from pineapple waste.

Piñatex is vegan and PETA certified.

Neither harmful chemicals like chrome are used to dye the fabric nor fertilizers or pesticides are required to produce Piñatex.

Piñatex is produced with people in mind providing extra income of pineapple growing countries as it is fair trade.

You can choose from five different colors of straps for your watch.

The straps are easy to change and remove, you can switch them with a snap.

We believe in precise engineering, so to ensure premium quality at the heart of every watch, we are working together with a leading German watch manufacturer. Every single watch is tested, quality assured and assembled by professionals. German craftsmanship and its long-standing reputation of being a country of excellent engineering with high-quality standards in watch industry ensure us in delivering reliable, durable and sophisticated watch. Buy the watch online and get two year warranty. 

WATCH SPECIFICATIONS

​Sapphire Crystal Glass

Handmade in Germany

Premium 316L Stainless Steel

Water Resistant 5 ATM

Swiss Made Movement

Sophisticated design 

Piñatex straps 

All our watches can be customized according to your preferences. You can combine any case, any dial and any strap to create your own, unique, eco-friendly and sophisticated watch. 

GO TO OUR CONFIGURATOR: CLICK HERE

Shortly after the campaign we will contact you to confirm the final details of your watch.

All our watches come in two sizes 36 and 40 mm to fit your wrist the best way possible.

"The new Germany based watch brand, LIAN and MÈZ, has elevated the standards to the next level: Environmental sustainability coupled with the Swiss Watch Movement." Aditi, USA

"Last time I wore a watch was exactly three years ago. I then went vegan and gave up on all non-sustainable products. It feels great to find an option that is not only eco-friendly, but also very fashionable. Something I can wear every day. Guilt-free!''  Valeria, Miami 

"A LIAN & MÉZ watch is a stunning, comfortable and timeless alternative to regular hide leather watches." Nataly, London 

For nearly 2 years we have been working on our vision to ensure that every step of our supply chain delivers high quality watches with the lowest possible impact to the environment.

Our contribution is to make the world a better place without compromising fashionable design or quality.

You too can share our vision and support us by becoming the owner of very first sustainable, eco-friendly and sophisticated watch by LIAN & MÉZ. Go green with us today!

We need your full support today to:

Place our first large order

Produce the tooling for our production

Work on new and eco-friendly ideas and designs

Create a positive impact 

Support pineapple growing countries

Pick your perk, become a backer and be a part of our forward thinking movement.

We believe that environment awareness is the key to the future in the fashion industry. You can help us grow to offer even more eco frindly products that are responsible, stylish and high-quality.

Shortly after the campaign ends we will contact you to confirm the final details  about the style and delivery of your watch. Free shipping worldwide.

CLICK HERE TO CONTACT US

 

We may be beginners on Indiegogo, but we and our manufacturing partners have years of experience in the industry. We are aware our project is complex and that there are always unforeseen issues, but we have anticipated and planned for potential risks and have built a rock-solid production and delivery plan.

Firstly, our production is quite advanced and you can be very confident about our capacity to provide high-quality products on time. We spent over 2 years designing, developing, and receiving finalized samples.

Secondly, we have very skillful and professional suppliers and do not anticipate delays to our timeline. However, if by chance anything unexpected happens, we promise to keep you informed, both during the campaign and afterwards.

Thanks for all the support! We are excited to take this step with you - the Indiegogo community!

story:
The Picture above consists of two samples we will be creating! 

Our Story

We are a start-up family owned business located in Woodhaven, NY. We specialize in large volume orders and love the idea of making personalized balloon favors. Our idea stemmed on the constant trends in the market right now of lack of personalization and costly gifts, centerpieces, etc. We want to provide affordable and quality items for everyone.


The Impact

Our campaign is based on creating new innovative products that are smaller than our current model to make affordability more possible as well as create quality gift baskets for a reasonable price. If our campaign is unsuccessful, we cannot continue to expand our ideas.


What We Need & What You Get

What we are asking for: 

We are asking for $1000. This money will be used directly for bulk supplies and marketing material for "Gifts in a Balloon" and "Home-made Gift Baskets". 


Funding Sources: We currently run a virtual company and all funding has come from personal savings for set-up costs. We currently run an online store and are slowly creating momentum via social networking and referrals.

If we do not meet our goals in this campaign, we won't be able to introduce our products at this time, but hopefully in the long-run we can utilize some of our profits to expand. 


What you get: 

We want to provide samples of the contents in our products to individuals who help our campaign a reality.

This includes brownies, cookies, chocolate pops - or samples of the actual product.


Other Ways You Can Help

We ask that you help share and spread the word about our campaign in order to meet the 60 day challenge!

story:
Hi everybody my name is Mats Helge. My wife, Ami and I currently run a company called HTM Media Group or its subdivision that is more commonly known as HyBrid Foto. We are a small company operation out of southern Sweden specializes in extreme sports, mainly paintball and currently we have some of the biggest names in paintball on our list of supported teams.

 

This DVD is something that lies very close to my heart as a lot of kids as well as adults who do not have the funds (in the economy that currently afflicts most countries around the world) to attend clinics to learn to become better players. What this DVD will do for you is to give you an in depth breakdown of how you can become the next star athlete. Fedorov breaks it down in such an easy way that anyone can understand it and mimic it. Fedorov and ourselves have actually paid for this whole project out of our own pocket. Many people think that we have had major sponsors etc That is not true.

What is true is the fact that the entire film is more or less done. So you might be wondering why we would need your money before the product is put out on the market? Easy making the product is only the first part now comes the marketing, the production of the DVD’s, and the distribution. This is what we need your help with.

Without you this can not be done and we are doing this for you. The DVD will be made available as a digital download and as a DVD 

 

 

What We Need & What You Get

Like I have described before, our funding is going towards the making of DVD’s and also towards the marketing.  This is a professional produced DVD meaning that they will be sent out and pressed just like any movie you would buy at a store. This is not a cheap process and you have to quite a large quantity at once. There are still some things we wish to record but we need to rent certain equipment to give the DVD that small extra push that we believe can benefit everyone.

We also have the marketing portion. We live in Sweden and this DVD is something that we have planned to market at the PSP World Cup, Millennium Series but as we all know a booth at these events is not cheap but it is necessary.  We will have posters and other goodies such as t-shirts with us at the events so if you have funded us big or small your getting something right then and there.

$5000 is our minimum goal as we are trying to be realistic. If we get more then 5000$ we can accomplish a great deal more and look to future projects. But with this money we can still make our goal and provide you with the best and most up to date training DVD the market has ever seen.

In the event we do not reach our goal of $5000 we will still put the money to good use and focus on the production of the DVD’s and continue our search for funding for marketing and distributing before the release date of early 2013.

You will also have regular updates and small sneak previews through our Facebook page so fear not you can always have 100% insight of what’s going on.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you feel that you can’t contribute, you are wrong. Even though you might not have the funds to donate money you can still share the word! Spread this link to anyone and everyone make this video a success everyone will benefit from it. If it goes really well there are plenty of surprises no matter how big or small your contribution has been!

story:
Hi, I'm Alpha Talk.

I am a fragrance designer who has created custom handmade fragrances for celebrities such as Yandy Smith (Love & Hip Hop NY), Cassie (Bad Boy Entertainment), Ledisi (Grammy nominated singer), Ramona Rizzo of (VH1 Mob Wives) and more. 

I have been creating perfumes since June of 2011, but what I enjoy most is being able to help and positively influence people. 

What I have realized is that so many of us aren't getting all the encouragement and support we need to thrive in this world, so I decided to take action by using my personality, experiences and fragrances to create lasting impressions on people.

Your sense of smell has the most direct connection to the center of your brain which directly controls emotion in human beings, so I figured that if I could make people smile with their noses, why not make them smile with their hearts?

I need your help to build more awareness of Alpha Talk and encourage more people to chase their passions while living peacefully. By assisting me, you enable me to continue blessing and inspiring others in many different ways. 

 

Who is Alpha Talk?

People are always asking me: "How did you get into fragrances?". My answer to that question now is: I want to be able to make people smile without being near them, I want them to feel of importance when they experience my products and services. 

We all are people, not just customers and clients. Each fragrance product is made to order for guests.

I am a Taurus, and with me being an Earth sign for the Bull, I regard my self as a "Protector of the Earth". I am an active supporter of the Children of the Earth Foundation. This non-profit foundation teaches youth (and adults, don't worry) how to raise their awareness and build connection with the planet Earth by teaching them how to thrive off of our planet's natural resources.


The Products


The B.E.D Fragrance


This UNISEX fragrance was designed by me to work with the laws of attraction to help you Become. Everyone's. Desire. It is designed to attract people to you who will help, encourage and uplift you. 


-Available in: 50mL Eau De Parfum-


Alpha Talk T Shirt

Simple and clean design cotton shirt. The logo is me with my signature "one glove" (there's a story behind the glove, you'll find that out soon). the ladies and gents love the shirt, so will you!

Available in: S | M | L


Bespoke Fragrance Consultation

When is the last time you had a signature fragrance created just for you based off your personality and favorite scents? Get treated as a VIP Celebrity guest as I use my unique methods and expert nose to create you a luxurious fragrance experience. No worries, everything is done online, no need to meet in person.

Imagine how it would feel to answer the question when your friends and family ask you what perfume you're wearing?

P.S. "Bespoke" is just a fancy and old English term for "custom".

-Full Service consultation includes custom scent in bottle with premium packaging-

-Fragrance available in 50mL and 100mL Eau De Parfum-


What are people saying?


-Yandy Smith (Love & Hip Hop NY)

"I love love love it. I want more!!!!"


-Tiffany from NJ​

"-OMG.. Your perfume is the best hands down...I am so in love with this unique scent...I don't even spray my other ones anymore...EVERY ONE THAT SMELLS IT LOVES IT.... I HOPE I CAN GET YOU MORE CLIENTELE BECAUSE YOU DESERVE IT!


-Noam from MD

​Lovely to meet you at the Lemonade Heroes event yesterday. I love your style and perfume. My girlfriend also seemed to like the fragrance: well done! I look forward to connecting. All the best, Noam. 

Alpha Talk supporters


Why Do They Support?

I would say it's because I'm a consistent source of positive energy and support. On top of that I give out some really cool tips and inspirational messages such as below...




I am thankful for your support whether you purchase a perk or not. This is my passion, I love doing this for you. Whether you become a new supporter or are just sending to your friends and family, your help is greatly appreciated. 


Thank You.

Sincerely,

Alpha Talk | Celebrity Fragrance Designer

story:
Hello! 

My name is Murphy Byrne and I’m a photographer based out of Minneapolis. This November, a trip to Guatemala rocked my world. I picked up my first camera freshman year of college with the newspaper staff of Vanderbilt University and haven't put it down since. Armed with my degrees in Sociology and Anthropology, and my passion for photography, I am pursuing a career in photojournalism; capturing moments, emotions, and the human condition. I have been asked by the non-profit Pur[shoe]ing Joy to return to Guatemala to tell the greater story of their mission to families in need. Through your support, I hope to raise the $3,500 needed to make this important work possible.

Check out images from Guatemala in the Gallery section above, or on my website http://murphybyrnephotography.com/?page_id=181.

My Guatemalan Story & Pur[shoe]ing Joy Opportunity:

In November, I was invited to photograph a wedding in Antigua, Guatemala. When I agreed, I had no idea just how life changing the experience would be. The time I spent with native Guatemalans made me realize what a special and unique country I was visiting. Many of these people had so few resources and opportunities, yet I was always welcomed with open arms and generosity. Interacting with the locals was a very grounding experience and made me determined to help make a difference in Guatemala.

Then, by complete chance, I met a group of young college graduates running a newly-started non-profit called Pur[shoe]ing Joy (http://on.fb.me/1dKk1OR). This organization began last year when a friend selflessly gave her shoes to a young boy, allowing him to go school. This small act sparked the creation of Pur[shoe]ing Joy, which aims to help other Guatemalans “pur[shoe]” their dreams. In February of 2014, Pur[shoe]ing Joy plans to bring over 1000 pairs of shoes down to Guatemala. Every pair of shoes donated allows a child to pursue an education and a better life.

Pur[shoe]ing Joy is a young organization with limited resources,and being able to share the project with the world will have a huge impact on its success. Using my skills as a documentary-style Photographer and Videographer, I will chronicle the journey the shoes make this February, from their initial donation in the United States, to the feet of Guatemalans. Through my imagery, I will demonstrate the actual impact a donation makes.

After the first round of donations across Guatemala, my goal is to stay for 6 months to document the continued growth and development of Pur[shoe]ing Joy and the opportunities it gives the Guatemalan children. This will ultimately be combined to create prints and a bound photo book about my experience in Guatemala, which can be sold to further benefit Pur[shoe]ing Joy. Working with Pur[shoe]ing Joy would be an ultimate dream come true because it combines three of my greatest passions: people, art, and philanthropy, and allows me to use my art as a vehicle for social change.

Fundraising & Needs:

  • Rent ($250 x 6 mo) - $1500
  • Monthly Living Expenses ($175 x 6 mo) - $1050
  • Additional Photo/Video Supplies - $450
  • Flight to Guatemala - $500 (Or frequent flyer miles!)
Total = $3500


I could not do this without your support and every bit helps. Financial assistance is just one way you can help make this a reality. Please take a moment and forward this along and share the story of my journey with family and friends. Words of encouragement are also appreciated! You can reach me at murbyrne@gmail.com or 952-334-6669 for any of the above or to ask more about our work and the need in Guatemala. E-mail me directly about making your contribution tax-deductible.

Stay Connected! 

You'll be able to stay updated with the campaign both here on IndieGoGo, and on my personal website www.MurphyByrnePhotography.com. I'll be continually posting updates on fundraising, photography, videography, and life in Guatemala.

Thank you for being a part of my team and helping make my dream a reality.  Without your help, this wouldn't be possible.

Pur[shoe]ing Joy and the opportunities it gives the Guatemalan children. This will ultimately be combined to create prints and a bound photo book about my experience in Guatemala, which can be sold to further benefit Pur[shoe]ing Joy. Working
with Pur[shoe]ing Joy would be an ultimate dream come true because it combines three of my
greatest passions: people, art, and philanthropy, and allows me to use my art
as a vehicle for social change.Fundraising & Needs:
Rent ($250 x 6 mo) - $1500
Monthly Living Expenses ($175 x 6 mo) - $1050
Additional Photo/Video Supplies - $450
Flight to Guatemala - $500 (Or frequent flyer miles!)
Total = $3500I could not do this without your support and every bit helps. Financial assistance is just one way you can help make this a reality. Please take a moment and forward this along and share the story of my journey with family and friends. Words of encouragement are also appreciated! You can reach me at murbyrne@gmail.com or 952-334-6669 for any of the above or to ask more about our work and the need in Guatemala. E-mail me directly about making your contribution tax-deductible.Stay Connected! You'll be able to stay updated with the campaign both here on IndieGoGo, and on my personal website www.MurphyByrnePhotography.com. I'll be continually posting updates on fundraising, photography, videography, and life in Guatemala.Thank you for being a part of my team and helping make my dream a reality.  Without your help, this wouldn't be possible.

story:
I am a full time first time mom as well as a full time social worker at a middle school.  I also am a part time photographer.  After having my son Aiden, I got to thinking more about my career options.  I began to seriously consider doing photography full time in order to be my own boss, spend more time with my son (and hopefully another child eventually), all the while doing something that makes me feel creative, happy and accomplished. 

So I started down the road of advertising myself and creating my "business".  I began by upgrading my website.  At first I primarily used Facebook to promote myself, which does great things but doesn't have the reach I would like.  I developed a new website that showcases my work in a more professional manner.  Of course that costs money, but if I'm not willing to invest in myself, how can I expect anyone else to be?

This summer, I created a breastfeeding project called "The Beautiful Bond".  I posted on a local breastfeeding Facebook group for volunteer moms willing to let me take their picture while they nursed their child, whether in public or in the comfort of their own home.  The response I received was tremendous, and I spent my summer falling more in love with the act of breastfeeding.  Coincidentally, this is when the big breastfeeding in public debate really started to heat up.  I had never realized that it was such an issue.  How could anything so beautiful and natural be a controversy?  This brought even more meaning to my project and made me feel even more fulfilled. The moms involved really wanted to show their bravery and stand against people who say that they should cover up when feeding their child.  It was then that my desire to do more things like this in my life arose.

The trick to such a thing, changing careers and taking the plunge, is needing some start up capital.  For a photographer, I need better equipment.  I have my trusty Canon Rebel XTi.  It's treated me well since the day my husband gave it to me as a wedding present, but, it's taken me about as far as it can go.  I have some great lenses that don't work to their fullest capacity because of my camera body.  The tricky part is, it's expensive to upgrade.  AND, if I want more clients and a better product to gain more clients, I need better equipment!  See the conundrum?  So I'm asking for some help.  The project is an investment in my business, HoneyBrown Photography, but really, with the rewards I'm offering for your pledges, I'm making YOU the project.  I want to take pictures for you, and OF you, my investors.  I will travel within a 1 hour radius of Schaumburg, IL to take photos of you, your family, a landscape you love, etc.  Or if you're coming in from out of town and want pictures in Chicago (or Schaumburg if that floats your boat), that's great too!  I will then pull together some of the pictures of you, my Kickstarter investors, and put them into a project to display your kindness and generosity.  It's win win really!  I get more clients AND you get professional photos taken with quality equipment!

Thank you in advance for your support!  I look forward to capturing your memories!

story:
First time to Indiegogo?

It's super easy!

  1. Decide how many packs you would like then click the pink button that says "GET THIS PERK".
  2. Fill out your shipping information and continue with your payment.
  3. Receive and fill out the survey for color choices via email.
  4. We receive your color choices and get your shipment out.
  5. You receive your order and enjoy never tying your shoes again :)


Patent Pending


Sometimes it's about what you don't see. Most of our shoelace pictures are up-close shots portraying a unique design with parallel lines. They actually look really cool and add some character. From eye level though, it's a different story. You would never spot them on someone passing by.

Minimal by design. The Lace Anchors are manufactured from a fiber filled resin providing amazing strength and preventing any breakage or warping. The end clips, if used, have multiple rows of teeth that clinch the laces. This allows you to pull as hard as you would like without the end clips separating from the laces. We did, however, design the end clips to be adjustable, this means you can unlock them and re-lock them if you need to make shoelace length adjustments.

It's about combining style, comfort and convenience. Our Xpand shoe lacing system packs a powerful punch. We want to make sure that we have our bases covered when it comes to all aspects of wearing your shoes. First we offer you 24 colors. Then we offer you a fully adjustable fit providing comfort whether you're heading out for a night on the town or running a marathon. Last but not least, you will never have to tie your shoes again! We know it's not some crazy technology product promising to teleport you to the moon, but we can guarantee it will bring a smile to your face everyday you slip your feet in.  Sometimes it's about the simple things in life.

Zero interruptions, 100% focus. When using our lacing system, your shoes will never cause any distractions like untied laces or tension loss. You will be able to focus 100% on hitting that next mile marker and making it to the finish line. You get to decide how tight or loose your shoes will fit by adjusting pre-set tension when installing the Lace Anchors.  Whether it's in your cross-fit class or on a treadmill, we guarantee there will be zero shoelace malfunctions!

Less bulk more comfort. Not only does our system rid your shoes of the bulky mechanical objects other systems use, we believe our laces provide more comfort.  Round elastic laces can cause pressure along the top of your feet, whereas our flat laces provide a more even spread-out pressure.

Kids love to be as creative as you will let them be. Not only will you love the fact that your kids shoes are magically transformed into perfect fitting slip-ons, but you're giving them the opportunity to show off their creative side!  They can start in any eyelet and finish in any eyelet, creating awesome designs that they can actually wear!


 

 Reflective laces unlocked!

These are great for any night time activities. They will send off a reflective glow from almost any light source. These will be offered in 14 different colors.  There will be a $1.00 add-on charge for reflective laces.

Glow in the dark laces unlocked!

These are our glow in the dark laces. Kids will love these. They are charged by placing them under bright light for 30 seconds. The glow will last approximately 5 minutes.  There will be a $1.00 add-on charge for the glow in the dark laces.

Rainbow laces unlocked!

Our rainbow laces have a really smooth color transition with a different pattern on each side. The colors included on each lace are as follows: Orange, red, blue, green, yellow, purple and pink.  There will be a $1.00 add-on charge for the rainbow laces.


We are ready to rock and roll! Over the past 3 years we have been designing and developing all components of the Xpand lacing system. It started with our very first Kickstarter project, Lace Anchors, which rounded up 9,565 backers and $147,000.  We have successfully tested Lace Anchors with people all around the world.  All of the hard work is done.  The molds and tooling have just been completed and what you see in this campaign are actual production parts.  Our shoelace manufacturer has successfully run hundreds of production cycles with their equipment to ensure their ability to manufacture consistent quality laces for us.  We have turned to Kickstarter to launch Xpand into the world, hoping for thousands of backers so we can place a huge initial purchase order.  Below you will find information that merely skims the surface of our Journey thus far.

Seattles Pillar Product Design Team. Without the Pillar team involved in this project, Xpand would not be what it is today.  They have the creative minds and dedication to make ideas reality.  They are behind some amazing innovative ideas.  It's always a pleasure working with them! 


Disclaimer: There were no endorsements by any Brands for this project. All shoes used in the pictures and videos were paid for and are my personal property. Although our product is used in all of the shoes in these pictures and/or videos, the shoes work perfect in their natural state without Xpands Shoe Lacing System. Our product simply gives the user an optional way to keep their shoes secure.

Disclaimer: Just like any other shoelaces, it is the responsibility of the end user to make sure your Xpand Lacing System is installed correctly.  It is also the end users responsibility to make sure the pre-set tension is set tight enough to secure your shoes and give proper support under normal and high stress levels or during vigorous activities.  Always test with light activity to ensure the Xpand Lacing System is performing properly and securely before using under vigorous circumstances.  

Disclaimer:  We do not own the music in our video but we did obtain the rights to use. The music in the first portion of the video is "Do What it Do" by Dolce X Ozzie.  The music in the second portion of the video is called "Power of Motivation" and it's from Pond5.com


F.A.Q.

1. Does the Xpand Lacing System work with "All" Shoes?

There are so many shoes it's impossible to test on all of them. If you have eyelets and shoelaces, odds are they will work great. They work excellent with high tops as well!

2. Can I run with the Xpand Lacing System?

Absolutely.  This system is designed with runners in mind.  You can pre-set the tension as tight as you would like.  You will also be surprised how comfortable our flat style laces are in comparison to the round elastic laces other companies use.

3. Are the laces adjustable after I trim them?

Absolutely, just make sure that you don't trim them too short initially.  We suggest test fitting prior to trimming the laces.  Always set the initial adjustment on the loose side, you can always tighten them up if needed.

4. Do they work on kids shoes?

They work excellently with kids shoes!  My kids love not having to worry about tying their shoes.  They are constantly coming up with creative designs as well. 

5. Can you ship international?

Yes. We will ship ANYWHERE in the world!

6.  Can I become a distributor?  

Yes.  Please send us a private message and we will get back to you.  

7.  Do you have a patent?

Yes we do have Patents Pending.  We will monitor domestic and international trade shows as well as multiple USA/International internet and brick-and-mortar retailers and resellers. We will protect our Patents / brands / images / retailers / resellers to the fullest extent of the law.

Risks and challenges

This is my 5th Crowdfunding project. I have always delivered. My last project "Clingies" was a nightmare with all kinds of hurdles but in the end we conquered the project.

There is really no risk with this reward, the only "risk" would be the delivery dates although they should be close to correct. I already have all the molds complete and production has started! 

The only true risk you are taking is whether or not you like the product. I can tell you after using different versions of our Xpand laces and prototype parts for almost 1.5 years, I would never go back to standard shoelaces. They are ridiculously comfortable and fit like a glove!

If you're reading this message that means you made it to the bottom of the campaign page and I want to say thank you for taking the time to see what I have been working on :)

story:
Our Story

Who is Kimya Glasgow, the brand?

Kimya Glasgow is a clothing line started by me, Kimya Glasgow. I am based in the Caribbean, on the small multi-island nation of St Vincent and the Grenadines (SVG).  The goal of this fundraiser is to help our small company raise funds to attend Miami Fashion Week to show our new collection as part of a showcase of designers representing the Caribbean this coming March 2012.

At Kimya Glasgow, I design sophisticated yet edgy Women and Men's clothing from natural and eco-friendly fabrics.  While I may design custom clothing for many different occasions and styles my main focus is Resort and Cruise wear. 

A major influence on my designs and the materials I use, comes from the deep history of the people of SVG.  The people of this country have always relied on their ability to make do with very little and to let nothing go to waste and to find creative and unconventional uses for items that might get thrown away. I do this by incorporating found materials and re-purposed items like scrap, precious metals and electrical washers.  When it comes to fabrics, I like to use burlap alongside silks, linens and organic cottons, creating a stark contrast between the luxury of silk and the humbleness of burlap. I also use hand-painting and printing influenced by the art and nature found throughout SVG.

The funding from this program will help me develop and market my new collection, which will be part of Miami Fashion week in March 2012.


The Impact

No man is an island, so even though our company is small, I work with many local artisans and talented sewers on the island to make our work possible. Miami Fashion Week will give our brand the attention we need to attract Resort and Cruise Wear buyers.


What We Need & What You Get

THE Kimya Glasgow Project, where will the money go?

1-       ATTEND MIAMI FASHION WEEK MARCH 2012:

-Travel expenses to and from Miami.

2-       CREATE AND FUND THE COLLECTION:

-Funding for all new materials, printing and construction of the 15-20 piece collection, including custom printing and dying of fabrics.

3-       MEDIA:

-Creation of a digital and printed look-book including photography for potential buyers.


Anything more goes toward the registration fees for MFW.


For more information on my work, & me please visit

 

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=02Jk3nzeXkg

http://www.facebook.com/pages/Kimya-Glasgow/77452710148

http://www.facebook.com/media/set/?set=a.10150119731655149.318528.77452710148&type=1


We believe in giving back, so we are giving rewards to out contributors that we think you will like.


No donation is too small. It doesn't matter if you donate a dollar or a thousand dollars. EVERY CONTRIBUTION COUNTS! (Sorry but shipping & airfare is NOT included in the contribution.)

story:
Hi everyone :) My name is Leigha and this is my son's story (quite a bit shortened!)

David, my 6yr old son, is diagnosed with Moebius and Pierre-Robin Syndromes. The issues associated with them include paralysed facial nerves, paralysed vocal chords, low muscle tone, tight and underdeveloped ligaments etc. David has a Tracheotomy to breathe and is non-verbal. Due to low muscle tone and ligament/tendon issues (Arthrogryposis) he has no balance and must walk with a walker, or holding the hand of an adult (which he does not like to do at the moment, he is a "Big Boy" now!!), or, as he has been lately, he takes off with one speed - super fast- but does not have the ability to halt himself safely other than to drop to the ground. He also has no sense of safety and so road (and other) dangers are a very real issue with him. 
David has regular suctioning, day and night, of his Tracheotomy tube to keep his airway clear. He needs constant 1-on-1 attention 24/7.

Despite being "High Medical needs" and all of the above plus some, David is a smart, funny, caring boy who loves to make you laugh, and has great potential. I am very proud of my boy who has so far been to the operating theatre 33 times with many more to come. 

I came across ADNZ on the internet and we applied to see if David would be a candidate for an Assistance Dog to aid him with mobility, dangers (like crossing the road as David has no sense of the dangers despite all efforts to instil it in him!) but also to give David some freedom and independance from being constantly watched. Though he can not suction himself, an ADNZ dog can be trained to recognise the sounds and alert me. This will provide David with some level of "normalacy" in his environment regarding control and independance.
We had a trial to see if this is a viable option for us so helped with an ADNZ dog called Marley, and in 24hrs he was already showing an interest when David coughed and needed the suction machine, so the potential is huge for success.

To train and raise these special dogs takes alot of time and money, and we are asked to contribute towards this cost.

I am asking for help to do this.
Having an ADNZ dog will be so life changing for David that I dont want him to miss out because of financial restrictions.

A bit of information of what ADNZ dogs can do:
ADNZ dogs are trained specifically to assist with every day tasks that may be difficult when there is an impairment or disadvantage present. 
Assistance Dogs, when properly trained, can:
• Help improve a childs socialisation and behaviour skills.
• Create freedom for the child and family members to go out of the house safely and confidently.
• Expand a childs capabilities to experience more of life and to grow.
• Calm the child thereby giving them an increased attention span and greater aptitude for learning.
• Increase safety levels and alleviate the dangers by acting as an anchor when tethered to the child.

It costs between $40,000 - $50,000 + to raise and train an Assistance Dog.

Recipients of ADNZ Assistance Dogs are currently asked to (please) help the Charity by raising money towards the costs associated with training and raising an Assistance Dog which will go to that family as ADNZ is not as well known as other charities such as Guide Dogs and have not got the funding available to fully shoulder these costs.

Your support with our fundraising mission, means David will receive a dog which will help keep him safe, enrich his life, provide him with that much needed companionship and make life inside and outside of the home much easier for him.

Hopefully, by sharing Davids story, we can help raise awareness about Assistance Dogs and the vital role they can play in the lives of people living with disabilities. 

I have been trying for the last year and a half to raise money, we have managed $3000 so far, but we need to ramp up the fundraising as quickly as possible because there is a match for David. A black Labrador who is perfect for my son. 

I know that asking for $20,000 is massive, but if 10,000 people donated $2 each, we would have the money needed. We are also fundraising to help set up a Vet account so anything over that $20,000 would be partly placed into that account and the remaining extra to ADNZ to help the next family who is struggling with fundraising.

Thank you for reading Davids story and your support, I can not say how much I appreciate the support we have been receiving lately. Thank You!!! :D
story_txt:
Hi everyone :) My name is Leigha and this is my son's story (quite a bit shortened!)
David, my 6yr old son, is diagnosed with Moebius and Pierre-Robin Syndromes. The issues associated with them include paralysed facial nerves, paralysed vocal chords, low muscle tone, tight and underdeveloped ligaments etc. David has a Tracheotomy to breathe and is non-verbal. Due to low muscle tone and ligament/tendon issues (Arthrogryposis) he has no balance and must walk with a walker, or holding the hand of an adult (which he does not like to do at the moment, he is a "Big Boy" now!!), or, as he has been lately, he takes off with one speed - super fast- but does not have the ability to halt himself safely other than to drop to the ground. He also has no sense of safety and so road (and other) dangers are a very real issue with him. David has regular suctioning, day and night, of his Tracheotomy tube to keep his airway clear. He needs constant 1-on-1 attention 24/7.Despite being "High Medical needs" and all of the above plus some, David is a smart, funny, caring boy who loves to make you laugh, and has great potential. I am very proud of my boy who has so far been to the operating theatre 33 times with many more to come. I came across ADNZ on the internet and we applied to see if David would be a candidate for an Assistance Dog to aid him with mobility, dangers (like crossing the road as David has no sense of the dangers despite all efforts to instil it in him!) but also to give David some freedom and independance from being constantly watched. Though he can not suction himself, an ADNZ dog can be trained to recognise the sounds and alert me. This will provide David with some level of "normalacy" in his environment regarding control and independance.We had a trial to see if this is a viable option for us so helped with an ADNZ dog called Marley, and in 24hrs he was already showing an interest when David coughed and needed the suction machine, so the potential is huge for success.To train and raise these special dogs takes alot of time and money, and we are asked to contribute towards this cost.I am asking for help to do this.Having an ADNZ dog will be so life changing for David that I dont want him to miss out because of financial restrictions.A bit of information of what ADNZ dogs can do:ADNZ dogs are trained specifically to assist with every day tasks that may be difficult when there is an impairment or disadvantage present. Assistance Dogs, when properly trained, can:• Help improve a childs socialisation and behaviour skills.• Create freedom for the child and family members to go out of the house safely and confidently.• Expand a childs capabilities to experience more of life and to grow.• Calm the child thereby giving them an increased attention span and greater aptitude for learning.• Increase safety levels and alleviate the dangers by acting as an anchor when tethered to the child.It costs between $40,000 - $50,000 + to raise and train an Assistance Dog.Recipients of ADNZ Assistance Dogs are currently asked to (please) help the Charity by raising money towards the costs associated with training and raising an Assistance Dog which will go to that family as ADNZ is not as well known as other charities such as Guide Dogs and have not got the funding available to fully shoulder these costs.Your support with our fundraising mission, means David will receive a dog which will help keep him safe, enrich his life, provide him with that much needed companionship and make life inside and outside of the home much easier for him.Hopefully, by sharing Davids story, we can help raise awareness about Assistance Dogs and the vital role they can play in the lives of people living with disabilities. 
I have been trying for the last year and a half to raise money, we have managed $3000 so far, but we need to ramp up the fundraising as quickly as possible because there is a match for David. A black Labrador who is perfect for my son. 
I know that asking for $20,000 is massive, but if 10,000 people donated $2 each, we would have the money needed. We are also fundraising to help set up a Vet account so anything over that $20,000 would be partly placed into that account and the remaining extra to ADNZ to help the next family who is struggling with fundraising.
Thank you for reading Davids story and your support, I can not say how much I appreciate the support we have been receiving lately. Thank You!!! :D

story:
When our baby Liam was born, everything was great... in the beginning. Miricca was always good to be still on the changing pad durring the diaper change. Liam on the other hand, was a real twister on the changing table every single time we were about to change his diaper. From around 4 month old, he was almost impossible to hold and i was scared, that he would some day fall down from the changing station. 

I googled many hours to find some design harness sollutions for the changing pad, but only thing i found, was a few very unpractical devices which was only available in a few countries. There was nothing to buy in stores in Denmark!

Through the searchings i read about statistics regarding children falling from changing pads and changing stations and it was even worse than i thought. I imediately started designing my own safety harnesses... using soft and comfortable fabrics and focussing on the quality and function of the product. 

I created the brandname and logo for the company (profesionals did the graphics) and we are very far in this project. We need the final steps to bring this out in stores accross the world. We already have these products placed and ready at our factory, prepared for start up production. We just need the final certifications and tests... 


Steps payed and ready!

  • All prototypes made
  • Testings 
  • Websites
  • Packshots & other still photos
  • Logos and brands creations
  • Materials for testings
  • Free samples for family testings
  • Videomaking
  • 2800 hours work
  • Translators for the trade fairs and factory set ups
  • Intl. sales manager on job
  • Graphics & designs
  • Patent pendings & design registrations
  • Collaborations with factory & set-up
  • Trade fairs & connections B2B germany
  • Brand name registrations
  • Packaging designs & testing
  • TOTAL = 38.000 USD

    INDIEGOGO FUNDINGS NEEDED:

  • 5 x Oeko-Tex testings and certifications
  • 5 x CE tests & certifications
  • 5 x layouts for packaging designs
  • Lawyer assistance, Logistics, first line of production etc
  • TOTAL = 36.000 USD

But please remember that any small as big donation brings us closer to our goal.


DELUXE

Supersoft baby velvet and plush Oeko-Tex
Wash on 40* dry hang.


Eliminate The Diaper Changing Struggles

baBsafe harnesses is a secure, easy way to use restraint to hold a baby or toddler safely on a diaper changing pad, keeping them from rolling away or escaping during diaper changes. 



  • It eliminates the diaper changing battles.
  • Adds an extra level of security when you are reaching for the diapers and wipes.
  • No more accidents of baby falling off the changing table when you didn’t know that he or she could roll yet.
  • Acts like extra hands to hold a baby’s shoulders down on the changing pad.
  • Keeps your hands free to do the dirty work of diaper changing.
  • Works on changing stations in public bathrooms.
  • How does it work?


  • Inhibits rolling at the shoulder level.
  • The baBsafe safety harnesses needs a stiff backed changing pad to be attached to. Cardboard can be used to stiffen the back if your pad is soft.
  • The weight of the child on the pad in combination with the vest and solid back of the pad keep the child from rolling.
  • The baBsafe changing harnesses buckles around the back of the pad.
  • It fastens around the child using hook and loop(velcro), and has two chest, and two shoulder straps that come up and over the shoulders and fasten onto the harness front and back.
  • The baBsafe safety harnesses is not meant to be used as a safety device, and is no substitute for parent supervision.
  • Never leave child unattended.
  • Pad not included.

Keep your baby safe using baBsafe safety harnesses.




To make this happen, WE NEED YOU and your contribution. We dont need alot, I only need a very small amount from ALOT of people                                                      :O)

                                                 

This should not even be a question for anyone... 

                                                                       

                                          

Changing Table Related Injuries. 

Falling is the cause of most injuries to children under 5 years of age (65%). A quarter of childhood injuries in the home environment are as a result of a fall from nursery furniture. Most injuries occur when a baby rolls to the side and falls off the change table. Falls occur in children as young as three months, Head injuries are the most common injury, with many children requiring hospital admission. Children falling up to 1.5metres to the floor or onto another piece of furniture can suffer: 

  • Serious head injuries. 
  • Concussion. 
  • fractures to the body. 


Researchers estimate that 8 out of 10 injuries would be prevented by a correctly used restraint fitted to the change table. However, nothing is a substitute for constant adult supervision. It is far safer for the adult to get down to the child’s level. If your back and knees allow, change baby on the floor or on a bed. 


  • Many injuries result from babies falling off changing tables onto the floor. 
  • Make sure the table has safety straps and always use them when changing your baby.
  • Never leave your baby unattended on a changing table.

To many children under the age of 2, fall from the changing station durring his or hers first periode of life. To prevend and avoid this, there are a few pads with a simple strap around. Many parrents dont buy this type of product because it is NOT suited for a newborn and it is not very childfriendly. When your baby grow, you often dont buy a new pad, for many reasons.                              

I know that durring a diaper change situation, it is very important to keep one hand on the baby, supporting him or her, from fall. I always does that... but i also know how hard that is, when the baby is struggeling to get loose, while having all the "poopie" up and down the neck. 

Parents need both hands free to make the diaper change as comfortable and quick as possible, and that is why the changing devices were made. Often the accidents happen because of a stressful situation. When using these devices, you can focus on what you need... to clean your babys butt and make sure the baby is happy and secure. you DONT need to fight and smear it all over, and making a simpel diaper change, something that you hate. Many parents experience this... and sometimes the accidents happen only because of this mess... I made these for myself but realized that everyone i talked with, wanted and needed these to. 

I want to fight the statistics and bring down the number of accidents hopefully close to 0. But, i also know, that there will always be parents out there who dont THINK they need this - untill the accident happens. 

My wish is that it should be as natural to use a changing pad safety device, as it is using a safety device for high chairs and prams!!!!!

IF I reach the total goal of 36.000 USD - i will see to it, that first move after receiving support in any ways are the laboratory tests for Oeko-Tex certificate and CE - to make sure everything is perfect before babies around the world will use theese changing devices.

Next step is all the design layouts so we can start the production and last, all the paperwork that lawyers are going to make - as we need aggreements and contracts and of course many other things but theese are the most important before selling to many forreign countries. IF there is any left back, we have a few great new designs we would like to introduce also - but it all cost.


We pray to reach at least 14000 USD - its still alot, but after taxes, the fees etc., theres not much left for the two big steps we need to be done with, thats why we need you!


If you are not able to help us with a contribution, we would seriously appriciate you being our voice for the people around you. 

Please share this campaign on your Facebook, telling your friends about our baby safety devices...

Use your Twitter to make a note...

Follow up by telling your neighbors, friend, businesspartners or other parents about the project, so they might like us on Facebook too...

story:
THE BOW TIE STORY
In summer 2011, I started to create women’s accessories and I soon realized the market was flooded with women’s accessories. I was making a matching bow ties with hairbands for girls and then I figured I could try to make some cool bow ties for guys. I wanted to create a unique accessory for urban dandy. Man who is not afraid to wear sth. different like a big bow tie like Oscar Wilde. To have this passion for fashion and uniqueness. So I created a collection called Urban Dandy.
So I started setting up a “real label” in 2012. I designed 2 models of bow ties, bought 5 types of colors and made 10 samples with the headline: Get ready for the spotlight. Our photographer Kristýna Erbenová was thanks to these photos among finalists of Elle fashion award 2013 (Mercedes-Benz Fashion Week in Prague) and Designbuy.cz got the exclusivity to sell this collection.Meanwhile I came with some new ideas and designs for bowties –> and"2:1DESIGN"  became my signiture one.

In october 2013 My Yellow bow tie (type Shape) was selected and presented between design icons od 20.-21. century.

I still wasn’t quite satisfied and I came up with the idea of making bow ties from vintage garments like tweed jackets and denim jeans. Collection called A Town Called Obsolete is inspired by the City of Prague and his inhabitants, my friends. Every bow tie has his own story. That is what makes him so special and unique.
  • Right now I’m focusing on 2 levels of production. Satin bow ties (permanent signiture collection) that I innovated through the testing period and limited collections (such as recycled or art collection).
    Thank you for reading my bow tie story!
    If you are interested to hear more or cooperate or whatever reason, please contact me here - looking forward to hear from YOU!:
    email: alexandra.monhartova@gmail.com gsm: 00420 777 621 296 official page: www.alexmonhart.com

See our newest commercial below


What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Our goal is to raise 10000$ to be able to finance our first production run. By that we mean: 1) We will be able to place a bulk order for the materials. and personalizes packaging. 2) Printed catalogues and lookbooks for our distributors.
  • If we won't reach the goal, we will still use it for the same purposes but in smaller scale. Because we know these are the key steps we must do to bring our brand to the real world!

             -----------------------------YOUR PERKS----------------------------------

The Impact

We are doing things differently than other brands. We took time. It sound plainly but it isn't. In this fast world where "today is already late" We have designed our bow ties, TESTED them, REDESIGNED, than again tested and NOW we can say we DID THE JOB! And we are proud to presend you the BEST WE CAN OFFER.

  • Our main, LONG-TERM goal is to keep our production in Czech Republic. We believe in work of our skilled seamstresses and we don't want ot oursource our production elsewhere. So If you'll be our contributor, you can BE SURE your bying a product from trusted Family-Based brand and we gurantee you the quatily because we are HIRING the MOST PROFESSIONAL, ADULT and ADEQUATELY PAID people. 

WHY SUPPORT US?

Uniqueness: We are inspired by traditional bow tie BUT we came with a REVOLUTIONARY AND UNIQUE DESIGN!
Great value: You wll get a special price for our pieces after backing our project and MORE you back MORE YOU GET! We have prepared a WHOLE INDIEGOGO COLLECTION you CAN’T GET ANYWHERE ELSE!
Superb quality: We really care about quality and design. It is our priority to deliver GREAT products to you!
Make a difference: Support an independent and familly based brand that can make a difference in menswear accerssory design!

Risks & Challenges

The main challenge is to raise awarness about our campaign and to be able to reach to our potential bow tie supporters! We are currently emailing online magazines and bloggers in order to expand the brand’s presence. We have all our supliers ready delivery if necessary so we are confident we can deliver on time!

OTHER IMPORTANT WAYS You Can Help !!!

If you like our bow tie but you don't want to or you can't  contribute financially, there is plenty room for you as well! If you would be so kind and "just" SPREAD THE WORD about our campaign, we will be more than happy! If you are a BLOGGER or JOURNALIST and you would like to write an article about us, we'll be overjoyed! If you are a BUYER for RETAILER and you are interested in pre-ordering our bow ties or ANY POTENTIAL COOPERATION, we will be over the moon!
