story:
This is more than a watch. It gives the gift of time. Every watch is unique just like the people who wear them and the people they help. 1 watch = 1 Month educational time.


The F(ph)resh Classics Collection:

Now we are creating our most ambitious watch yet. Each watch is:

1. MADE IN GERMANY: Designed in Stuttgart and produced in the Black Forest.

2. MORE SUSTAINABLE: All bands made with the highest quality up cycled fabrics.

3. EACH BAND IS UNIQUE: Limited in quantity and tailored cut, each band tells it's own story. Different pattern with every cut.

4. SWISS PRECISION: We use a powerful Swiss parts movement.

5. 1 WATCH = 1 MONTH EDUCATIONAL TIME: Current project: Dream Child Home, Kenya *Details found at bottom*

Final prototype design before production

What's with the (ph)?

Two guys who love watches and design, in 2012 created a watch brand called F(ph)resh People+ Humanity. The p + h stands for People + Humanity and is at the core of everything we do. We asked ourselves "What if you could give the gift of time to someone else? What if every child on the planet has access to education? How would the world look then?" 
After a long journey we created the F(ph)resh Selection series of watches. Our first collection was fun, colorful and allowed people to physically show their support for giving opportunity through education. This allowed us to gift over 3 years of educational time at two project locations in Arusha, Tanzania and Lima, Peru.


Our mission:

We give time for education because we believe that a lack of quality education is the number one cause of poverty in the world. We wanted to change this by creating great watches that sponsor time for people. To change their opportunities by giving access to education in places where they may not have had the opportunity.


1st Production with your support:


Watch Faces: 

The watch case is produced using a 316L stainless steel that is hand brushed and topped with a mineral hardened glass. Every watch is designed in the F(ph)resh Labs, located in Stuttgart, Germany. They are produced in the black forest by our manufacture and double checked to German quality standard.


Wristbands:    

    

All of our bands are created in house and use quality fabrics upcycled from fashion and textile labels. This produces a very unique product as we use different types of fabrics as well as makes each one unique. The underside is lined with leather for more comfort and quality. They are easily changeable for between watch faces. Because of the way the fabrics are sourced, there are very limited quantities. Once they are sold out, they are out!


The Perks:

Create your own combination. 

Watch face + Band fabric = F(ph)resh Watch 

*We confirm your choice within 3 business days via email*

Billie Jean aka Black Jeans (Limited 150)


         Psychedelic Corduroy (Limited 75)       

          

                       


       F(ph)resh Linen light blue (Limited 150)                           

          

                                  

           Rosemunde (Limited 75)

             

                 

*EXAMPLES of band patterns and face. INDIEGOGO EXCLUSIVE*

Gossip band made from Red and white cotton (Limited 75)

                          

           


*New Patterns!*

                     Red Tartan band (limited 50)

                

               Blue Tartan band (limited 50)

              


Watch Specifications/Features:

Case material: 316L Stainless Steel
Case diameter: 40mm
Face diameter: 39mm
Case thickness: 10mm
Band width: 20mm
Band material: Up cycled fabrics (All lined with leather)
Movement: Ronda Swiss parts
Water resistance 5 ATM
Warranty: 2 years


We Need Your Support!

In order create this amazing product and continue giving time, we need your support. Not only does this mean in the pledging for this awesome German made watch that gives time for education, but sharing our story with a friend goes a long way. Remember if we do not reach our full goal we cannot go into production of the F(ph)resh Classics series. 

We are doing everything we can to spread the word but it still is up to you to join us in spreading the message. We ask if you can do something as simple as sharing, tweeting, or liking our Facebook page, this can help us to reach our funding goal. 

Simply click the Facebook and Twitter tabs at the top of the page, right under the video to SHARE.


 

Your watch gives Time for Education

How do we give time?

  1. We sponsor scholarships for students at the project site. 

  2. We sponsor the food and nutritional needs that are provided by our project partners.

  3. We sponsor the educational materials needed to spread education.

Over the last year we have been able to provide our first two project locations with over 3 years of funded time for education.
Now we have begun working with Dream Children's Home, located in Kenya, not far from Nairobi, in the countryside between Ngong and Matasia Town. 
If you would like to visit us take the Matatu 111 from Nairobi to Ngong. From Ngong you have to take the Matatu to Matasia and get of at the bus stop Wamaina. There you will see our sign. They will be happy to welcome you!

Entrance to Orphanage and school

Road to school

That's Simone. She's awesome and serves as our direct contact to the project site. 

*Past project information can be provided at www.Fphresh.com

story:
The Idea

If you ever tried to place a bottle lying down on a shelve you know its impossible. So what do you do?

You go out and buy some kind of wine rack or wine shelve that actually don’t even fit in your household, just to able to store your wines lying down. No more!

BottleGrip will give you the possibility of placing your bottles wherever you want: on your favorite shelve, in the closet or anywhere else flat.

The picture only illustrates a homemade prototype and a outlined sketch showing product/material description.

The materials

In the end my hope is to produce BottleGrib in three different materials
- alloy/steel
- PVC
- glass

but at first, and to evaluate the market, first batch will be in alloy/steel

story:
WOOD3N Eyewear was founded two years ago by me and my younger brother Tony Ekstrand, it all began with a thought, that all the waste material in the family wood business should be turned into something more beautiful and useful than district heating, and now it is.

Right now we´re working on a brand new collection with Titanium temples. we have also developed a new frame construction  which is both stronger and yet more flexible then before. Now we want to walk through the last steps of this developing and show the world WOOD3N Eyewear.


"Were do my money go"?

The crowdfunding money will be put into buying Titanium parts, photographing and marketing material, to get everything settled for the launch scheduled in July. 

What do you get out of it:
  • When making a contribution you will not only wear some kickass shades, you´ll also support us to develop a more sustainable alternative fashion product for people.

PERKS


****EARLY BIRD**** 125$
1 pair of sunglasses + wooden wallet engraved with your name on it!
Model will be asked for when campaign ends.

________________________________________________________________________

Normal: 110$ 1 Pair of shades 

You get a pair of WOOD3N Sunglasses. Model and style preference will be asked when campaign ends. Why not grab a pair of our upcoming models before anyone else!

________________________________________________________________________

Budget: 25$ The WOOD3N wallet

Place your cards and money in this wooden wallet. Engraved with your name on it!

Size: 90x55 mm 

Thickness: 6 mm

________________________________________________________________________

Custom: 350$ Customize 2 pairs 

Customize 2 pairs of your choice. choose model, wood material, Titan color, lens color. and on top of that we engrave your name or a text on the inside of the temple. Awesome right!?

________________________________________________________________________

Wall of names: 5$ We write all of the names of you guys with a permanent marker on the walls of our workshop. to remind us of the people supporting us! 


Here you can see some prototype pictures with our handmade titanium temples with manufacturing based in Sweden. 
We have designed new models that you can get your hands on before anyone else. 


Note: when contributing with PERK "Normal", all of our frames will be fitted with matte black titanium temples.

The temples will be available in 18 different colors. which one is your favorite?


People are getting more and more conscious about the way of living, what we wear, what we eat, which car we drive. Our mission is to provide people with High End eyewear, at a affordable price, and at the same time make the environment a favor by using only natural materials. 

Not to forget!, we also plant one tree for every frame we sell, great huh?

That´s what we call sustainability at it´s best.


Note: these models will be fitted with handmade matte black Titanium temples.

CASTLEWOOD

Note: these models will be fitted with handmade matte black Titanium temples.


What type of lens do you use?:

We use high quality CR39 lenses from Essilor. which has 100% UVA & UVB protection. 

What type of wood do you use?

We only use wood from controlled origins when we produce our frames.

Could i fit my frames with prescription lenses?

All of our frames can be fitted with prescription lenses.

_____________________________________________________________________________

Risks & Challenges

We manufacture all of our eyewear ourselves except the titanium and lenses, which means that we have total control over the production.
- One risk would be our own production capacity, that we can´t keep up with the amount of orders. The Indiegogo campaign will in that case be high priority. and should therefore not be delayed. 
If we however would´t reach our funding goal we will still proceed with this project and deliver all the perks ordered.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you don't have the funds to contribute but still wants to help!

Make some noise about us and share on whatever social media you´re active on! 

don't forget to like us on Facebook and follow us on Instagram

story:
YOU CAN NOW ORDER ON OUR WEBSITE SUDACAS.COM AND WATCH ON OUR 24/7 LIVESTREAM HOW THE ITEMS YOU PURCHASE ARE BEING MADE FOR YOU. 


 

 


 



No Screws or Bolts.




 


Alejandro Sticotti is an award-winning architect and designer from Argentina who seeks to make the best versions of essential home objects. His designs and values are deeply rooted in a love for clean lines, raw finishes, and the use of authentic materials. 

The Sticotti Workshop specializes in the responsible production of high quality furniture made from solid wood in the busy Palermo neighborhood in Argentina. Sticotti's insistence on manual, artisan work is what sets them apart, amassing worldwide recognition by the likes of Monocle, Design Within Reach, Elle Decor, Living Magazine, and Dwell.

 



Wood’s warmth and beauty work wonders for creating a sense of balance and calm within a space. It is an ancient, noble, living material that we have the privilege to live with and enjoy. The Sticotti workshop uses only certified woods that come from responsibly managed South American forests. This practice enables people to continue using wooden products without causing forest destruction.

Petiribi wood, known for its beautiful grain and strength, gives warmth and elegance in the crafting of the Sticotti Shelving System. The fabrication of the Coat Rack is centered around the use of Lapacho wood, an extremely dense and strong wood, which is also very rare.

 


 


* The special prices listed in this campaign are a representation of our gratitude as your support with help us bring our vision and our products to life!

Sudacas.com
story_txt:
YOU CAN NOW ORDER ON OUR WEBSITE SUDACAS.COM AND WATCH ON OUR 24/7 LIVESTREAM HOW THE ITEMS YOU PURCHASE ARE BEING MADE FOR YOU. 


 

  

 


  

 











 (3.14" W x 3.14" D x 79"H)
 
No Screws or Bolts.


  Inspired by Japanese joinery techniques, the Sticotti Coat Rack is made entirely of wood. Nature meets geometry as each piece connects through a series of self-sustaining joints. 





  * 30kg (66lb) Shelving Hold Per Vertical Beam 


 

 


Alejandro Sticotti is an award-winning architect and designer from Argentina who seeks to make the best versions of essential home objects. His designs and values are deeply rooted in a love for clean lines, raw finishes, and the use of authentic materials. 
The Sticotti Workshop specializes in the responsible production of high quality furniture made from solid wood in the busy Palermo neighborhood in Argentina. Sticotti's insistence on manual, artisan work is what sets them apart, amassing worldwide recognition by the likes of Monocle, Design Within Reach, Elle Decor, Living Magazine, and Dwell.

  

 


  


Wood’s warmth and beauty work wonders for creating a sense of balance and calm within a space. It is an ancient, noble, living material that we have the privilege to live with and enjoy. The Sticotti workshop uses only certified woods that come from responsibly managed South American forests. This practice enables people to continue using wooden products without causing forest destruction.


Petiribi wood, known for its beautiful grain and strength, gives warmth and elegance in the crafting of the Sticotti Shelving System. The fabrication of the Coat Rack is centered around the use of Lapacho wood, an extremely dense and strong wood, which is also very rare.
 


  SUDACAS brings the traditions, values, and culture of South America to the rest of the world in the shape of beautifully designed furniture and objects. 

 


  


* The special prices listed in this campaign are a representation of our gratitude as your support with help us bring our vision and our products to life!

Sudacas.com

story:
Canadian made apparel celebrating Canada's 150th birthday

 

The Canada At 150 collection offers premium quality apparel made by Canadians. We ask the question – why would anyone purchase clothing celebrating Canada’s 150th which was Not made in Canada? We have received an official license for use of the Canada 150 logo from the Minister of Canadian Heritage and created a collection now available for everyone to enjoy and keep as a long lasting memento of a once in a lifetime event.

A Canada At 150 garment has been handcrafted by dedicated, Canadian professionals using quality materials that are built to last. Clean and timeless, each piece is basic and classic in design to stand the test of time.

Soft and smooth, our complete apparel line has been washed and pre-shrunk. Whether a lighter weight t-shirt or a 20oz hoodie, each selection arrives to you ready to wear and enjoy.

Heading into our sesquicentennial, Canada is ranked as 2nd best Country in the world in which to live and thrive (World Economic Forum and The Reputation Institute) and Lonely Planet has named Canada “Best Travel destination for 2017”. All considered, it’s a pretty good time to be a Canadian these days.

 

Each style is named for one of Canada’s National Parks recognised for their unparalleled beauty that is ours to celebrate so it’s only fitting we name our garments after them. When you support our initiative, we won’t be simply asking for a donation but will be providing you with something to remember Canada’s sesquicentennial. That means even the lowest priced perk offers unique, custom Canada 150 crests (small and large) to own as souvenirs commemorating this great milestone in Canada’s history.

Each perk is priced in Canadian dollars, which doesn’t mean they cost more. When you look around and compare, you’ll find the Canada At 150 collection offers exceptional value.

 

 

Hey Expats!

As of recent reports there are over 3 million Canadians living abroad. That’s among the highest ratio of expatriates living elsewhere from any country at more than 9%. We know what the maple leaf represents when we travel and here’s an opportunity to join the celebration no matter where you are.

And if you know of other expats or have a loved one/family overseas, let them know about us and we’ll help them participate.

Corporate and Group Premium Sales

Canadaat150 apparel is available for your company, municipality, group or team to enjoy and keep as a long lasting memento of a once in a lifetime event and every piece will feature the official Canada 150 logo. Should you, your business or organization wish to order a greater quantity, please contact us and we’ll do our best to suit your needs - info@canadaat150.ca.

Giving Back

﻿Contact us about your fundraising goals and how we can work together to ensure you achieve them.

We can help build your short or long term plans.

 

Please contact info@canadaat150.ca for any information at any time.

story:
Where to Order Post-Kickstarter Campaign: 

The lightweight, ultra-thin, 100% upcycled, and tear- and moisture-resistant Scrubba weightless wallet has already helped hundreds of travellers and sport-enthusiasts by reducing weight and bulkiness during physical activity. We want to ensure that as many people as possible are able to experience this freedom, which is why we're excited to continue supply of the weightless wallet via our global (www.thescrubba.com) and Australian (www.thescrubba.com.au) websites. 

As our upcycled manufacturing method leaves us with a high quantity of the green fabric that makes up our Scrubba wash bag, the weightless wallet is currently only available in traditional Scrubba green across our websites. 

Any future orders should be placed via our online stores. Shipping will continue from Australia and shipping times will therefore vary depending on your location (please see our websites for more details). 

 

Now shipping!

We are pleased to announce that we are now fulfilling orders for the Scrubba weightless wallet.  We will be processing orders on a weekly basis and the default colour for the wallet will be the bright green colour.  We also have a limited amount of white wallets in stock and we expect to have a limited amount of black wallets in stock in mid-December (though hopefully earlier).  Should you wish to choose one or more white wallets or black wallets (bearing in mind the shipping delay), please email sam@thescrubba.com straight after making your pledge with your colour preference.  Colour selections will be based on a first-in first-served basis and if the colour is no longer available, a green wallet will be sent 

Our team preparing green wallets for shipping.

The Scrubba Story

When patent attorney Ash Newland travelled to Africa to climb Mt Kilimanjaro in 2010, he was faced with the harsh reality of quickly and efficiently washing his clothes on-the-go without carrying heavy washing equipment or harming the environment. The concept of the Scrubba wash bag was born, giving rise to an ongoing commitment to develop products that are: 

  • Lightweight 
  • Multi-functional
  • Durable and of high-quality
  • Environmentally-conscious
  • Compact

Our latest innovation, the Scrubba weightless wallet, is so important to us because it embodies these high standards and aligns perfectly with our core company values. 

The Scrubba Weightless Wallet 

Upcycled using excess material from the lightweight and durable Scrubba wash bag, the weightless wallet supports the health and vitality of both the planet and the people who enjoy it. Ideal for all kinds of travel and physical activity, the moisture-resistant fabric has been paired with edges designed to lightly fray over time, helping your wallet to develop an aged look with a unique character that tells your story. The weightless wallet is: 

  • Upcycled and repurposed
  • Thin and light (weights only 7g/0.24oz) 
  • Equipped with tear-resistant, high frequency welded seams
  • Compact and expandable
  • Constructed from durable 40 denier nylon fabric lined with polyurethane 
  • Sweat- and water-resistant
  • Compatible with all common currencies and fits up to 12 cards
  • Available with optional RFID-blocking sleeves

This means that the weightless wallet: 

  • Prevents sweaty and wet money
  • Fits easily in tight travel and active wear pockets
  • Avoids wallet bulge
  • Can easily and safely carry all your monetary essentials

Which makes it perfect for: 

  • Physical activity including cycling, yoga and jogging
  • Water or winter sports including canoeing, boating and skiing
  • Travel and related activities such as hiking and camping

RFID Protection 

To reduce weight and keep the wallet as streamlined as possible for sports' enthusiasts and hikers, RFID protection is offered via the use of separate, lightweight sleeves. Made from flexible, durable aluminium, the sleeves not only add a little style to the weightless wallet, but are highly practical. Fitting up to two cards each, you can simply insert the sleeves into the weightless wallet as desired – perfect for on-the-go travellers – or remove them when additional bulk and security are unwanted or unnecessary – great for those tough workout sessions. The sleeves weigh around 1.5g (0.05oz) each and measure 9 x 6cm (3.5 x 2.4”), enabling them to fit snugly inside the wallet while adding only minimal weight and bulk. 

Colour Selections: 

The weightless wallet is available in green, black and white, although the last two colours will be subject to limited availability. This is because our commitment to create a product that has been 100% upcycled from excess material leaves us with a higher proportion of the vibrant green fabric that makes up our famous Scrubba wash bag. Although we will always strive to deliver on colour preference, backers should note that the white and black colours are in limited supply and cannot be guaranteed.

What We Need & What You Get

The Scrubba weightless wallet has recently seen great success on Kickstarter, where it reached its goal within only 2.5 hours of its campaign launch. As we are already fully funded, all current pledges will act as a pre-order for guaranteed product and will further support our commitment to help both people and the planet experience the positive effects of exercise and activity. 

Our Promise

The Scrubba weightless wallet is our third product to be successfully crowdfunded and follows our well-known Scrubba W pack (2015) and Scrubba wash bag (2012) campaigns. The success of our former projects, coupled with our dedication to honesty and transparency in all our endeavours, leaves us wholly confident that all promises for this campaign will be promptly and efficiently delivered. As we are repurposing excess material from an existing product line, we have all the required materials ready to go and therefore do not anticipate any complications. Nevertheless, any potential delays will be swiftly communicated and managed, with a detailed action plan provided at first opportunity.   

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if the weightless wallet isn't for you, we still value your input and appreciate your support. That's why we'd love you to: 

  • Let your friends and family know about the weightless wallet 
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools to spread the word online

Thanks so much for your support and enthusiasm - The Scrubba Team

Media 

If you would like to write a feature or create other media about the weightless wallet, we invite you to access our media kit and high-res images at: https://www.dropbox.com/sh/h7l9jaq8nc3fo4u/AAAl...

Thanks in advance for spreading the word about our campaign, and please feel free to contact us at info@thescrubba.com if you require further information. 

Ready for shipping

We are pleased to announce that production of the green and white wallets has been completed ahead of schedule and we are now shipping orders for these colours.  There have been some delays with the black wallets and we expect these to be ready for shipping in mid-December.  The following photos show the finished stock ready for shipping and the features of the completed product are identical to those shown in our crowdfunding video.
story_txt:
Where to Order Post-Kickstarter Campaign: 
The lightweight, ultra-thin, 100% upcycled, and tear- and moisture-resistant Scrubba weightless wallet has already helped hundreds of travellers and sport-enthusiasts by reducing weight and bulkiness during physical activity. We want to ensure that as many people as possible are able to experience this freedom, which is why we're excited to continue supply of the weightless wallet via our global (www.thescrubba.com) and Australian (www.thescrubba.com.au) websites. 
As our upcycled manufacturing method leaves us with a high quantity of the green fabric that makes up our Scrubba wash bag, the weightless wallet is currently only available in traditional Scrubba green across our websites. 
Any future orders should be placed via our online stores. Shipping will continue from Australia and shipping times will therefore vary depending on your location (please see our websites for more details). 
 
Now shipping!
We are pleased to announce that we are now fulfilling orders for the Scrubba weightless wallet.  We will be processing orders on a weekly basis and the default colour for the wallet will be the bright green colour.  We also have a limited amount of white wallets in stock and we expect to have a limited amount of black wallets in stock in mid-December (though hopefully earlier).  Should you wish to choose one or more white wallets or black wallets (bearing in mind the shipping delay), please email sam@thescrubba.com straight after making your pledge with your colour preference.  Colour selections will be based on a first-in first-served basis and if the colour is no longer available, a green wallet will be sent 

Our team preparing green wallets for shipping.
The Scrubba Story
When patent attorney Ash Newland travelled to Africa to climb Mt Kilimanjaro in 2010, he was faced with the harsh reality of quickly and efficiently washing his clothes on-the-go without carrying heavy washing equipment or harming the environment. The concept of the Scrubba wash bag was born, giving rise to an ongoing commitment to develop products that are: 

Lightweight 
Multi-functional
Durable and of high-quality
Environmentally-conscious
Compact

Our latest innovation, the Scrubba weightless wallet, is so important to us because it embodies these high standards and aligns perfectly with our core company values. 


The Scrubba Weightless Wallet 
Upcycled using excess material from the lightweight and durable Scrubba wash bag, the weightless wallet supports the health and vitality of both the planet and the people who enjoy it. Ideal for all kinds of travel and physical activity, the moisture-resistant fabric has been paired with edges designed to lightly fray over time, helping your wallet to develop an aged look with a unique character that tells your story. The weightless wallet is: 

Upcycled and repurposed
Thin and light (weights only 7g/0.24oz) 
Equipped with tear-resistant, high frequency welded seams
Compact and expandable
Constructed from durable 40 denier nylon fabric lined with polyurethane 
Sweat- and water-resistant
Compatible with all common currencies and fits up to 12 cards
Available with optional RFID-blocking sleeves


This means that the weightless wallet: 

Prevents sweaty and wet money
Fits easily in tight travel and active wear pockets
Avoids wallet bulge
Can easily and safely carry all your monetary essentials


Which makes it perfect for: 

Physical activity including cycling, yoga and jogging
Water or winter sports including canoeing, boating and skiing
Travel and related activities such as hiking and camping






RFID Protection 
To reduce weight and keep the wallet as streamlined as possible for sports' enthusiasts and hikers, RFID protection is offered via the use of separate, lightweight sleeves. Made from flexible, durable aluminium, the sleeves not only add a little style to the weightless wallet, but are highly practical. Fitting up to two cards each, you can simply insert the sleeves into the weightless wallet as desired – perfect for on-the-go travellers – or remove them when additional bulk and security are unwanted or unnecessary – great for those tough workout sessions. The sleeves weigh around 1.5g (0.05oz) each and measure 9 x 6cm (3.5 x 2.4”), enabling them to fit snugly inside the wallet while adding only minimal weight and bulk. 

Colour Selections: 
The weightless wallet is available in green, black and white, although the last two colours will be subject to limited availability. This is because our commitment to create a product that has been 100% upcycled from excess material leaves us with a higher proportion of the vibrant green fabric that makes up our famous Scrubba wash bag. Although we will always strive to deliver on colour preference, backers should note that the white and black colours are in limited supply and cannot be guaranteed.

What We Need & What You Get
The Scrubba weightless wallet has recently seen great success on Kickstarter, where it reached its goal within only 2.5 hours of its campaign launch. As we are already fully funded, all current pledges will act as a pre-order for guaranteed product and will further support our commitment to help both people and the planet experience the positive effects of exercise and activity. 

Our Promise
The Scrubba weightless wallet is our third product to be successfully crowdfunded and follows our well-known Scrubba W pack (2015) and Scrubba wash bag (2012) campaigns. The success of our former projects, coupled with our dedication to honesty and transparency in all our endeavours, leaves us wholly confident that all promises for this campaign will be promptly and efficiently delivered. As we are repurposing excess material from an existing product line, we have all the required materials ready to go and therefore do not anticipate any complications. Nevertheless, any potential delays will be swiftly communicated and managed, with a detailed action plan provided at first opportunity.   

Other Ways You Can Help
Even if the weightless wallet isn't for you, we still value your input and appreciate your support. That's why we'd love you to: 

Let your friends and family know about the weightless wallet 
Use the Indiegogo share tools to spread the word online

Thanks so much for your support and enthusiasm - The Scrubba Team

story:
Locus Timepieces essentially designed a new class of minimalist watches. We innovated a change in time that we want the world to see. We noticed that most minimalist watches look exactly the same which inspired us to make a minimalist watch like no other. Why would you want to fit in when you have the opportunity to stand out?  We present to you "The Legacy".  Everyone creates their own legacy no matter how big or small.  When creating a legacy you must live in the present learn from the past and prepare for the future.

Our team consists of recent college graduates specializing in Engineering, Finance and Fashion. While extensively researching the minimalist watch market we came to a conclusion that not many designs are offered. We didn't let the current trend be our guide, instead we let our creativity and determination differentiate us from our competitors. We want to be that difference you're looking for. After working on the sole design for almost a year, we finally have a watch we are excited to show the world. We're very eager to launch our watch brand and bring the world new designs that will make you stand out.

HOW WE DO IT

  • Supply Chain - Thanks to our direct to consumer approach and our great relationship with our manufacturer,  we're able to provide high quality watches at an affordable price.  We skip all the retail markups so that means more savings for our supporters. 
  • Design - Our team of designers, engineers and quality control specialists work around the clock to make all of this possible.  This consisted of traveling to multiple places and getting feedback from other designers. Connecting with engineers to perfect our design, and ensuring that all the materials being used are exceeding our expectations.
  • High Quality - All of our watches are carefully manufactured until perfected. A strong 316L stainless steel watch bezel provides tremendous durability to all our watches. Followed by our very reliable Japanese Miyota GL10 movement (used in high end Citizen watches) along with our high quality straps, we are very confident with the quality of our timepieces.
  • Manufacturer - Our manufacturer controls production in strict accordance with ISO9001 Quality Management System in order to ensure that every product is in line with international testing standards.  Quality is our main goal and we don't cut any corners to achieve it.

We want to prove that an affordable watch can be a high quality product without breaking the bank.  Our watches guarantee luxury affordability and high quality.  This is what the consumer demands and this is why we are providing it to you.

In our design we captured a significant idea. Time is controlled by no one and also has no boundaries besides the ones we place our self. This is why we created something different. We broke out of the boundaries normally seen in minimalist watches.  Art can be interpreted in many ways each interpretation based on your lifestyle.  This timepiece is our work of art. 

No matter where you are in the world, always remember time can only be told by you!  You are the one that decides what you do with your time. You are the one that determines whether your time was used wisely. 

We want to design a whole collection of watches for our supporters. Our goal is to make a strong impact in the minimalist watch market.. Together we can change the watch industry through our innovated designs.  In order for us to bring this watch to your hands we need to raise the capital needed to fund our first purchase order.  We strongly believe that this is attainable with your help.  Please help us by sharing our project on social media platforms such as Facebook, Instagram etc..  Anything helps!  Thank you.

 "There are an awful lot of so-called minimalist watches on the market but, truth be told, they are all remarkably similar from a visual perspective and many men will want to stand out from the crowd a little and that’s definitely what a Locus Watch will let you do." - Leo Davie -owner of The Coolector.

While in the process of creating numerous prototypes we were already creating a buzz.  We explored many options when it comes to materials, size and colors.  Experimenting and perfecting our timepiece's to what we present to you today.  People would always compliment and ask "What kind of watch is that?".  It's unlike other watches so its meant to catch your eye. 

As you may have noticed, our logo is not on the face of the watch. We believe it isn't essential to the design.  In fact, the sole design will become recognized because of it. The logo is engraved on the left side of the watch case as well as the back of the watch.

With time comes change and with change came Locus.

Specifications

  • Case Thickness: 7.8 mm 
  • Case Material: 316 L Stainless Steel  
  • Back Plating: 316 L Stainless Steel
  • Clasp Material: 316 L Stainless Steel
  • Band Material: Genuine Leather Strap, Stainless Steel Mesh Strap, Silicon Sport Strap. 
  • Band max length = 23 cm  
  • Band min length = 17 cm
  • Band width = 22 cm
  • Dial Window Material: Hardened Mineral Crystal. (Sapphire crystal as stretch goal) 
  • Movement: Japanese Miyota (Citizen) GL10
  • Battery: Original 24 Months
  • Date Function: Yes 
  • Water Resistant: 3 ATM / 30 Meters
  • Case Diameter: 45 mm
  • Face Diameter: 40 mm
  • Total Weight: 57 g
  • The Hour and Minute tickers are luminous. 

  Watch Function

  SPORTS BAND COLLECTION 

Our high grade silicon sport strap is perfect for the everyday explorer. This very durable strap feels great and will endure any adventure.    

Starting at $95  FREE WORLDWIDE SHIPPING. (Future retail - $110 + tax)

For a more sleek look, we introduce to you our high quality genuine leather strap. Look great with our awesome leather strap.  

Starting at $105 FREE WORLDWIDE SHIPPING. (Future retail - $120 + tax )

 

STAINLESS STEEL MESH BAND COLLECTION

 For a more professional look, we introduce to you our best strap yet. This 316L stainless steel mesh strap fits perfect for those who need to look their best at all times.  

Starting at $115 FREE WORLDWIDE SHIPPING. (Future retail - $130 + tax )


Shipping  

Every order ships FREE WORLDWIDE. We are excited to announce that we will be shipping worldwide with the exception of Argentina, Belarus, Cuba, Iran, Iraq, Lebanon, Libya, Myanmar/Burma, North Korea, Russia, Somalia, Sudan, Syria, and Yemen. You are responsible for duties, fees and taxes applicable to your region.

Warranty 

Each watch comes with a limited 2 year manufacturer warranty which includes any problems with the watch movement.  Please contact us for further details.

Claiming your reward

We are just as excited as you are!!  We will be sending out a survey at the conclusion of the Indiegogo campaign where you will indicate which watches you want and confirm your shipping address and other details.

Have a Question?  We're here for you

If you have any questions or concerns feel free to email us at Info@locuswatches.com.  We'd be more than happy to answer any questions.

Engage with us

Risks and challenges

Our main challenge is spreading the word to help raise the capital needed to fund our first purchase order. Although there is always the risk of manufacturer delays, we are very confident that all watches will be shipped out no later than June 2016. We have a great relationship with our manufacturer and if any problems do arise we promise to keep everyone updated.

story:
ALL orders made before the end of the campaign (even if we don't reach our funding goal) will be made and delivered!


JOIN US IN CHANGING THE FASHION INDUSTRY

It is no secret that today’s fashion industry exploits women, both those who make clothes and who wear them.   

We have been building a real alternative to the fashion industry since 2008.  Our own island of ethical, judgment-free fashion created for women of different colors, different faiths and different sizes.

We are not alone – we are proud to be a part of a global movement for independent fashion. 

You too can join this movement. 

Invest in our next collection to support our mission of making the fashion industry more ethical. 

Create more sustainable jobs for women who need them the most, and help us stand up to objectification and misrepresentation of women. 

And spread the word through Facebook, Twitter, and Pinterest!

DESIGNED FOR REAL WOMEN

AZIRA clothes are designed to serve you.  They will follow your mood, show what you want to show and keep hidden what you don’t.  In our clothes you can feel cozy or strong, playful or fierce as your mood takes you – all in one day. 

And you will always, always be comfortable because we build our clothes around real women’s figures – not the average size statistics, and not the boyish forms of teenage runway stars. 

All the women you saw in our video are not professional models – they have jobs and careers just like yours, education and religious beliefs, families and hobbies.

MADE WHEREVER WOMEN NEED JOBS 

Every AZIRA garment is made by women who work in good conditions and earn a fair pay. 

In Casablanca, our collections are produced at a workshop that hires single mothers, who have very few job opportunities. 

In Brussels, we work with Mulieris, an atelier that helps women in difficult circumstances to learn a new profession.

Photo: Mulieris team, Brussels

EXCLUSIVE MINI-COLLECTION, LIMITED TIME ONLY

To thank you for your support, we’ve prepared several exceptional, never-to-be-repeated pieces just for this crowdfunding mini-collection. 

The amazing Evening Dress will only be available in Sensuous Red through this campaign, and the fabulous Dragon Dress will be available in Rosé. 

Tunics, turbans and pants will have Indiegogo-exclusive details in Old Silver.  

Every item will proudly bear the crowdfunding-exclusive THANK YOU tag.

To show our gratitude for your support, we will add a gift to each package.

PERK DESCRIPTIONS

Turban (€ 25)

FR: TURBAN.

A perfect accessory for a turbanista to complete an ensemble – or a super-quick fix for a bad hair day…

Made of luxurious medium-grade fleecy viscose blend.

Starting colors: Deep Black and Old Silver.

Choose the detail color: Old Silver, Rose or Sensuous Red.

We’ll add a small AZIRA-branded surprise gift – thank you! 

Please add € 9 for shipping within the EU, € 18 for the rest of the world.

Shawl (€ 25)

FR: CHÂLE.

Made of thin, lightweight viscose blend, the shawl is a great way to show your support.

Starting colors: Deep Black and Old Silver.

We’ll add a small AZIRA-branded surprise gift – thank you! 

Please add € 9 for shipping within the EU, € 18 for the rest of the world.

Short Tunic (€ 49)

FR: TUNIQUE COURTE.

Simple and sporty, this tunic is a comfortable choice for the weekend – or for dancing the night away.

Made of luxurious medium-grade fleecy viscose blend. 

Starting color: Deep Black 

Starting details: Old Silver.

Gift to thank you for your support: shawl or turban in matching colors, value of € 29.

Please add € 9 for shipping within the EU, € 18 for the rest of the world.

Short Hoodie Tunic (€ 69)

A perfect embodiment for the AZIRA philosophy: maximum versatility with a hood that you can zip on if you’d like to cover your head.

Made of a medium-grade fleecy viscose blend. 

Starting color: Deep Black.

Starting details: Old Silver.

Gift to thank you for your support: shawl or turban in matching colors, value of € 29.

Please add € 9 for shipping within the EU, € 18 for the rest of the world.

Sporty jacket with hood (€ 89)

FR: GILET SPORTIF A CAPUCHE

Lightweight jacket with a large collar - or a quick hood, if you prefer – that goes great with everything.

Made of a luxurious medium-grade fleecy viscose blend. 

Starting color: Deep Black.

Gift to thank you for your support: shawl or turban in matching colors, value of € 29.

Please add € 9 for shipping within the EU, € 18 for the rest of the world.

Knee-length dress with collar (€ 89)

FR: Robe a Cole Amovible

This sporty dress is ideal for a casual day.  Unzip the collar, add heels for a touch of glamour – and you’re ready for a cozy night out with friends.

Made of luxurious medium-grade fleecy viscose blend. 

Starting color: Deep Black.

Starting details: Old Silver.

Gift to thank you for your support: shawl or turban in matching colors, value of € 29.

Please add € 9 for shipping within the EU, € 18 for the rest of the world.

Dragon Dress (€ 89)

FR: Robe Dragon 

Change your look to go with your mood – turn this dress around to move the décolleté from back to front. 

Made of fluid viscose jersey blend. 

Starting color: choose between Rosé (only available through crowdfunding) and Deep Black.

Gift to thank you for your support: shawl or turban in matching colors, value of € 29.

Please add € 9 for shipping within the EU, € 18 for the rest of the world.

Evening dress (€ 129)

FR: Robe de soirée

This absolutely stunning floor-length dress lets you cover your shoulders or show off your back.

Made of fluid viscose jersey blend. 

Starting color: Sensuous Red (only available through crowdfunding) or Deep Black

Gift to thank you for your support: shawl or turban in matching colors, value of € 29.

Please add € 9 for shipping within the EU, € 18 for the rest of the world.

Check out how young blogger Ruba makes this dress her own: 

Weekend set (EUR € 138)

FR : Ensemble Week-End

Add Seroual Pants to the Short Hoodie Tunic, and your weekend ensemble is complete.

Made of luxurious medium-grade fleecy viscose blend. 

Starting color: Deep Black

Starting details: Old Silver

Gift to thank you for your support: shawl or turban in matching colors, value of € 29.

Please add € 9 for shipping within the EU, € 18 for the rest of the world.

Dragon Dress set (€ 138)

FR: Ensemble Robe Dragon

Add a pair of designer leggings to the Dragon Dress to show less leg.

Both dress and leggings are made of the viscose jersey blend. 

Starting color: choose between Rosé (only available through crowdfunding) and Deep Black for the dress, and Old Silver and Deep Black for the leggings.

Gift to thank you for your support: shawl or turban in matching colors, € 29 value – and we really recommend the turban!

Please add € 9 for shipping within the EU, € 18 for the rest of the world.

Elegant weekend set (€ 227)

FR: Ensemble Week-End Élégant

A complete weekend outfit to keep you extra snuggly and warm in style.  Includes:

- Light jacket with hood

- Knee-length dress

- Sporty designer leggings

All three items are made of luxurious medium-grade fleecy viscose blend.

Starting color: Deep Black

Starting details for the dress: Old Silver.

Gift to thank you for your support: shawl AND turban in matching colors, value of € 58.

Please add € 9 for shipping within the EU, € 18 for the rest of the world.

Complete sporty set (€ 365)

FR: Ensemble Atletique Complète

One of every sporty item in our collection for maximum comfort.  Includes:

- Short Hoodie Tunic

- Seroual Pants

- Knee-length dress with collar

- Sporty Leggings

- Sporty light jacket.

All five items are made of luxurious medium-grade fleecy viscose blend.

Starting color: Deep Black.

Starting details: Old Silver.

Gift to thank you for your support: shawl AND turban in matching colors, value of € 58.

Please add € 9 for shipping within the EU, € 18 for the rest of the world.

Ultimate collection (€ 632)

FR: Collection Complète

In this package:

- Short Hoodie Tunic

- Seroual Pants

- Sporty light jacket with hood

- Knee-length Hoodie dress

- Sporty Leggings

- Dragon Dress

- Dress leggings

- Evening Dress

Thank you very, very much!

Gift to thank you for your support: an additional Dragon dress or Evening Dress in the second color, a shawl and a turban, total value of € 127 - € 187.


Please add € 9 for shipping within the EU, € 18 for the rest of the world.

FAQs:

  • Can we ship internationally? Yes! Please add EUR 9 to your pledge for shipping in Europe, and EUR 18 for shipping everywhere else in the world. 

  • When I made my contribution, not all colors were available yet.  Can I get my order in one of the new colors? We'll email you when it's time to ship to pick a color of your choice.

  • What sizes will be available?  Small (34-36), Medium (38-40), Large (42-44), and Extra Large (46-48).  FIND A TABLE.

  • I have a question and need to talk to someone. Email us at crowdfunding@azira.be. We'll do our best to respond within a day.

MOUVEMENT MONDIAL POUR UNE MODE SANS PRÉJUGÉS

Ce n’est un secret pour personne : l’industrie de la mode actuelle exploite les femmes, celles qui fabriquent les vêtements comme celles qui les portent.    

Depuis 2008, nous proposons une véritable alternative à l’industrie de la mode, une mode éthique sans préjugés qui est destinée à des femmes de couleur, de croyance et de taille différentes.

Et nous ne sommes pas les seuls ! Nous sommes fiers de faire partie d’un mouvement mondial en faveur d’une mode indépendante.   

Vous pouvez vous joindre à ce mouvement.   

Investissez dans notre prochaine collection pour nous aider à réaliser notre objectif et rendre  l’industrie de la mode plus éthique.   

Aidez-nous à créer des emplois durables pour les femmes pour qui c’est une nécessité et à lutter contre l’exploitation et la sous-représentation des femmes. 

Diffusez ce message sur Facebook, Twitter et Pinterest ! 

DES VÊTEMENTS CRÉÉS POUR DE VRAIES FEMMES

Les vêtements AZIRA ont été spécialement créés pour vous servir. Ils s’adaptent à vos humeurs et ne dévoilent que ce que vous désirez révéler. Ils vous accompagnent au gré de vos envies, tout au long de la journée.    

Le sentiment de confort prime toujours, car nos vêtements sont coupés pour de vraies femmes ; ils ne reflètent donc pas des statistiques établies en matière de tailles ni les silhouettes des stars des défilés.  

Les femmes que vous avez vues dans notre clip ne sont pas des mannequins professionnels. Comme vous, elles occupent un emploi, font carrière, ont des convictions religieuses, une famille et des hobbies.  

DES VÊTEMENTS FABRIQUÉS LÀ OÙ LES FEMMES ONT BESOIN D’UN EMPLOI  

Chaque vêtement AZIRA est fabriqué par des femmes qui travaillent dans de bonnes conditions et à qui on assure un revenu équitable.  

À Casablanca, nos collections sont produites dans un atelier qui embauche des mères isolées qui ont très peu d’opportunités d’emploi.  

À Bruxelles, nous collaborons avec Mulieris, un atelier qui aide les femmes en difficulté et leur apprend un nouveau métier. 

Photo: Mulieris team, Brussels 

UNE MINI-COLLECTION EXCLUSIVE ET TEMPORAIRE

Pour vous remercier de votre soutien, nous avons créé une mini-collection de pièces exceptionnelles et exclusives pour cette collecte de fonds.   

Pour cette campagne, notre sublime robe de soirée ne sera disponible qu’en Rouge Intense et notre fabuleuse robe dragon, uniquement en Rose.  

Les tuniques, turbans et pantalons seront rehaussés de détails exclusifs Indiegogo en Argent Antique.  

Chaque article portera fièrement l’étiquette exclusive « MERCI » de la campagne de collecte de fonds. 

En témoignage de notre gratitude, nous vous offrons un cadeau lors de chaque achat. 

Turban (25 €)

C’est l’accessoire parfait pour parachever une tenue ou une solution-minute pour cacher une mèche rebelle !  

Mélange de luxueuses fibres de viscose non tissées.  

Couleurs disponibles actuellement : Noir Profond et Argent Antique.

Choisissez la couleur des détails : Argent Antique, Rose ou Rouge Intense. 

Nous vous offrons un petit cadeau surprise. Merci à vous !  

Frais de port (TTC): € 9 pour l'UE et € 18 pour le reste du monde.

Châle (25 €)

Un châle fin en fibres de viscose est un excellent moyen de nous manifester votre soutien.

Couleurs disponibles actuellement : Noir Profond et Argent Antique.

À l’achat d’un châle, AZIRA vous offre en prime un petit cadeau surprise. Merci à vous ! 

Frais de port (TTC): € 9 pour l'UE et € 18 pour le reste du monde. 

Tunique Courte (49 €)

Simple et sportive, cette tunique est un must pour passer un week-end confort ou faire la fête toute la nuit ! 

Mélange de luxueuses fibres de viscose non tissées.  

Couleur disponible actuellement : Noir Profond.  

Couleur des détails disponible actuellement : Argent Antique.

Pour vous remercier de votre soutien, nous vous offrons le châle ou le turban assortis (pour une valeur de 29 euros).

Frais de port (TTC): € 9 pour l'UE et € 18 pour le reste du monde.

Tunique Courte à Capuche (69 €)

Cette tunique est la personnification de la philosophie AZIRA : elle est polyvalente et la fermeture zippée de sa capuche amovible vous permet également de vous couvrir la tête. 

Mélange de fibres de viscose non tissées.  

Couleur disponible actuellement : Noir Profond. 

Couleur des détails disponible actuellement : Argent Antique.

Pour vous remercier de votre soutien, nous vous offrons le châle ou le turban assortis (pour une valeur de 29 euros).

Frais de port (TTC): € 9 pour l'UE et € 18 pour le reste du monde.

Veste Sport à Capuche (89 €)

Une veste légère avec un large col qui peut également se transformer en capuche. 

Mélange de luxueuses fibres de viscose non tissées.  

Couleur disponible actuellement : Noir Profond. 

Pour vous remercier de votre soutien, nous vous offrons le châle ou le turban assortis (pour une valeur de 29 euros).

Frais de port (TTC): € 9 pour l'UE et € 18 pour le reste du monde.

Robe à Col Amovible (89 €)

Une robe sport qui assure une allure décontractée. Enlevez le col et chaussez des escarpins pour la touche de glamour et vous voilà prête pour une soirée entre amis. 

Mélange de luxueuses fibres de viscose non tissées.  

Couleur disponible actuellement : Noir Profond.

Couleur des détails disponible actuellement : Argent Antique.

Pour vous remercier de votre soutien, nous vous offrons le châle ou le turban assortis (pour une valeur de 29 euros).

Frais de port (TTC): € 9 pour l'UE et € 18 pour le reste du monde.

Robe Dragon (89 €)

Changez votre look en fonction de votre humeur et portez le décolleté de cette robe dans le dos pour un tout autre effet.   

En jersey de viscose souple.  

Couleurs disponibles actuellement : Rose (uniquement disponible pendant la campagne de collecte de fonds) et Noir Profond.

Pour vous remercier de votre soutien, nous vous offrons le châle ou le turban assortis (pour une valeur de 29 euros).

Frais de port (TTC): € 9 pour l'UE et € 18 pour le reste du monde.

Robe de Soirée (129 €)

Cette sublime robe de soirée permet de couvrir les épaules ou de découvrir le dos. 

En jersey de viscose souple.  

Couleurs disponibles actuellement : Rouge Intense (uniquement disponible pendant la campagne de collecte de fonds) ou Noir Profond. 

Pour vous remercier de votre soutien, nous vous offrons le châle ou le turban assortis (pour une valeur de 29 euros).

Frais de port (TTC): € 9 pour l'UE et € 18 pour le reste du monde.

La magnifique bloggeuse Ruba était de passage à Bruxelles et s'est réappropriée les vêtements AZIRA. 

Ensemble de Week-End (138 €)

Associez la tunique courte à capuche à un pantalon sarouel et vous disposez d’une tenue de week-end parfaite. 

Mélange de luxueuses fibres de viscose non tissées.  

Couleur disponible actuellement : Noir Profond.

Couleur des détails disponible actuellement : Argent Antique. 

Pour vous remercier de votre soutien, nous vous offrons le châle ou le turban assortis (pour une valeur de 29 euros).

Frais de port (TTC): € 9 pour l'UE et € 18 pour le reste du monde.

Ensemble Robe Dragon (138 €)

Un legging stylé porté sous la robe dragon permet de couvrir les jambes.  

La robe et le legging sont tous deux en jersey de viscose souple.  

Couleurs disponibles actuellement pour la robe : Rose (uniquement pendant la campagne de collecte de fonds) et Noir Profond ; pour le legging : Argent Antique et Noir Profond. 

Pour vous remercier de votre soutien, nous vous offrons le châle ou le turban assortis (pour une valeur de 29 euros). Le turban est vivement recommandé !

Frais de port (TTC): € 9 pour l'UE et € 18 pour le reste du monde.

Ensemble de Week-end Élégant (227 €)

Une tenue de week-end confort et chaude tout en restant élégante. Elle comprend : 

  • Une veste légère à capuche ;
  • Une robe aux genoux ;
  • Un legging sport.

Mélange de luxueuses fibres de viscose non tissées (valable pour les trois pièces).

Couleur disponible actuellement : Noir Profond.

Couleur des détails disponible pour la robe : Argent Antique.

Pour vous remercier de votre soutien, nous vous offrons le châle ET le turban assortis (pour une valeur de 58 euros).

Frais de port (TTC): € 9 pour l'UE et € 18 pour le reste du monde.

Ensemble Atletique Compléte (329 €)

Tous les articles sport de notre collection pour un confort maximum. Cet ensemble comprend : 

  • Une tunique courte à capuche ;
  • Un pantalon sarouel ; 
  • Une robe aux genoux avec col amovible ;
  • Un legging sport ;
  • Une veste sport légère.

Mélange de luxueuses fibres de viscose non tissées (valable pour les cinq articles).

Couleur disponible actuellement : Noir Profond.

Couleur des détails disponible actuellement : Argent Antique.

Pour vous remercier de votre soutien, nous vous offrons le châle ET le turban assortis (pour une valeur de 58 euros).

Frais de port (TTC): € 9 pour l'UE et € 18 pour le reste du monde.

Collection Complète (632 €)

Nous vous aimons. 

Vraiment. 

Ce colis comprend :  

  • Une tunique courte à capuche ;
  • Un pantalon sarouel ; 
  • Une veste sport légère à capuche ;
  • Une robe aux genoux avec col amovible ;
  • Un legging sport ; 
  • Une robe dragon ;
  • Un legging stylé ;
  • Une robe de soirée. 

Merci mille fois ! 

Pour vous remercier de votre soutien, nous vous offrons une robe dragon supplémentaire ou une robe de soirée supplémentaire à choisir dans la seconde couleur disponible, ainsi qu’un châle et un turban (valeur de €127 - €187).

Frais de port (TTC): € 9 pour l'UE et € 18 pour le reste du monde.

QUESTIONS FRÉQUEMMENT POSÉES

  • Faites-vous des envois à l’étranger ? Oui ! Comptez 9 euros pour un envoi en Europe et 18 euros pour le reste du monde.  

  • Au moment où j’ai versé mon don, toutes les couleurs n’étaient pas encore disponibles. Puis-je recevoir ma commande dans l’une des nouvelles couleurs ?  Au moment de l’expédition, nous vous contacterons par mail pour vous demander de choisir une couleur.

  • Quelles seront les tailles disponibles ?  Small (34-36), Medium (38-40), Large (42-44) et Extra Large (46-48). 

  • J’ai une question. À qui puis-je l’adresser ? Envoyez un mail à crowdfunding@azira.be. Nous ferons de notre mieux pour vous répondre dans 1 jour.
story_txt:
ALL orders made before the end of the campaign (even if we don't reach our funding goal) will be made and delivered!JOIN US IN CHANGING THE FASHION INDUSTRY
It is no secret that today’s fashion industry exploits women, both those who make clothes and who wear them.   We have been building a real alternative to the fashion industry since 2008.  Our own island of ethical, judgment-free fashion created for women of different colors, different faiths and different sizes.We are not alone – we are proud to be a part of a global movement for independent fashion. You too can join this movement. Invest in our next collection to support our mission of making the fashion industry more ethical. Create more sustainable jobs for women who need them the most, and help us stand up to objectification and misrepresentation of women. And spread the word through Facebook, Twitter, and Pinterest!DESIGNED FOR REAL WOMENAZIRA clothes are designed to serve you.  They will follow your mood, show what you want to show and keep hidden what you don’t.  In our clothes you can feel cozy or strong, playful or fierce as your mood takes you – all in one day. And you will always, always be comfortable because we build our clothes around real women’s figures – not the average size statistics, and not the boyish forms of teenage runway stars. All the women you saw in our video are not professional models – they have jobs and careers just like yours, education and religious beliefs, families and hobbies.MADE WHEREVER WOMEN NEED JOBS Every AZIRA garment is made by women who work in good conditions and earn a fair pay. In Casablanca, our collections are produced at a workshop that hires single mothers, who have very few job opportunities. In Brussels, we work with Mulieris, an atelier that helps women in difficult circumstances to learn a new profession.Photo: Mulieris team, BrusselsEXCLUSIVE MINI-COLLECTION, LIMITED TIME ONLYTo thank you for your support, we’ve prepared several exceptional, never-to-be-repeated pieces just for this crowdfunding mini-collection. The amazing Evening Dress will only be available in Sensuous Red through this campaign, and the fabulous Dragon Dress will be available in Rosé. Tunics, turbans and pants will have Indiegogo-exclusive details in Old Silver.  Every item will proudly bear the crowdfunding-exclusive THANK YOU tag.To show our gratitude for your support, we will add a gift to each package.PERK DESCRIPTIONS

Une robe sport qui assure une allure décontractée. Enlevez le col et chaussez des escarpins pour la touche de glamour et vous voilà prête pour une soirée entre amis. 
Mélange de luxueuses fibres de viscose non tissées.  
Couleur disponible actuellement : Noir Profond.
Couleur des détails disponible actuellement : Argent Antique.
Pour vous remercier de votre soutien, nous vous offrons le châle ou le turban assortis (pour une valeur de 29 euros).
Frais de port (TTC): € 9 pour l'UE et € 18 pour le reste du monde.




Robe Dragon (89 €)

Changez votre look en fonction de votre humeur et portez le décolleté de cette robe dans le dos pour un tout autre effet.   
En jersey de viscose souple.  
Couleurs disponibles actuellement : Rose (uniquement disponible pendant la campagne de collecte de fonds) et Noir Profond.
Pour vous remercier de votre soutien, nous vous offrons le châle ou le turban assortis (pour une valeur de 29 euros).
Frais de port (TTC): € 9 pour l'UE et € 18 pour le reste du monde.




Robe de Soirée (129 €)

Cette sublime robe de soirée permet de couvrir les épaules ou de découvrir le dos. 
En jersey de viscose souple.  
Couleurs disponibles actuellement : Rouge Intense (uniquement disponible pendant la campagne de collecte de fonds) ou Noir Profond. 
Pour vous remercier de votre soutien, nous vous offrons le châle ou le turban assortis (pour une valeur de 29 euros).
Frais de port (TTC): € 9 pour l'UE et € 18 pour le reste du monde.





La magnifique
bloggeuse Ruba était de passage à Bruxelles et s'est réappropriée les vêtements
AZIRA. 

Ensemble de Week-End (138 €)

Associez la tunique courte à capuche à un pantalon sarouel et vous disposez d’une tenue de week-end parfaite. 
Mélange de luxueuses fibres de viscose non tissées.  
Couleur disponible actuellement : Noir Profond.
Couleur des détails disponible actuellement : Argent Antique. 
Pour vous remercier de votre soutien, nous vous offrons le châle ou le turban assortis (pour une valeur de 29 euros).
Frais de port (TTC): € 9 pour l'UE et € 18 pour le reste du monde.





Ensemble Robe Dragon (138 €)

Un legging stylé porté sous la robe dragon permet de couvrir les jambes.  
La robe et le legging sont tous deux en jersey de viscose souple.  
Couleurs disponibles actuellement pour la robe : Rose (uniquement pendant la campagne de collecte de fonds) et Noir Profond ; pour le legging : Argent Antique et Noir Profond. 
Pour vous remercier de votre soutien, nous vous offrons le châle ou le turban assortis (pour une valeur de 29 euros). Le turban est vivement recommandé !
Frais de port (TTC): € 9 pour l'UE et € 18 pour le reste du monde.


Ensemble de Week-end Élégant (227 €)Une tenue de week-end confort et chaude tout en restant élégante. Elle comprend : 

Une veste légère à capuche ;
Une robe aux genoux ;
Un legging sport.
Mélange de luxueuses fibres de viscose non tissées (valable pour les trois pièces).
Couleur disponible actuellement : Noir Profond.
Couleur des détails disponible pour la robe : Argent Antique.
Pour vous remercier de votre soutien, nous vous offrons le châle ET le turban assortis (pour une valeur de 58 euros).Frais de port (TTC): € 9 pour l'UE et € 18 pour le reste du monde.
Ensemble Atletique Compléte (329 €)Tous les articles sport de notre collection pour un confort maximum. Cet ensemble comprend : 

Une tunique courte à capuche ;
Un pantalon sarouel ; 
Une robe aux genoux avec col amovible ;
Un legging sport ;
Une veste sport légère.
Mélange de luxueuses fibres de viscose non tissées (valable pour les cinq articles).
Couleur disponible actuellement : Noir Profond.
Couleur des détails disponible actuellement : Argent Antique.
Pour vous remercier de votre soutien, nous vous offrons le châle ET le turban assortis (pour une valeur de 58 euros).Frais de port (TTC): € 9 pour l'UE et € 18 pour le reste du monde.
Collection Complète (632 €)
Nous vous aimons. 
Vraiment. 
Ce colis comprend :  

Une tunique courte à capuche ;
Un pantalon sarouel ; 
Une veste sport légère à capuche ;
Une robe aux genoux avec col amovible ;
Un legging sport ; 
Une robe dragon ;
Un legging stylé ;
Une robe de soirée. 
Merci mille fois ! 
Pour vous remercier de votre soutien, nous vous offrons une robe dragon supplémentaire ou une robe de soirée supplémentaire à choisir dans la seconde couleur disponible, ainsi qu’un châle et un turban (valeur de €127 - €187).Frais de port (TTC): € 9 pour l'UE et € 18 pour le reste du monde.QUESTIONS FRÉQUEMMENT POSÉES


Faites-vous des envois à l’étranger ? Oui ! Comptez 9 euros pour un envoi en Europe et 18 euros pour le reste du monde.   



Au moment où j’ai versé mon don, toutes les couleurs n’étaient pas encore disponibles. Puis-je recevoir ma commande dans l’une des nouvelles couleurs ?  Au moment de l’expédition, nous vous contacterons par mail pour vous demander de choisir une couleur.



Quelles seront les tailles disponibles ?  Small (34-36), Medium (38-40), Large (42-44) et Extra Large (46-48). 


J’ai une question. À qui puis-je l’adresser ? Envoyez un mail à crowdfunding@azira.be. Nous ferons de notre mieux pour vous répondre dans 1 jour.

story:
WHAT IS DOUBLEPLAY SPORTSWEAR?

DoublePlay Sportswear was founded by Bonnie-Jill Laflin, the NBA's first and only female scout.  She is also the founder of Hounds & Heroes, a charity dedicated to helping our veterans and animal rescue.  

 

DoublePlay was successfully launched as a result of Bonnie-Jill's numerous high-profile connections.  Through these connections, she was able to secure individual merchandise license deals with the USA's premiere sports leagues.  To date, Bonnie-Jill has license agreements with the Los Angeles Lakers, Dalls Cowboys, San Francisco Giants and San Francisco 49'ers.  In all cases, Bonnie-Jill was able to able to go straight to the top to secure these license deals being close, personal friends with Jerry Jones and the late Dr. Buss.   

We all know sports are never going away.  Sports are what most Americans are passionate about and gives them a distraction from their everyday lives.  And we all know how much consumers and celebrities can't get enough of their favorite game wear! Apparel offered to woman at sporting venues (and clothing stores) is often dumpy, not sexy and unversatile.  DoublePlay changes all that offering sexy, comfortable designs for women to cheer on their favorite team.  Best part...our pieces will offer breakaway designs that can be worn with everyday wear offering a 2-1 function!

 

DoublePlay Sportswear is now seeking to expand their license catalogue and product line and you can help!  The best part is that not only will you be helping DoublePlay reach it's next level, you will also help out Hounds & Heroes as DoublePlay will donate 5% of earnings through this campaign to that cause. http://houndsandheroes.com/

 

WHAT $100,000 WILL GET DOUBLEPLAY

First, we are just going to say that there are no cooler giveaways on this site for ANY campaign than you will find right here.  C'mon...who doesn't want a meet a greet with their favorite player??  Or to attend on-field batting practice?? And it's truly because Bonnie-Jill is so well connected and respected in the sports world that we can offer AND deliver these perks!! AND, if you don't see a perk here that you are interested in and want to contribute to DoublePlay, email us directly and let us know your favorite team/player...we just might be able to do something for you!!! 

Our funding goal will help us do the following:

  • Engage reputable designer to help us keep up in current trending fashion
  • Develop 5-6 new product samples for product lines
  • Secure 2-3 new license relationships with individual teams.  Current target teams are Boston Red Sox, Denver Nuggets and Oakland Raiders.

 

BOTTOM LINE WITH THIS CAMPAIGN: YOU WILL HELP OUT DOUBLEPLAY, A GOOD CAUSE AND WALK AWAY WITH A VERY COOL PERK!

story:
Thank you for visiting our

Help

Athlete 2.0 Evolve 

campaign


Welcome to the world of Athlete2.0

A cutting edge brand that represents the evolution of the modern day Athlete.
Besides our innovative clothing and equipment line,

 the key things that set us apart from other sports brands are -

*Our in-house media production department which promotes our Athletes and products on our You tube channel Athlete 2.0 Television.

& 

*We also act as a sponsorship agent

 for the athletes we work with ensuring they retain 100% of the funding we source. 



Who we are

After 6 months of dedicated training in MMA 2 years ago I had lost over 30 kgs (66pounds) and started feeling like a 2.0 version of myself.

 It was a life changing experience that inspired me to realise that I needed to make my dream a reality.


Through the motivation from training in the sport I loved and through the desire to wear fashion I liked instead of what just fitted I decided to create Athlete 2.0


Athlete 2.0 wants to educate the masses about the invaluable benefits of making Martial Arts part of your life and correct the common misconceptions and negativity that surrounds the sport, as well as help mainstream it.


What We Need 


Unlike other sports the majority of Martial Arts receive little to no funding from Government bodies…

but we know what the Athletes need and with your help 

we can provide it.

  • If we reach our goal of €15,000 we can 

  • Get printing equipment and supplies
  • rent a premises for our print studio
  • Release our first official range of stock
  • Get a pop up event shop and a point of sale
  • Build a profesional website
  • Get a van
  •  by hiring 1 full time staff member Athlete 2.0 can avail of Government  staff grants which allows  us to  hire 4 more much needed staff members before December .
  • 2 of these team members will be working as sponsorship agents for our sponsored athletes, This will help with much needed financial support from sponsorship deals for training and travelling. Athletes will always receive 100% of all sponsorship deals.


                         With €25,000 we can-

Purchase professional filming, equipment which will enable us to film movie      quality productions and get more martial arts viewing on TV for you, the fans.

 




If you all share our vision 

and we are lucky enough to be super successful with our campaign and raise

 €50,000 or more 


We can-


Open our second Print studio in Poland where we can, from start to finish manufacture most of our garments to the highest quality in an EU standard work environment which will help deliver garments to the customer at an affordable price.
Having a base in Poland will allow us to start supporting all the European Athletes that have been contacting us over the last year but have not been able to do so up to this point due to our limited resources this will also open up all European events by road which we can be present at with our film crew and event shop.



How we say thanks:)


Check out our rewards list in the side bar!!!

Be the first to own the official 1st Athlete 2.0 clothing and equipment collection,  

We also have autographed memorabilia, Event/Seminar tickets, Holidays, Training weekends  and Unique once in a lifetime opportunities. 


Athlete 2.0 samples 2015 catalogue:








Other Ways You Can Help

Some of you may not be able to donate to our campaign ,

 but that doesn't mean you can't help!

we would be delighted if you could  share our campaign profile on your 

Facebook, Instagram and Twitter


Please

Follow our Updates over the next 30 days
 to see more of who we are and what we do.


If you would like us to feature on your podcast/radio/ tv show 
please contact-   scottathlete20@gmail.com
