story:
We closed our campaign extension and we were ready to say goodbye, but actually… Indiegogo wasn’t.

We’ve been selected to be one of the first campaigns to stay on Indiegogo in the “Forever Funding” section.

You can find our permanent campaign Here ! and tell your friends and family that they can still buy their Findster.

Any doubts, contact us!


There's one fear that everyone can relate to: the panic of losing a loved one.

Chills, stomach-churning, racing heart, sweat and heavy breathing… Can you imagine not knowing where your child is? Or your pet?

You don't have to. Not ever again.


We present you FINDSTER.


Thanks to Findster, you are always connected to the ones you love.

Findster tracks your loved one's activity and location, keeping you informed on their health and safety.



Findster Kids


Findster Pets


FINDSTER has been featured on:



Findster is a new and innovative GPS tracking system working towards the safety of your loved ones, finding them whenever you want to. Compared to other systems on the market, Findster is free of charge. There are no monthly fees! That's what makes us your best choice.



There are two primary devices, one for you and one for your loved one. They are wirelessly connected to each other, and all you need to make them work is the Findster's App on your smartphone.

You can follow their moves in your pre-selected area and you receive alerts whenever they leave that space. With Findster you can also see how much time your child takes getting from home to school, or from school to a friend's house.



You can increase the range and capabilities
of Findster.


To increase the ubiquity and range of Findster, there is a third device to the system, a base station that can be placed in strategic points, expanding your connection area and protecting who you care about even when you're not home.



Imagine your workplace is far from your residence. As long as you have a base station at home, you can continuously track your child or your pet in your neighborhood. Being away from home doesn't mean you can't be connected to those dearest to you.


And if your neighborhood joins Findster by getting additional base stations, the protection zone becomes even bigger. These base stations can also be placed in schools and playgrounds to increase the area of protection. The larger the Findster’s web, the more omnipresent you become.

But there's more... What about your Pet?

Have you ever wished you knew what your pet has been doing
while you were out?

Has he been resting or trying to eat your furniture?

Findster has an activity tracker option that allows you to know its activity levels during the day.


Make sure you are everywhere.


Support Findster now and be one of the first to have it, at a very (very) limited special price. Once you get it, you can use it forever WITHOUT MONTHLY FEES!

A short term step for a long term peace of mind.




Features




Findster’s Secret Sauce


The Findster ecosystem is composed of 5 components:
Portable charger, Parent/Guardian module, Child or Pet module, Basestation and smartphone App (Android and iOS).




The Child or Pet module was designed specifically to be comfortable when applied yet secure. This module includes a high-precision GPS system and a 3-axis accelerometer that enables the detection of whether the child fell or, in the pet’s case, what his activity index was throughout the day.



Wireless communication system

One of the Findster secrets is in its innovative wireless communication system, used to establish communication between the pet/child module and its guardian/parent module (or the pet/child module and the Base Station).

Our proprietary wireless protocol allows you to obtain communication range of 0.62 miles (1 km) between both modules, thereby eliminating the need to send the coordinates through a cellular connection. In this way, we have removed the required monthly fees that are intrinsic to other GPS tracking systems on the market.



Findster ecosystem


The Parent/Guardian module serves as a gateway between your smartphone and the Child or Pet module, enabling a long-range bi-directional communication between both.

All the controls and displays of data are centralised in the Findster App. 

The third element of the Findster ecosystem is the basestation.

The basestation can be placed, for example, in your home, powering a communication range of 1.24 miles (​​2 km). The basestation wireless communication uses the same proprietary protocol of the child/pet module. However, because it has no restrictions in terms of battery consumption or size, we were able to design a system with a range 2x greater than the wearable module.

And because each basestation has a wi-fi connection, even if the child or pet leaves your home’s security zone, when approaching another basestation it is automatically re-connected with your smartphone through the Cloud—always guaranteeing your privacy. 

Only you and those who you have authorised can have access to data modules.





Security zone


When the Child or Pet leaves the defined security zone, the application sends an immediate alert. If they are in the coverage radius of the Parent/Guardian module, the module’s location continues to be monitored. When the connectivity between the two modules is lost, the last detected position is saved. If this happens, the Findster ecosystem activates the alert mode and all other modules start searching for the lost Child or Pet. When they find it, they send its current location through the cloud to the Parent/Guardian’s smartphone App.

Furthermore, a module defined as lost will always look for a link to a basestation with  an internet connection. When getting this connection, it will send its current position to your smartphone and other people authorized to access the module’s location.




Technical Specifications



Dimensions



Software



Why we are different


Findster represents the next generation of GPS tracking systems, allowing a solution that combines the ubiquity of use without the need for monthly fees.


Why we need you


We have been working hard, and Findster is finally a fully functional prototype. Now we need your help to guarantee its mass production.

We’re at the starting line, ready to begin. Support us and be the first to get one.
Join our project and share it with your family and friends.
Together we can go even further and take Findster to the next step.

Why should you help us? It’s simple:

- Be the first to get one and benefit from a very special price
- Always be connected to the ones you love and guarantee their safety
- Be part of our history; let’s do it together




Rewards



For a retailer package,  email us.


The Findster Team



We don’t solve problems. We prevent them. And we have a proven track record in this.

We are a multidisciplinary team with years of experience in engineering, design and physics.


We came together with the sole purpose of creating and developing technologies that will improve your quality of life. Our goal is to bring security and peace of mind to everyone.

Findster is our way of doing it.



Risks and Challenges


Like any innovative project, the development of Findster presents some risks and several challenges. Over the past few months, the whole team has worked to ensure that none of the risks and challenges prevent us from a timely delivery of the system with the quality that our supporters deserve.

We worked with our supply chain to ensure that production will take place as scheduled. We have a fully functional prototype and we are currently working on the final version of the system.


The Findster team has developed other innovative technologies that combine software with hardware. We have the manufacturing flow line prepared, as well as the protocols for testing and validation of various critical components of our system.

We are absolutely sure that – with your support – Findsters will become a reality in time and with the quality you deserve.




FAQ


1. How can I contribute to the campaign? 

Anyone can contribute. You just need to have a PayPal account to pay the perk. If you do not have a PayPal account but have a credit card, you can use the "Pay as guest" feature in PayPal.

For instructions on how to Pay as a Guest on PayPal, please visit:  How to Contribute via PayPal without a PayPal Account.


2. How many modules can be connected to the parent/owner’s module simultaneously?

Up to 5 modules simultaneously.


3. What type of battery is used in the modules (rechargeable or replaceable)?

The Findster modules use rechargeable batteries. To recharge the battery module, simply insert the module into the basestation or connect to a Findster suitable charger (included in the perk).


4. Can other unauthorised modules be connected to my kid's/pet's module?

Not unless they are explicitly allowed (monitoring group).

Other guardian modules could serve as a gateway for sending data to the web service, but only if there is authorization from the owner of these modules.


5. How is the connection established between Findsters? How does the guardian’s module connect with the smartphone?

The pairing of the modules is made possible via the mobile application.

In the smartphone, you can see a list of compatible Findster modules and the desired module is selected using its identifier (name associated with the device), similarly to a Bluetooth connection. This connection only needs to be done once.


6. Why are two modules necessary?

The Findster’s secret sauce is its proprietary RF technology that allows for two modules to communicate in a range of up to 1km. If we were using just one module to communicate with the smartphone – as a Bluetooth tracker does – then we would only be able to achieve 50m of communication range.

We weren’t satisfied with that range, so we’ve developed our own technology. It adds an extra module to the system but enables us to communicate at a range of up to 1km.


7. What happens if the smartphone is too far from the guardian's module?

With Findster you will never be able to lose your guardian modules anywhere. What Findster does is it constantly monitors the distance between the smartphone and the guardian module. If this distance is greater than a preset threshold, an alert is posted on the module (sound/vibration) and on the smartphone.


8. When my kid is missing, will other Findster users be able to help?

Yes, because Findster has networking capabilities. A missing child can transmit its location anonymously using other Findsters. The information is relayed through our web service to its destiny.


9. What is the purpose of the basestation?

The basestation (BS) allows you to extend the coverage area of the Findster network. Since the base station does not have the same power and space constraints of the Findster modules, we were able to devise a more powerful version of our RF communication system.

Moreover, being Wi-Fi enabled, it establishes a link between the base station and all your Findster modules, even if you’re outside of your home. So, once the BS is connected to the Internet, parents/guardians will be able to track their kids/pets remotely.

The base station also serves as a charging dock for up to 4 modules simultaneously.


10. Is data privacy guaranteed?

Yes, the Findster system ensures that only authorized modules have access to the data exchanged between them.


11. Can I share access to my child/pet module with other people I trust?

Yes. If the module is associated with an account, its owner can easily share access with other users and create a network of caregivers.


Check our complete FAQ here.

As long as you have a base station at home, you can continuously track your child or your pet in your neighborhood. Being away from home doesn't mean you can't be connected to those dearest to you.
And if your neighborhood joins Findster by getting additional base stations, the protection zone becomes even bigger. These base stations can also be placed in schools and playgrounds to increase the area of protection. The larger the Findster’s web, the more omnipresent you become.But there's more... What about your Pet?Have you ever wished you knew what your pet has been doing while you were out?Has he been resting or trying to eat your furniture?Findster has an activity tracker option that allows you to know its activity levels during the day.

Make sure you are everywhere.
Support Findster now and be one of the first to have it, at a very (very) limited special price. Once you get it, you can use it forever WITHOUT MONTHLY FEES!A short term step for a long term peace of mind.FeaturesFindster’s Secret SauceThe Findster ecosystem is composed of 5 components: Portable charger, Parent/Guardian module, Child or Pet module, Basestation and smartphone App (Android and iOS).The Child or Pet module was designed specifically to be comfortable when applied yet secure. This module includes a high-precision GPS system and a 3-axis accelerometer that enables the detection of whether the child fell or, in the pet’s case, what his activity index was throughout the day.Wireless communication system
One of the Findster secrets is in its innovative wireless communication system, used to establish communication between the pet/child module and its guardian/parent module (or the pet/child module and the Base Station).
Our proprietary wireless protocol allows you to obtain communication range of 0.62 miles (1 km) between both modules, thereby eliminating the need to send the coordinates through a cellular connection. In this way, we have removed the required monthly fees that are intrinsic to other GPS tracking systems on the market.

Findster ecosystemThe Parent/Guardian module serves as a gateway between your smartphone and the Child or Pet module, enabling a long-range bi-directional communication between both.All the controls and displays of data are centralised in the Findster App. The third element of the Findster ecosystem is the basestation.The basestation can be placed, for example, in your home, powering a communication range of 1.24 miles (​​2 km). The basestation wireless communication uses the same proprietary protocol of the child/pet module. However, because it has no restrictions in terms of battery consumption or size, we were able to design a system with a range 2x greater than the wearable module.And because each basestation has a wi-fi connection, even if the child or pet leaves your home’s security zone, when approaching another basestation it is automatically re-connected with your smartphone through the Cloud—always guaranteeing your privacy. Only you and those who you have authorised can have access to data modules.Security zoneWhen the Child or Pet leaves the defined security zone, the application sends an immediate alert. If they are in the coverage radius of the Parent/Guardian module, the module’s location continues to be monitored. When the connectivity between the two modules is lost, the last detected position is saved. If this happens, the Findster ecosystem activates the alert mode and all other modules start searching for the lost Child or Pet. When they find it, they send its current location through the cloud to the Parent/Guardian’s smartphone App.
Furthermore, a module defined as lost will always look for a link to a basestation with  an internet connection. When getting this connection, it will send its current position to your smartphone and other people authorized to access the module’s location.Technical Specifications
Dimensions
SoftwareWhy we are differentFindster represents the next generation of GPS tracking systems, allowing a solution that combines the ubiquity of use without the need for monthly fees.Why we need youWe have been working hard, and Findster is finally a fully functional prototype. Now we need your help to guarantee its mass production.
We’re at the starting line, ready to begin. Support us and be the first to get one.
Join our project and share it with your family and friends.
Together we can go even further and take Findster to the next step.Why should you help us? It’s simple:

- Be the first to get one and benefit from a very special price
- Always be connected to the ones you love and guarantee their safety
- Be part of our history; let’s do it togetherRewards
For a retailer package,  email us.
The Findster TeamWe don’t solve problems. We prevent them. And we have a proven track record in this.
We are a multidisciplinary team with years of experience in engineering, design and physics.
We came together with the sole purpose of creating and developing technologies that will improve your quality of life. Our goal is to bring security and peace of mind to everyone.
Findster is our way of doing it.
Risks and Challenges
Like any innovative project, the development of Findster presents some risks and several challenges. Over the past few months, the whole team has worked to ensure that none of the risks and challenges prevent us from a timely delivery of the system with the quality that our supporters deserve.
We worked with our supply chain to ensure that production will take place as scheduled. We have a fully functional prototype and we are currently working on the final version of the system.
The Findster team has developed other innovative technologies that combine software with hardware. We have the manufacturing flow line prepared, as well as the protocols for testing and validation of various critical components of our system.We are absolutely sure that – with your support – Findsters will become a reality in time and with the quality you deserve.
FAQ
1. How can I contribute to the campaign? Anyone can contribute. You just need to have a PayPal account to pay the perk. If you do not have a PayPal account but have a credit card, you can use the "Pay as guest" feature in PayPal.For instructions on how to Pay as a Guest on PayPal, please visit:  How to Contribute via PayPal without a PayPal Account.2. How many modules can be connected to the parent/owner’s module simultaneously?Up to 5 modules simultaneously.3. What type of battery is used in the modules (rechargeable or replaceable)?The Findster modules use rechargeable batteries. To recharge the battery module, simply insert the module into the basestation or connect to a Findster suitable charger (included in the perk).4. Can other unauthorised modules be connected to my kid's/pet's module?Not unless they are explicitly allowed (monitoring group).Other guardian modules could serve as a gateway for sending data to the web service, but only if there is authorization from the owner of these modules.5. How is the connection established between Findsters? How does the guardian’s module connect with the smartphone?The pairing of the modules is made possible via the mobile application.In the smartphone, you can see a list of compatible Findster modules and the desired module is selected using its identifier (name associated with the device), similarly to a Bluetooth connection. This connection only needs to be done once.6. Why are two modules necessary?The Findster’s secret sauce is its proprietary RF technology that allows for two modules to communicate in a range of up to 1km. If we were using just one module to communicate with the smartphone – as a Bluetooth tracker does – then we would only be able to achieve 50m of communication range.We weren’t satisfied with that range, so we’ve developed our own technology. It adds an extra module to the system but enables us to communicate at a range of up to 1km.7. What happens if the smartphone is too far from the guardian's module?With Findster you will never be able to lose your guardian modules anywhere. What Findster does is it constantly monitors the distance between the smartphone and the guardian module. If this distance is greater than a preset threshold, an alert is posted on the module (sound/vibration) and on the smartphone.8. When my kid is missing, will other Findster users be able to help?Yes, because Findster has networking capabilities. A missing child can transmit its location anonymously using other Findsters. The information is relayed through our web service to its destiny.9. What is the purpose of the basestation?The basestation (BS) allows you to extend the coverage area of the Findster network. Since the base station does not have the same power and space constraints of the Findster modules, we were able to devise a more powerful version of our RF communication system.Moreover, being Wi-Fi enabled, it establishes a link between the base station and all your Findster modules, even if you’re outside of your home. So, once the BS is connected to the Internet, parents/guardians will be able to track their kids/pets remotely.The base station also serves as a charging dock for up to 4 modules simultaneously.10. Is data privacy guaranteed?Yes, the Findster system ensures that only authorized modules have access to the data exchanged between them.11. Can I share access to my child/pet module with other people I trust?Yes. If the module is associated with an account, its owner can easily share access with other users and create a network of caregivers.Check our complete FAQ here.

story:
Welcome to our campaign! We are Kaja J. Fietkiewicz and Elmar Lins, two adventurers who want to share their passion for an unrestricted way of life and style. We want YOU to become a part of our movement by joining the crowd and help us accomplish the funding of our first production round of the unique CANISBERG wood watches.

In our Indiegogo campaign, you will have the chance to benefit from an early bird offer pertaining to our first, limited batch. Our watches will be delivered by the mid of December making them the perfect accessory for Christmas time as well as the perfect gift!

www.canisberg.com

Our watches

Our watches combine timeless elegance with fashionable sportsmanship. The distinctive housing in combination with the sporty design of the clock-face alludes perfectionism. The sporty design is crossed with the brown individual wood grain of the housing. The design elevates the uniqueness of CANISBERG watches. Sustainable and upscale materials, and craftsmanship have been intertwined to form this masterpiece. Style, quality and statement on the highest level.

Design and Production

We had the vision of a wholesome design for our watch, which would suit leisure and business needs. We knew from the start that our first collection would be exclusively based on wood materials, which didn’t only influence the design but also potential manufacturers. Finding a suitable manufacturer took weeks, as we were not only looking for a manufacturer who could produce watches made out of wood, but also one who had credible evidence to have socially acceptable and sustainable production conditions. After an extensive search and countless meetings and unlucky production experiments, we were able to identify a reliable supplier who was able to meet our needs completely. That was only the start however, we were constantly on looking the production process, where we had to network countless designs and different materials in their interplay. Nevertheless, our results chimes us to be positive as we have been able to provide the best possible product which will not only fulfill the needs of our potential customers, it will exceed them.

Testing Process and Quality Assurance

Providing a product which is not of the highest possible quality is never something we envisioned. This being the reason why our product has taken so long to be launched. Our watches have been lined up for mass production for over 6 months, however we have delayed production to be able to thoroughly examine our products so as to ensure they are high in quality, design and comfort. We have then taken the quality control a step further, by extensively testing the watches in different environments. Having friends and family integrate the watches into their daily life (practicing sports, working in the office or time off with friends), meant that we could get true to life feedback about the watches’ performance. This has helped us to improve our product, as we have learned what the needs of our customers are, what benefits they seek from our watches and we have also been able to understand that financing our product can also be aided by the general public.

Sustainability

We plant a tree for every article sold. This is our promise. We emphasis on not only founding a socially and sustainably company, but also being active beyond our business activities. We have recognized that the use of sustainable production materials and the observance of socially responsible working conditions are desirable but not enough for our needs. That is why we make our contribution to protect our unique nature for future generations.

FOLLOW US ON FACEBOOK

FOLLOW US ON INSTAGRAM

FOLLOW US ON PINTEREST

story:
Short Summary

  • Lynn is a Spanish teacher from southern California, teaming up with Ada, a tour guide from Peru
  • We want to help the children of Huama protect their feet from the extreme conditions of the Andean winter in their rural village.
  • Please watch the video to see what we want to do!

What We Need & What You Get

  • We will buy one pair of shoes for each of the 35 students at the Huama Primary School ($12 each pair, purchased by Ada in Cusco, for a total of $420)
  • The transportation to the school, along with photos of the students with their new shoes will cost about $80.
  • The remaining money will be put toward the international bank transfer of the money for the shoes, the fees charged by Indiegogo, as well as socks!
  • If we do not reach our goal, we will buy as many shoes as we can for the students, but all the students will not benefit.
  • With a $10 donation, you will receive a digital photo of a student of your choice with their new shoes!

The Impact

  • Your contribution makes an immediate difference in the lives of underprivileged children and their families.
  • We (Ada and Lynn) are dedicated to helping these families, as evidenced by Ada's continuing relationship with the community in Huama and our initiation of this campaign.

Risks & Challenges

  • This project is on a small scale with potentially big benefits.  Having someone who is local and has strong contacts with the community will make our campaign successful.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • If you can't afford $10 or $5, please get the word out about our campaign!  Share our link on facebook, twitter, and other social media!
  • Don't forget to use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
Short Summary

We use humanitarian based apparel sales to support homeless children through:

  • Bringing awareness to child homelessness,
  • Providing support to homeless children directly, and
  • Supporting other programs that help homeless children

We have a Passion to GIVE BIG. We give more than half because we believe that “it is better to give than to receive.”

What We Need & What You Get

The $20,000 will be used to purchase:

  • More watches, new designs and colors of watches, Vneck shirts, Tanks, Razerbacks, and crewneck shirts.
  • Stickers and cards that go with every purchase of apparel
  • Marketing so that we can make people aware of our mission
  • Expanding our ever increasing product line. 

The Impact

Anyone who contributes to GIVE FIFTY ONE would have a direct impact on ending child homelessness:

  • You get to be a part of a world wide network of world changers.
  • We've successfully partnered with school systems and other organizations to put a dent in the homeless situation.
  • We believe the best is yet to come. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you just can’t contribute, that doesn’t mean you can’t help:

  • Get the word out and make some noise about GIVE FIFTY ONE's campaign.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!
  • Like us on Facebook, follow us on Twitter. 

 

Find us on the interwebs at: www.givefiftyone.org

story:
Hi everyone! Welcome to Tru Apparel, where one shirt can help bring someone closer to finding inner and outer balance. We are Justin and Sarah, two twenty-one-year-olds looking to bring some hope into the lives of amputees. With backgrounds in biomedical engineering, sustainability, and yoga we are both extremely passionate about the health field. On average, a prosthetic can cost anywhere from $5,000-$50,000 on top of medical bills. Through the creation of Tru Apparel, we will be donating 40% of all t-shirt sales to people in need of prosthetics.  When you donate $25 you will receive a t-shirt of your choice from the provided designs, in the size of your choice. Of course, you are more than welcome to and absolutely encouraged, to donate more than $25 to this project. Please read on to learn about our inspiration for the project, and the person who all of our first-round proceeds will be benefiting, Kaitlyn.

For a moment, I invite you to look down at your body in all of its beautiful glory and be gracious. Spend one moment of gratitude right here, right now, loving every wonderful part of your working body. How often do we wake up in the morning and take our healthy bodies for granted?  For us, we found that this happened all too often. We didn’t spend enough time being grateful for the gifts in our life that not everyone has. When Justin met Kaitlyn this summer, he was blown away by her constant love for life, and strong-willed spirit. Kaitlyn, who is the inspiration for this project, is a survivor of bacterial meningitis. Bacterial meningitis is an infection that causes an inflammation of the membranes that surround the brain and spinal cord. Unfortunately, for Kaitlyn, in order to keep the infection from spreading, she had to have all of her limbs amputated. Kaitlyn has already purchased a portion of her prosthetic needs, and we are currently looking to raise money for her right arm, as well as the continuation of physical therapy. Not only are the prosthetic limbs extremely costly, but she also has medical bills from past surgeries, and future bills for physical therapy that we would love to help with as well.

Kaitlyn is only the beginning of the movement. We would love to gain momentum and help people in their pursuit to regain the full potential of their bodies through the use of prosthetics. Body, Breath, and Balance all represent the three most important ways we stay Tru to ourselves. We hope that you find inspiration, not only in Kaitlyn’s story, but also in the apparel offered. If you or someone you know is in need of financial assistance to fund necessary prosthetics, please reach out to us at truclothingapparel@gmail.com. T-shirt delivery timelines will be announced shortly. Please include an additional $5 in your donation if you need your order to be shipped outside of the Phoenix area. Thank you in advance for your generosity!

***Limited shirt quantities available - email truclothingapparel@gmail.com before ordering. Thank you!

story:
Hey indiegogo!

We (James & Zach) are here to introduce you to a new era in affordable, fashionable eyewear.

Being very active in the local outdoor & action sports communities, we were sick of spending a fortune on designer sunglasses just to lose or break them in a few months.  After researching the current eyewear market and the stronghold one company has on it, we decided to put the wheels in motion to create the coolest most affordable eyewear one could buy.

 

James is an avid Mountain biker, snowboarder and sponsored wakeboarder. So over the years he has had his fair share of mishaps with expensive glasses. “It makes me sick to think of how much money I have spent over the years,” said James. “I swear I would get a new pair of glasses and within a month they were either broken or lost”. Whether he shattered them on a trail, or dropped them in the lake this is what sparked him to create diode optics. James currently resides in Park City Utah where he can walk out his back porch and hit the slopes or the trails.

 

Zach’s love for fashion started at a young age, growing up he was always up on the latest and greatest trends and styles. Zach worked as a manager and buyer for multiple retail shops in the Salt Lake Valley. But he always had to “ball on a budget” said Zach, “finding cool good looking sunglasses that didn’t require you to take out a loan was always such a challenge, so when James came to me with this idea It was a no brainer”. Zach being an avid snowboarder, and wakeboarder, as well had definitely lost his fair share of glasses over the years.

Together we are on a mission to change the way the world thinks about eye wear.  We will strive to design the best fitting, best looking, affordable sunglasses we can. So thru vigorous trial and error we have come up with what we call “Affordable Fashion for your face”.

*Click the image above to give diode optics a virtual test run


Standard Model

Black Frames, Black Lens, White Logo


Colored Models

Grey Frames, Black Lens, Black Logo

Electric Blue Frames, Black Lens, Black Logo


Breast Cancer Model

  

Black Frames, Black Lens, Pink Logo

 


Mirrored Models

Black Frames, Mirrored Gold Lens, Gold Logo

Black Frames, Mirrored Blue Lens, Blue Logo

Construction

measurements in inches

 

*Click the image above to give diode optics a virtual test run

Product Testing

Wakeboarding with Colby

Rockwell Chronicles Host Johnny Riche

Why you are currently paying $100s for eyewear

and, why we can make quality optics at an affordable price.


Did you know that most of the popular US Eyewear Brands, Optical Retail Chains, Sunglass Retail Chains, and Eye Insurance companies are owned by an Italian Company named Luxottica?  Not only that but they produce the frames for just about every designer label you can think of.  Luxottica is what they call a "Price Maker" in the eyewear industry.  Since Luxottica owns the biggest retailers in the world they can prevent new Eyewear Companies from competing with Luxottica Brands, this is how Luxottica came to purchase Oakley.  Oakley and Luxottica had a Price Dispute, which I am assuming means Luxottica wanted Oakley to raise their prices to match Luxottica Brands, like Ray Ban.  When Oakley didn't agree Luxottica removed them from their retail stores, causing Oakley's stock price to plummet and eventually led to Luxottica purchasing Oakley.

Currently the only Luxottica alternatives available to consumers are, Walmart Optical, Costco Optical & online startups like Warby Parker, who actually sell prescriptions frames with lens for a fraction of the cost and donate a pair to someone in need.  This just goes to show that Luxottica's markup must be huge.

 

Don't take our word for it, watch the 60 mins segment that talks about all this and more.

Click to view the 60 mins segment on Luxottica.

*Click the image above to give diode optics a virtual test run

Product Testing

Wakeboarding with Colby

Rockwell Chronicles Host Johnny Riche
Why you are currently paying $100s for eyewear
and, why we can make quality optics at an affordable price.

Did you know that most of the popular US Eyewear Brands, Optical Retail Chains, Sunglass Retail Chains, and Eye Insurance companies are owned by an Italian Company named Luxottica?  Not only that but they produce the frames for just about every designer label you can think of.  Luxottica is what they call a "Price Maker" in the eyewear industry.  Since Luxottica owns the biggest retailers in the world they can prevent new Eyewear Companies from competing with Luxottica Brands, this is how Luxottica came to purchase Oakley.  Oakley and Luxottica had a Price Dispute, which I am assuming means Luxottica wanted Oakley to raise their prices to match Luxottica Brands, like Ray Ban.  When Oakley didn't agree Luxottica removed them from their retail stores, causing Oakley's stock price to plummet and eventually led to Luxottica purchasing Oakley.
Currently the only Luxottica alternatives available to consumers are, Walmart Optical, Costco Optical & online startups like Warby Parker, who actually sell prescriptions frames with lens for a fraction of the cost and donate a pair to someone in need.  This just goes to show that Luxottica's markup must be huge.
 
Don't take our word for it, watch the 60 mins segment that talks about all this and more.
Click to view the 60 mins segment on Luxottica.

story:
Fact

Paying full price is not only unnecessary, it's overrated. Resale shops and secondhand stores are all the rage now- even Macklemore raps about shopping sprees in thrift stores being quite an enjoyable experience. 

Quest For A (GOOD) Bargain

Discount chains do offer good price points on some of their merchandise, but often times, a lot of the things they sell are damaged or just not very high in quality. The household names of bargain retailers buy leftover inventory in bulk from major retailers with the goal of filling their shelves and being able to advertise a lesser price than the "manufacturer's suggested retail price." As a result, the quality control is not great and you end up spending hours sorting through the racks looking for the hidden gem. This is a key differentiating factor with Leaux Standards- I do the quality control for you. 

No Headaches Required

The best part of it all? You don't have to sort through hundreds of sketchy things in the wrong size hoping you score one good thing to make it all worthwhile. I do the hard part and pass the savings on to you. Literally. Another key thing is- well, the website! The known names in bargain business don't offer a website. You HAVE to go into their store and BEG the shopping gods of the universe to send you something good. Not to mention sites like EBay and Craigslist where you can find all kind of goodies...posted by people who want all kinds of money and feel attached to their things and the money they lost buying those things, so they want you to make up the difference. I mean, these sites are decent... if you have a supreme amount of patience. Really, as far as any of those avenues go, it requires a great deal of patience. Patience to track down what you're looking for, try to negotiate a fair price and avoid feeling jipped. Patience to stay up all night trying to win only to be outbid in the last 3 seconds. Leaux Standards is going to change that...and make it easy for those of you whose patience has run out.

What Does It All Mean?

 Leaux Standards is an online store committed to bringing the very best deals to one place, for one price. The items sold will go for about 50% less than the original retail price! I can afford to do this by purchasing items at a very reasonable price, from the right places, during the right season. Because I can score a deal on it, you will score a deal on it when you buy it from me. In my own closet, I would often pull out things 6 months old, unworn, tags still attached. I couldn't return these things because too much time had passed. Selling through existing sites was ok, but required too much work and too much time. I knew there had to be a better way. 

I've Got The Goods

 It's become apparent that I just love to buy quality stuff at a fair price. I don't know how to resist a legit deal. And that is to the benefit of the people. I search all over town for awesome deals on really cool things and make them available for a majorly reduced price through Leaux Standards. As of now, the online store offers fashion products. An array of clothes, shoes and accessories will be available for men and women. Most of these things will be major name brands, other things will be from independent, up and coming labels or local vendors/designers in the LA area. Because these featured brands are still being established, you get access to their products at a lower price point while the buzz around their brand is still building. Everything on the site will be hand picked by me and will be 100% authentic. 

Ask, And You Shall Receive

 A very exciting element of the site will be the Stylist component, which will allow shoppers on the site to request stylist services for an upcoming event, personal shopping, wardrobe analysis and a variety of other things. Most people frustrated with their appearance and clothing options don't even think to hire a stylist for themselves. It's a luxury usually reserved for celebs and wealthy people. That's what people assume anyway, because stylists and personal shoppers normally charge a very steep rate for their services. However, in keeping with the Leaux Standards culture, it will be surprisingly affordable. Big presentation coming up? Reunion? Date? Wedding? Closet needs a makeover or an update? Get the expert help you need and still have money left to shop! This is something I really love to do. I like the challenge, and I care about making people feel good about themselves. I have dressed celebrity clients for red carpets/major premiers as well as just to refresh their wardrobe for the season; I've created totally new wardrobes for doctors, lawyers, and jet setters who didn't have time to do it themselves. I've hand selected looks for new moms and college graduates who didn't even know where to start. The one thing everyone has in common? They just need a little expert advice on figuring out what makes them look their best. And now I can help you, too. 

Operation: Check Off Checklist

 My many years of experience in the retail and styling industry gives me an advantage on selecting things that are not just trendy and current, but pairing these pieces with items that are classic and can be worn for years to come. The site is just about ready to launch and I have clients ready to buy. I just need additional funds to get LS off the ground. Your contribution will help in the following ways: Paying for promo materials such as stickers and tags, finishing the last and final stage of the website as well as any maintenance required after its initial launch, and most importantly- acquiring as much merchandise as I can to ensure I'm able to get as much product as possible onto the site and into your hands in time for the holidays. Don't spend more money than you have to on coworkers, in-laws, or even yourself! Everyone on your list can get something without making you go bankrupt.

 I'm thrilled to be bringing this tool to others like me who enjoy the finer things in life, but don't want to overpay for anything. Join me in revolutionizing the way people shop.

story:
geek  /gēk/


Noun. 1. An unfashionable or socially inept person 2. A person with an eccentric devotion to a particular interest

I’m a quirky Canadian creator who lived a most extraordinary existence in North America, Japan, England and Greece before finally settling in Germany...

...and I'm a proud geek.

My geekness has manifested itself in many forms (& styles) throughout my life but my favourite by far has to be my current incarnation of DIY Dork. *Want proof? Take a browse through my craftilicious blog: Awesome Sauce & Asshattery


My passion for creating has led me all over the world & introduced me to so many fabulous, like-minded people allowing me to see that geekdom is not something to be hidden but instead reveled in, celebrated & shared!

...and thus my Sewing Geek, Knitting Nerd & Crochet Dweeb designs were born, each inspired by a marvelously talented DIY Dork whose creativity never ceases to motivate & encourage.

Unleash your creative-geek and proudly share your own DIY Dorkiness with the world with one of my completely unique hand-made-just-for-you-by-moi-in-Berlin Crafty Nerd T-shirts!

...and just why am I doing this & what the heck do you get? (a.k.a: A Goal for me 'n' Perks for you):

Honestly? My entire purpose for this campaign is to get my crafty nerd designs into the hands (& onto the bodies) of YOU, the magnificent makers who proudly create, refashion & upcycle for the love of DIY.

Each shirt, scloop, looplet & tote bag will be created by my very own hands in my tiny home-based workshop.

My funding goal shall cover all of the costs involved in creating your Looplets, Scloops, Crafty Nerd T-shirts & Personalized Tote bags as well as the worldwide, insured, registered shipping of each perk. I aim to create and send each perk within 2 weeks of purchase.

 

Whether I reach (or, fingers crossed, exceed) my funding goal or not I will be donating 10% of my funded total to Designers Against Aids.

 

 

and now onto the good stuff - The Primo Perks...

**each Perk includes worldwide registered shipping**

A Grateful Shoutout

The PDF version of the new & improved Confessions of a Refashionista! *Contains over 50 diy projects with easy to follow tutorials & full colour step by step photos for everyone from first-time upcyclers to experienced Refashionistas!

 

 

The Lurvly Looplet

The Multi-talented Scloop

The DIY Dork

The Scloop-y Geek

The YOUnique Dweeb Tote

Confessions of a Refashionista

 

The DIY Dorkiness for women:

 

 

and the oh-so-slightly-different version for men (check out the glasses):

 

 

Can't get your head around purchasing a perk but still want to share the DIY Dorkiness with the world?

Then broadcast the word about my geekilicious campaign! Shout it from the rooftops, spread it around online & be sure to use the convenient indiegogo share tools!

...and don't forget that 10% of my total funding will be donated to Designer's Against Aids a fabulous cause that is near & dear to my heart.

 

Like what you see here?

Then have a browse through Awesome Sauce & Asshattery, my craftilicious blog

Subscribe to my Confessions of a Refashionista DIY channel

Pop on over to facebook & show Confessions of a Refashionista & Mensch T's some like-y love!

Follow Awesome Sauce & Asshattery & Mensch T's on tumblr.

story:
We want to change the way fashion is bought and sold by making it a no-waste production cycle where items are only produced when there is a proven demand for them.  And we're looking to you to help us make it happen. 

We believe that you as the consumer should dictate what is "in fashion."  That’s why we started Vicaire NY’s Be Our Buyer program. It is where fashion conscious customers help designers make their dreams work, and in turn, these designers give us what we want: new, fresh fashion, not the cookie cutter styles retail stores have that make us all look alike.

Our Story

Fashion used to be about feeling good, something you could rely on to be affordable and innovative. Today that's rarely the case. Online flash sales are making it impossible for young designers to innovate with quality merchandise and retails stores have cookie cutter clothes which make all of us look exactly alike.  The independence fashion could afford you has become a sought-after novelty. In short:  customers are suffering and designers are suffering.  We're here to fix that.

We want to fix that and do fashion differently: make clothes only when the customers back it - and reward those customers with wholesale prices.  This is Vicaire NY's Be Our Buyer program.

We are selling American made, meticulously constructed, innovative and limited edition designer clothes for their wholesale price.  We are cutting out retailers, flash sale sites, and foreign tariffs to get the best prices to customers.  We are also cutting out fabric waste and creating jobs in the US, both for young designers and for factory workers.  All with a simple business model. 

How it Works - It's Simple

This model doesn't create any waste, creates jobs in the US, and disrupts the fashion world - making it socially responsible.  We want you to be a part of that disruption.    

 

 

Last but definitely not least...THANK YOU THANK YOU THANK YOU THANK YOU THANK YOU THANK YOU.

story:
KickSpike was invented four years ago by the company founder Darrell Bachmann.

KickSpike will revolutionize footwear with its retractable metal spikes, that are easily deployed by the click of a button on the back of a shoe/boot.


How the idea was born

Being a Class A Golf Course Superintendent for 14 years, I knew how damaging and costly spikes (even soft spikes) were to Golf Greens. The answer came to me in a dream: retractable metal spikes you click on and off with your foot at the back of the shoe, without bending over. I met with the President of the United States Golf Association and he dubbed KickSpike the "best invention since the sand wedge."

More uses than we could have imagined

After being on CBC's Dragon's Den, we were flooded with requests for the shoes/boots to help prevent slips and falls in many different industries (oil, postal, military). We were also approached by people with mobility issues and the elderly: for them, a fall can be fatal. Bending over to put on anti-slip footwear products can also be very difficult.



Our next stage

KickSpike is now ready to be manufactured. After four years, we have three international patents, a top technical team and several of the largest shoe and boot companies in North America waiting for our product.


We Need You!

We need a final $250 000 to get the production moulds and materials (metal and plastic) to produce the first batch of KickSpike Mechanisms. We need your help!


Be a Part of the Shoe Revolution!

Help us get our product out to the world! Help us prevent injuries from slips and falls!  Help the environment by taking spikes off the golf greens! Be a part of the shoe revolution! Donate and/or spread the word today!


What You will receive!

As part of the shoe revolution, you will receive (depending on the level of contribution) either the first pair of shoes or boots from the first production run, an invite to our launch party, a "Shoe Revolution" t-shirt, private video thank you and emails, invitation to the inaugural golf tourney.

All funds will go towards the last push to get the mechanisms off the assembly line - to get the plastics and metals we need to fill the moulds to make Kickspike a reality!


*Above is the $200 Ladies style walking shoe available in Black, White & Brown. 100% Leather upper, water resistant, odor-resistant.

*Above is the $200 Mens style walking shoe available in Black, White & Brown.

100% leather upper, water & odor-resistant.

*Above is Ladies style hiking boot available in Black & Brown(Tan).


*Above is Mens style Hiking boot available in Black & Brown.

* $100 Mens and Ladies walking shoe. Available in Black, White & Brown. 65% leather Upper.


* Ladies sizes from 4.5 - 12 US

* Mens sizes from 7 - 14 US

* Or similar style and colour.

story:
With the passion for music, it engaged us to explore deeply about audio devices, especially headphone. After a certain time opening the business and working with many big headphone brands, we realized that nowadays people uses headphone as their personal adornments such as watch, bracelet, ring, etc. For this reason, we are really eager to make our products with high quality and unique. A totally hand-made product with outstanding design and beautiful as luxurious adornments, also high durability with affordable prices are main elements we want to put in all product lines.  

1. Unibody design and highly durable materials


The headset peel is designed in monolithic shape, rough and semi-transparent. In order to avoid cracks or scratches due to collision or falling, the product material is high hardness and heat resistance.  

The “unibody” design will make users confortable when wearing. This design will remove the problems caused by sweating or raining for users. 

This design will also help to increase the product life by 2-3 times compared to normal designs.  

2. A product for you

An ordinary street-phone is generally designed with straight cord form, so it does not suit well with motions. Yet those current headphones are typically designed for chartist or athletic commonly have rigid plastic hangers form, which cause uncomfortable and soreness after being used for a while. Therefore, capturing the idea, we create products that are convenient and appropriate for almost every single demand. For headphone cord, the material that we use is plastic thread which is handmade to create the gentleness and perdurability. People will still be able to enjoy their favorite songs after hours using our headphone with such material and design . Comply foam , comfortable and perfectly fit with almost every person, you would not need to concern about the size or the annoying which casually cause by silicon foams. Moreover, knowing many people enjoy using cases for their phones, we design small jack form which is possibly best fit with nearly every single case form in the market. Jack is roughening to make it easier to hold. 

3. Handmade

It is 100% handmade, from the molding to make sure the stiffness is perfect, to the other tiny features like woven wire, woven thread or the surface. To accomplish all the processes and bring you such a extraordinary headphone, it takes us 48 hours.

4. Sound quality and customisation

We use the amateur driver for our products. This driver will have detailed sounds balance and highly durable usage. And we also customized the expected bass level.   

You will be easy to be attracted whenever using our products with smart designs and truly high quality that we have created. It is not over to say our products is the best choice for customers within these price ranges. 

For a better product, hope everyone will support us on this project. Thanks.

After a certain time opening the business and working with many big headphone brands, we realized that nowadays people uses headphone as their personal adornments such as watch, bracelet, ring, etc. For this reason, we are really eager to make our products with high quality and unique. A totally hand-made product with outstanding design and beautiful as luxurious adornments, also high durability with affordable prices are main elements we want to put in all product lines.  1. Unibody design and highly durable materialsThe headset peel is designed in monolithic shape, rough and semi-transparent. In order to avoid cracks or scratches due to collision or falling, the product material is high hardness and heat resistance.  The “unibody” design will make users confortable when wearing. This design will remove the problems caused by sweating or raining for users. This design will also help to increase the product life by 2-3 times compared to normal designs.  2. A product for youAn ordinary street-phone is generally designed with straight cord form, so it does not suit well with motions. Yet those current headphones are typically designed for chartist or athletic commonly have rigid plastic hangers form, which cause uncomfortable and soreness after being used for a while. Therefore, capturing the idea, we create products that are convenient and appropriate for almost every single demand. 
For headphone cord, the material that we use is plastic thread which is handmade to create the gentleness and perdurability.  People will still be able to enjoy their favorite songs after hours using our headphone with such material and design . Comply foam , comfortable and perfectly fit with almost every person, you would not need to concern about the size or the annoying which casually cause by silicon foams. 
Moreover, knowing many people enjoy using cases for their phones, we design small jack form which is possibly best fit with nearly every single case form in the market.  Jack is roughening to make it easier to hold. 
3. Handmade
It is 100% handmade, from the molding to make sure the stiffness is perfect, to the other tiny features like woven wire, woven thread or the surface. To accomplish all the processes and bring you such a extraordinary headphone, it takes us 48 hours.


4. Sound quality and customisation

We use the amateur driver for our products. This driver will have detailed sounds balance and highly durable usage. And we also customized the expected bass level.   
You will be easy to be attracted whenever using our products with smart designs and truly high quality that we have created. It is not over to say our products is the best choice for customers within these price ranges. 



For a better product, hope everyone will support us on this project. Thanks.

story:
MANSSION was created because we were dissatisfied with the selection of jewelry. Everything we found was either terrible quality and clunky, or far too expensive and not fashionable. There was nothing that resonated with what we truly wanted: high-quality, stylish jewelry at a reasonable price. We spent over 18 months finding and working with the top suppliers in the industry to create completely custom designs that are made to look great and last...without the big name-brand markups.

While designing our first collections, we decided to focus on these three things:

  • Using the highest quality materials, hand finished to perfection
  • Designing fashionable, unique, and fully custom pieces
  • Offering our one of a kind, top quality bracelets at fair prices
 

 

For our first set of collections, we are offering ELEVEN pieces to choose from:

The "Melbourne" Bracelet in: Stardust, Sunrise, & Rosewood colorways.

 

The "Uptown" Cuff in: 925 Sterling Silver, 18k Gold, Rose Gold, & Gunmetal.

 

The "Porter" Bracelet in: 925 Sterling Silver, 18k Gold, Rose Gold, & Gunmetal.

 

After spending over 18 months working with more than 20 suppliers, we have found and developed great relationships with the industry’s leading manufacturers. Our 925 sterling silver pieces are NOT silver plated. They are full 925 sterling silver from start to finish, with an extra protective rhodium plating for ultimate durability. Comparable products from competitors would cost you over $700! Our 18k gold, rose gold, and black rhodium pieces feature an industry leading 2-micron plating plus a specially formulated coating for extra tarnish protection. We paid attention to every detail to ensure our products will last.

925 Sterling Silver

  • Full 925 Sterling Silver (NOT plated)
  • As with all 925 sterling silver jewelry, expect some patina over time - this is normal. Your bracelet ages with you and becomes unique to you!

18k Gold

  • 18k gold plated, 2 microns + a specially formulated e-coat for extra tarnish resistance. Base metal is brass.

Rose Gold

  • 18k rose gold plated, 2 microns + a specially formulated e-coat for extra tarnish resistance. Base metal is brass.

Gunmetal

  • Black rhodium plated, 2 microns + a specially formulated e-coat for extra tarnish resistance. Base metal is brass.

 

 

Our jewelry designs are custom, created by us and only for MANSSION. We spent countless hours working with our suppliers to perfect our ideas and have already purchased the molds, so you will not find our styles anywhere else. Every design was made to be unique and fashion forward – each available in 4 different colorways. Wear MANSSION when you want to stand out, when you want to add a subtle accent to an all-black outfit, or stack different pieces to make a bold statement. You find your MANSSION when you make it unique to you.

 

Based on feedback from early customers, we've created our pieces to feature industry-first adjustability for the perfect fit! The "Uptown" cuff is slightly malleable so you can adjust it exactly how you like, while our "Porter" chain has 2 end-link loops for a tighter or looser fit.

Uptown Cuff Collection

  • One size
  • Width: 9mm
  • The Uptown cuff is meant to be malleable – it can slightly bend to fit your wrist perfectly and makes taking it off and putting it on even easier!

Porter Bracelet Collection

  • Regular: Fits 6.75" - 7.75" wrist size
  • Small: Fits 6" - 6.75" wrist size
  • Width: 9mm
  • The Porter bracelet has 2 end-link loops to provide adjustability for the perfect fit.

 

At MANSSION, we believe in living life on your own terms, breaking free from years of monotonous schooling and corporate office environments that force us to settle for normal. Take that part of you that others have tried to mute and turn it up louder. Harness that thing that makes you great.

We are an expression of those who strive to be extraordinary in everything they do, and who inspire those around them to be better. From the workplace to the weekend, from the living room to a long night out, MANSSION encourages you to push everything you do to its limits… and enjoy life in the process.

Our pieces are a perfect balance of ruggedness and sophistication. They are the ultimate expression of individuality and an undying passion to travel, learn, compete, and excel in everything you do.

Beautifully unrefined.

 

MANSSION was created by 3 unique individuals who had one thing in common: they were all passionate about fashion but were fed up with the bland and uninspired selection of jewelry. Longtime friends Feras, Torii, and Yorgi set out to create a brand that resonated with who they are, while designing high-quality, custom jewelry that is fashion forward and reasonably priced.

 

Help us revolutionize the jewelry industry. Our pieces are fully custom and of the best quality, so purchasing inventory is not cheap. We need your help to purchase our initial inventory, which will allow us to fulfill your orders and develop new designs to continue growing!

 

We are so confident with the quality and durability of our products, that if something were to happen within the first year, we hope you will send it back to us.  The warranty includes any manufacturer defects.

Warranty does NOT cover:

  • Wear, tear, and aging (e.g. scratched metals, alteration of the color, plating wearing away over time, tarnish/patina)
  • Any damage on any part of the product resulting from abnormal/abusive use, lack of care, negligence, and accidents (knocks, dents, crushing, broken clasps, etc.)

 

We have spent over 18 months coming up with and finalizing our designs, purchasing the molds, testing samples, and selecting an industry-leading manufacturer. We have already placed an initial purchase order to help fulfill early-bird orders and will place another production order once Indiegogo releases the funds. Production time takes roughly 7 weeks depending on the quantity of the order. Our team will then ship the orders to our amazing backers!

MANSSION started with a soft launch of stone bracelets in January of 2019 and has already shipped hundreds of bracelets all across the US (and outside!). We are also in select high-end retail stores around the Los Angeles area. Our website (MANSSION.com) has over 150, 5-star reviews, and our Instagram page (@MANSSION) has over 10,000 followers! We already have experience successfully running this business, which will make for a very smooth delivery process.

 

The biggest challenges MANSSION will face will be spreading the word about our company and getting Indiegogos to participate. We hope our products, story, and brand will stand apart from all the other incredible companies on this platform. To help spread our message as widely as possible, we are asking friends, families, and various blogs/Youtubers to help spread the word.

Once we receive the funding, another challenge will be scaling our production. We are confident in our manufacturer and the relationship we have built with them, and we believe they are able to quickly produce the quantity of pieces we need!

story:
SKYE Sneaker-Boots can be dressed up for a day in town or dressed down to coordinate with the most casual athletic clothes you own. With a no-tie lace design, you can easily slip the shoe on or off — no time wasted.

A discrete YKK zipper closure system located on the side of the shoe provides function and style. We blend our modified slip-on system with modern materials to maintain a stylish boot silhouette.

 

We believe that feeling amazing starts with where you stand. The sneaker-boots are lighter than most, which makes activities easier and less strenuous on your feet. The boot shell consists of 4-way stretch fabric for an extra comfortable fit.

An optimal contoured cushioning design evenly distributes the weight of your body, relieving the pressure and shock of each step. A sculpted insole provides support on the arch and heel for all-day comfort. Your feet won’t ache after a long day, bringing you a new level of comfort.

 

The sneaker-boots are engineered with highly durable materials such as military-grade Cordura and Japanese armor. 

The toe boxes of the shoes have TPR mudguard protection, the tips of the recycled plastic cords are dipped in rubber to prevent fraying ends, and the soles feature a unique water flushing pattern with a sawtooth profile to provide excellent grip in all types of weather.

 

The sneaker-boots are 100% waterproof and snowproof. 

Not only is the entire shoe welded TPR for weather protection, but it also keeps water out with a waterproof YKK zipper. The weatherproof material also has insulating layer keeping your toes warm from the cold and snow.

 

Our footwear is man-made with ethical manufacturing procedures. We strive to limit our carbon footprint to help preserve the environment. 

We use materials like recycled plastic and 100% natural, biodegradable rubber to create our shoes. We are also vegan-friendly — we do not use animal by-products. 

People love shoes. The average American owns about 19 pairs of shoes at one time. You might have hiking shoes, running shoes, rain boots, casual sneakers, snow boots and desert boots. Imagine buying a single pair that could work in all of these occasions. 

For those who value quality over quantity, combining your favorite, essential pairs of shoes into one sensible, attractive pair would be a dream. We made it our goal to present the eco-friendly, exceptionally crafted, affordable shoe option. Our company promises this to you, in addition to comfort, longevity and versatility. 

We can’t thank you enough for checking out our project and helping us make SKYE Sneaker-Boots a reality. 

We know not everyone will be able to support us with a pledge, but if you like SKYE Sneaker-Boots, please help us spread the word on Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, Reddit, and anywhere else you can think of! 

We’re only happy if you’re super-comfy and look great. We’ll be sure to exchange your shoes as long as they have not been worn outside, still have the tags attached, and are accompanied by the original receipt within 30 days of receiving the shoes. 

Once our shoes are available for retail (a few months after backers receive the early-birds), you’ll need to purchase your correct size from us at retail, and we’ll refund the difference. If there’s a manufacturing issue with your shoes, no problem, we’ve got it covered. Connect with us and we would be happy to assist.

story:
The Universal Magnetic Eyeglass Holder provides a convenient way to securely stow eyeglasses when they are not in use. The pair of glasses or sunglasses is easily within reach and the accessory removes the risk of eyeglasses getting crushed in pockets or falling out of collars when leaning over.

As a clothing accessory, the Magnetic Eyeglass Holder locks into place with the power of two 12 mm neodymium magnets. The product has two parts, one of which is placed inside and the other on the outside of a shirt, blouse or jacket.

During the design phase, special consideration was given to the angle of the metal loop that receives the glasses temple to ensure consistent ease of use in everyday scenarios. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

An ID card add-on can be selected at checkout to use the magnetic eyeglass holder as an ID badge holder.  This add-on includes a transparent vinyl pouch, stainless steel clip and flexible vinyl loop.

The product has two parts, one of which is placed inside and the other on the outside of a shirt, blouse or jacket.During the design phase, special consideration was given to the angle of the metal loop that receives the glasses temple to ensure consistent ease of use in everyday scenarios.             An ID card add-on can be selected at checkout to use the magnetic eyeglass holder as an ID badge holder.  This add-on includes a transparent vinyl pouch, stainless steel clip and flexible vinyl loop.

story:
Yes, BizyTee T-Shirts are a simple, yet powerful, solution to help Shy Entrepreneurs promote their business and support underserved Entrepreneurs around the world by helping them escape the cycle of poverty.  

BizyTee is a business T-shirt created to deliver cutting edge entrepreneur themed designs that celebrate the unique role and mindset of entrepreneurs. Every phrase and design we put on a BizyTee is developed to open conversations with business owners and potential clients. Helping you make a lasting impression and generate new leads for your business.

For every BizyTee T-Shirt you and your friends purchase, we fight poverty through micro loans that help entrepreneurs around the world.

We wanted to do something special just for the INDIEGOGO Community.  So we decided to do special designs just for you.  These are Limited Edition *INDIEGOGO Only* Designs and come in the above 5 designs with a range of sizes and a variety of colors as shown below.  (Plus we made sure to include fitted shirts for women!)


**When the campaign ends, we will send you a form to fill out to specify your design, color, size, and fit**

WHAT MAKES BIZYTEES SO AMAZING?  

Besides helping promote your business and supporting Entrepreneurs around the world, we know that you will want to wear your tees every day, so we have made them to the highest spec, with the built-in longevity that you and your business deserve. So here are just some of the features of every shirt:

We need to raise just $2,000 to get started!  

This will help me to: Get the quality of shirt that I want, build our marketing, building our website, and social media pages, and promotion, so we can get on our way and start helping other entrepreneurs.


I also have some stretch goals that I would appreciate your help with:  

Stretch Goal #1 – $5,000 When we reach this goal everyone who has, or will place an order on this campaign gets Free Shipping!

Stretch Goal #2 – $10,000 Once we reach this level we can add 2 more BizyTee Design options to this campaign!

Stretch Goal #3 – $20,000 Reach this to make Hoodies and Caps available, for those days when we need a little something more!

Stretch Goal #4 – $30,000 We'll add 2 more BizyTee Design options to this campaign!

Stretch Goal #5 – $40,000 This one is HUGE! We will Double all our Contributions for every shirt!

Stretch Goal #6 – $50,000 A very special thank you!! Everyone Gets 2 Shirts For The Price of One. For every shirt you purchased, you’ll get a second shirt for free. We’ll also make a video showing the stories of some of the lives, families, and communities that have been changed through your participation, as a thank you gift to you.
