**When the campaign ends, we will send you a form to fill out to specify your design, color, size, and fit**


WHAT MAKES BIZYTEES SO AMAZING?  
Besides helping promote your business and supporting Entrepreneurs around the world, we know that you will want to wear your tees every day, so we have made them to the highest spec, with the built-in longevity that you and your business deserve. So here are just some of the features of every shirt:


We need to raise just $2,000 to get started!  
This will help me to: Get the quality of shirt that I want, build our marketing, building our website, and social media pages, and promotion, so we can get on our way and start helping other entrepreneurs.


I also have some stretch goals that I would appreciate your help with:  
Stretch Goal #1 – $5,000 When we reach this goal everyone who has, or will place an order on this campaign gets Free Shipping!
Stretch Goal #2 – $10,000 Once we reach this level we can add 2 more BizyTee Design options to this campaign!
Stretch Goal #3 – $20,000 Reach this to make Hoodies and Caps available, for those days when we need a little something more!
Stretch Goal #4 – $30,000 We'll add 2 more BizyTee Design options to this campaign!
Stretch Goal #5 – $40,000 This one is HUGE! We will Double all our Contributions for every shirt!
Stretch Goal #6 – $50,000 A very special thank you!! Everyone Gets 2 Shirts For The Price of One. For every shirt you purchased, you’ll get a second shirt for free. We’ll also make a video showing the stories of some of the lives, families, and communities that have been changed through your participation, as a thank you gift to you.




Risks and challenges

As with any project there always comes some risk and unforeseen events. BizyTee is committed to keeping all risks to a minimum.
We've been creating T-shirts and working with clients for years. So this isn't something totally new to us and we are confident in our ability to get you your perks in an efficient manner.
We're committed to keeping you updated about our progress and what's going on with us every step of the way.

FAQ

Do I have to be an entrepreneur to wear a BizyTee?
No, people of all ages and work situations love wearing them because they like the messages and the quality of the Tees, and it’s a great way to support entrepreneurs around the world.
Do I have to be a shy entrepreneur to order a BizyTee?  
No you don’t have to be a shy entrepreneur to get value from your BizyTee, but if you are, they sure do help.  
Who are BizyTees for?  
BizyTee’s are perfect for: Business Professionals, Business Owners, Aspiring Entrepreneurs, Start-ups, Anyone Who Works For Themselves, Artists, Writers, Freelancers, Sales Professionals, B2B Sales Staff and anyone who dreams of starting a business.  Or for people who just want to show their support for entrepreneurs around the world.  We’ve even had kids and teens ask for their own BizyTee.
Do you have Fitted Shirts for Women?
Yes!  We understand that many women won’t wear a T-Shirt that doesn’t fit them the way they like, so we made sure to have fitted shirts available in a nice range of colors with all of the BizyTee designs.

How Do I Pick My Design, Color, And Size?
We will send you a form to fill out at the end of the campaign to get your shirt size, color, design and style.  Our sizes are S, M, L, XL, 2XL for both cuts and 3XL or the Mens/Unisex Style shirt.
Can I buy them as a gift for someone else?
Absolutely!  They make great gifts for friends, family, and business associates.  We’ve found that kids love them as much as adults do!
Can BizyTees get me more clients?
BizyTees are designed to get attention from people who love to talk about business.  Our experience is that they are a great conversation opener but it’s up to you and your business to get new clients so your results may vary.  What we’ve done is create a high quality entrepreneur themed Tee that we believe you will enjoy wearing and will get you the right kind of attention.
Are BizyTees available in stores?
Currently they are only available via INDIEGOGO
What material is BizyTees made out of?
BizyTees are made of 100% ring-spun, pre-shrunk cotton which is super strong, soft, and light-weight.  Heather colors contain 10% polyester.
Where do you ship to?
We ship internationally.  Shipping to the US is just $5 a shirt.  Shipping to Canada is $8 and international shipping is $10 a shirt.  Get discounts on shipping by ordering all 5 or 100 shirts or help us reach our 1st stretch goal and shipping is free.
What is micro-lending exactly?
Micro-lending is the lending of very small amounts of money at low to no interest, especially to a start-up company or self-employed person.
Many people in smaller communities who want to start or grow their business, don’t always have access to the small amounts of capital.  These Micro-loans give them access to the capital they need.
How much do you contribute to micro-lending for each shirt?
For every BizyTee T-Shirt you and your friends purchase,  we contribute a dollar to help entrepreneurs around the world fight poverty through micro lending.
These micro-loans range from $25-$500 dollars and make a huge impact in the lives of the entrepreneur, their children and their community.
Is BizyTee a Charity?
No, BizyTees is a for-profit company with a core goal to support entrepreneurs around the globe through our products and micro-lending.  Our core goal helps us support entrepreneurs around the world without having to do any fundraising.
Why Crowdfunding?
The INDIEGOGO community is made up of entrepreneurs and business minded individuals with a desire to solve problems, meet the needs of their customers and develop amazing brands, and that’s why we are here. 
I believe that by providing all of you with a great working solution in the form of a high quality durable Tee that speaks volumes and works as hard as you do, you will reward us with your support.

story:
We are a team of two people and the idea of sewing our own wallets came to be when we were looking for a stylish, high-quality, leather mini wallet on the market. We couldn't find the right one. So we decided we will make one ourselves. Process of designing and developing resulting in the final product was so much fun, that we thought we have to share it with others. At that time an IT guy got together with an architect and BLACK CHILLI was founded.

After several months of development and testing we can finally present to you our beautiful product Walletka MINI and Walletka CLASSIC!

Unfortunately only having a product although it is beautiful and high-quality, simply isn't enough. We need a bit of a push and that's the reason why we decided for a campaign here on Indiegogo. Your support means that it is worthwhile to carry on doing our work.

To kickstart our project we need at least 2000 USD. The money will be used mostly for purchases of the leather and the work equipment. Our great goal is to have our own laser plotter, so we can be fully independent.

Unfortunately such a laser plotter costs around 40 000 USD. Gathering this much money is probably out of question for this campaign, but over time we want to earn enough money to buy this machine. 

What are you going to get for your support?

Walletka MINI

- capacity for 5 cards + cash

- hand-waxed thread

- laser cut (perfect cut accuracy)

- hand-stitched

- high-quality Italian leather

- engraved initials, nickname or name on the front side (up to 15 characters)

- your personal choice of the thread color

- 3 color options of the leather (space gray, cognac brown and midnight blue)


Do you need more space for credit cards? Then your perfect choice is Walletka classic.

Walletka CLASSIC 

- capacity for 10 cards + cash

- hand-waxed thread

- laser cut (perfect cut accuracy)

- hand-stitched

- high-quality Italian leather

- engraved initials, nickname or name on the front side (up to 25 characters)

- your personal choice of the thread color

- 3 color options of the leather (cognac brown, midnight blue and space gray)

Thanks to the mini design and look both wallets don't take a lot of space and they can still hold the important things. The leather has a matt structure that over time gets original patina. So there aren't 2 identical wallets. Every wallet is unique.

MORE PERSONALIZED

EXTRA ADDITION. Engraved text inside your wallet (MINI max 40 characters, CLASSIC max 60 characters).


Our Goal

April - campaign

May/June - purchase of the leather and production

End of June - shipping to backers

One of the possible hick-ups could be when ordering the leather. Shipping from Italy takes 2-3 weeks. Since we don't know how successful this campaign will be, we can't afford to order a large quantity of leather in advance.

We will order it all after the campaign finishes. Everything is planed so that there shouldn't be any delays. But because nobody is perfect, technical difficulties could happen to the supplier. That's the only possible hick-up.

We will be grateful for support of any kind, whether in a form of actual purchase of our Walletka or just by sharing or recommending to your friends.

Your Black Chilli Team! #BlackChilliOut

story:
Aki - The Best Minimalist Bi-fold Wallet.

Design

RFID Shielded - Protect your cards from unauthorised scanners that could steal credit card information.

Aki in Black Full Grain Leather

Aki in Blue Full Grain Leather

Aki in Brown Full Grain Leather

First of its kind Ninja-slot (Non RIFD Shielded) - Concealed quick-access card draw ensuring no unwanted attention hones in on your wallet.

Elastic Band for cash - Any currency and size fits snugly under the band.

Elastic card compartment with pull tab - Great capacity for cards (up to 8 cards) you don't use often but must carry around like your ID, membership cards etc. Access these cards easily with the pull tab.

Quick access card slot (interior) - Organic curve for easy card access and placement.

Hidden Sim card slot - There when you need it, never an eye-sore.

Coin Slot - Ergonomically improved Anti-coin-spill compartment for easier access to your coins

The Pen - Never again will you be caught without one in a crucial situation.

Closed Dimensions

Open Dimensions

Size comparison with a usual bifold wallet when empty.

Size comparison with a usual bifold wallet when filled with 5 bills, 7 cards and 10 coins.

Available Styles & Colours

Crazy Horse Leather & Full Grain Leather in (Black, Brown, Blue)

Aki Wallet in Crazy Horse Leather

Aki Wallet in Full Grain Leather (Black)

Aki Wallet in Full Grain Leather (Blue)

Aki Wallet in Full Grain Leather (Brown)


Share our Campaign!

https://www.facebook.com/kisetsucollections/
https://instagram.com/kisetsucollections/

Want to carry the Aki Wallet in your shop? For wholesale enquiries, contact info@kisetsucollections.com

 

Want to see the rest of our wallet designs? Visit our website at www.kisetsucollections.com

Thank you for you support!

Risks and challenges

Meeting deadlines - This is our third Crowdfunding project and we have experienced the logistics process on the first and a really challenging one on the second (we had 17 colours options, RFID options and stitching options. That's 68 permutations!). With proper planning, we were able to deliver the Haru Wallet (first Crowdfunding project) to backers 2 weeks ahead of planned schedule, Natsu Wallet at 3 weeks ahead!

Uncontrollable risks/delays - Should there be any delays, it would be in the stages of manufacturing and QC; We need to make sure that the wallets meet the standards before delivering them to you!

Team Kisetsu strives to attain the highest level of customer satisfaction through on time delivery, as well as bringing quality products to you. We will make sure that our team puts in 101% to do as much as we can while taking the necessary measures to avoid any delay on the delivery of Aki to our backers!

story:
THE FASHION-TECH REVOLUTION FOR URBAN RIDERS

 

 

JONGLEUR 5.0​

 

Design to improve eco-mobility… A perfect combination of Fashion and Technology to provide the best outerwear for riders, skaters, wheelers… but also for party animals ! 

Select your technical features in the rewards…This design contains multiple technical features, all developed to improve your confort, your safety and your style in your day to day life. You can custom your style – ONLY HERE, ON INDIEGOGO !!

 

BANANA JACKET - 85 €

 

Banana's Jacket has been designed for your rides in the Urban Jungle. It's fluorescent and reflective to color your day and light your night !
For now we only get party animals backers, essential for your festivals ;)

 

THE NATURIST - 90€

The all-over pattern is fluorescent green and represent leaves... it's a reflective taste of nature following the theme of the Urban Jungle announced above with the Banana jacket.
-> 100% reflective + fluorescent printing
-> Waterproof 
-> Windbreaker

 

SELF-EXPRESSION

COLLAB : Rafael Sliks X Urban Circus

In this design you'll get the street-expression in a streewear jacket to complete street-art movement with fashion expression. Safety vest was the symbole of wearable road safety, only worn in the street, it was also synonyme of constraint. Now it represents the self-expression in movable art.

 

THE RINGMASTER  

 

 

JONGLEUR 5.0 - AVAILABLE TECHNICAL FEATURES   

Colors: Fluorescent yellow or green or red // Navy-blue or Black
Size: S – M – L – XL (size chart in FAQ) 
No reversible – color/size --------------------------------------------------------------------- 109 €
Reversible – color/size -------------------------------------------------------------------------- 129 €
No reversible - color/size + LED turning signal + GPS pocket ------------------------ 149 €
Reversible – color/size + LED turning signal + GPS pocket --------------------------- 159 €
No reversible - color/size + LED turning signal + GPS pocket + ARMORS -------- 195 €

 

FABRIC TECHNOLOGY + PRINTING

BEST HIGH VISIBILITY PERFORMANCE​

HAVE A LOOK, WE PROVE IT ;)​

 

URBAN CIRCUS, a remarkable brand !

The 2 Parisian entrepreneurs, gathered under the name of Urban Circus. Both from an engineer and fashion design background, they complete each other to combine fashion and technology, in order to offer a fashion-tech alternative to high visibility. Slick design, stylish fit, multiple features… with them, the yellow safety vest is not ugly and just yellow anymore. It becomes collector’s outerwear whose inspiration comes straight from the streets and its art, making security sexy.

After 1 year of R&D and user feedback Urban circus wants to reach the international rider’s market and launch pre-sales of its new collection.  This collection’s moodboard is an anthem to the street and its art, with exceptional collaborations such as : Rafael Sliks, Moyoshi, Kosla ...) and will present advanced technical features:

We are not simply a brand... Behind Urban Circus there is a community passionate and unified who wants to turn safety more sexy and more efficient. 
we had to wait until UC, to finally see people enjoying wearing flashy and sexy safety jackets ;)

 

 

 

A BIG THANK YOU

Thanks to all those who have encouraged and supported us to make this incredible brand reality ! Wearable technologie affordable and useful for the day to day life...

VIDEO:

Association Jean-Luc François - incubateur Pantin/Paris

Volt-corp who sponsored the film production

Frank Remy - Roller traveling 

Longboard - Marc Depaul  

Biker - Emmanuelle Jacques  

Tricking - Michel Nguyen & Kevin Cetout  

Freerun - Guillaume Nanashi Montigny  

Fire breathing - Quarante Quatre & Théo Azoulay

 

ABOUT THE SIZE CHART ?

ABOUT THE DELIVERY DATE ?

It's written under each reward ;)

Jackets will be delivered to you in Feubruary 2017.

 Are the jackets washable? 

=> Yes even though it’s not that frequently needed (water/dirt repellent fabrics), just make sure you remove the eventual LED battery before. 

What happens if the jacket doesn’t fit me?
=> exchange it for another size/product  
=> no problem we’ll send it gift-packed 

Can this jacket  replace my bike lights ? 
=> NO. The idea is to make yourself safer as possible. Our jackets are serious designed safety certified

Discounts if I order a large quantity? 
=> of course! Shoot us a message and we’ll discut details

ABOUT ANY OTHER INQUIRIES ? Feel free to contact us: contact@urban-circus.fr - ask Quentin ;)

 

Risks and challenges

URBAN CIRCUS brand was created a year ago 
We have the production line, the technical and creative team to make it possible. Now We designed and prototype the best we have to know if it's a personal dream or a need we share with you or any others...

URBAN CIRCUS founders 
- Quentin Xavier, aerospace engineer has a serious background 
- Henri de Kergorlay, fashion designer has a big moustache !

URBAN CIRCUS objectives 
is to make fashion useful... combining Art & Technology.

URBAN CIRCUS main added value 
All our jackets respect EN 1150 high visibility standards. They can replace your yellow safety vest... a real challenge to design jackets that obey the law.

story:
Short Summary

Kits makes fun, functional and stylish bags and small leather goods for women, men and kids. We believe that high quality luxury products should be accessible to everyone. 

Kits is a new, affordable luxury line created and owned by W&H Gidden, a 200 year old  British heritage leather goods brand. The Kits line was inspired by the relaxed and elegant lifestyle found in Vancouver, British Columbia. (Learn more about W&H Gidden at whgidden.com)

Kits will be sold exclusively on Amazon. The combination of Gidden’s extensive  experience in the design and manufacturing of the highest quality leather goods along with the distribution of Amazon makes for a powerful rollout of the Kits product line.

 

What We Need & What You Get

We already have our plan in action to launch on Amazon.  We have all the channels for production, merchandising, marketing and logistics covered to go live in June, or hopefully sooner.

We are on IndieGOGO because we believe in building our brand where the customer comes first, and we are willing to practically give these products to you so that you can tell us what you think. And you get to look awesome wearing them.

 

Risks & Challenges

A major risk factor will be “quality control”. We have a deep history in making the finest luxury leather goods and bespoke products, but scaling up to offer a lower price, higher volume KITS line will be challenging. We feel we have prepared appropriately for this scale up but things can happen. 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

We get it, maybe it's not your thing. BUT we know you know people who love bags! Please share with anyone who loves a crazy deal!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
Short Summary

Hello, my Brothers & Sisters,
My name is Golden Skyy, a local Native American Fashion Designer based in San Antonio, TX. My background in Fashion Design came at an early age from watching my parents create lovely clothing. I also have my Bachelor's Degree in Fine Arts from The Art Insitute of San Antonio, TX. Our brand stands in the name of Love, Positive Growth, Unity, Joy & Abundance for all walks of life in this world. 
After submitting my application to Vancouver, BC Fashion Week, We received an email of acceptance.  I knew, in my heart, I was given an opportunity of a lifetime to showcase as a designer my true talent and passion. I am also an educator and believe in giving back to the future generation Fashion Designers of Tomorrow. We lead by example and fallow our hearts in hopes this campaign can make dreams come true. After my stepfather passed away from stage four cancer, I have embarked on a mission to carry my parents legacy! 
Each contribution will put me one step closer to have the ability to take my brand internationally finally! This will be the first time after receiving awards, merits, recognitions, national competitions & achievements that we finally have the opportunity to showcase in one of the worlds most talked about Fashion Weeks! Globals Designers, Global Media, Global Marketing, Global Magazines, Global Buyers, A-List Celebrities, and so much more! 

What We Need & What You Get

Our Campaign goal is $8,000.

The Perks: The Golden Skyy brand stands in the name of LOVE WINS for all walks of life on this planet! We have curated some unique items and limited edition merchandise that will be offered to our supporters. 

  All funds will be used for the entry of Vancouver, BC Fashion Week. 

The Impact

The Value of this campaign is worth more than words can say. I walk in the light of Positive Energy and always remember my roots and where I came from. Growing up, we didn't have much, but we had each other, a home, food on the table & LOVE. I am the only child and was adopted by my grandparents. I am the ONLY one sibling in the entire family that has completed college and did something with there life. I want to make my parents proud and for them to know they raised a successful son.

A Golden Success of Achievements: 2018 Uniform 300 Tricentennial- representing citizens of San Antonio/ 2017 WomansWeardesigner of the Year- San Antonio Fashion Awards/ 2017 Best Graduating Collection- The Art Institute of San Antonio/ 2017 Hashtag American Magazine- Fashion Article by Mia Isabella/2017 The Salon Professional Acadamey- Guest Judge/ 2016 Offical Nominee Fashion Artist of The Year- San Antonio Fashion Awards/ 2011 Humane Society of the United States Cool Vs Cruel Competition/ 2011 Pittsburgh Post-Gazette- Fashion News Article & so much more! 

I took a risk in my career, knowing that only a select few would make it like a professional designer. I knew in my heart that I have a gift, and each day that I work towards my goals, I have noticed that my passion for creating clothes is just the surface. I follow closely in my parent's footsteps to ensure the quality and craftsmanship of my work can meet the masses! I have used my success to inspire like-minded individuals who wish to pursue a career in Fashion Design. I am also an educator and public figure in my community and promote LOVE, ABUNDANCE, PEACE, UNITY & JOY to all walks of life. I firmly believe my gift is to spread, LOVE around the world with my GIFT.

Risks & Challenges

One thing in life is that we are all here for one another, and we only get one shot. Each year that has passed, in my career, I have grown to embrace the thrill of change, and I put my best foot forward and lead by POSITIVE example, love, passion & integrity. We are grateful for any contribution that anyone can give during this time. I have been designing for over 20 years, and feel that the time has come for me to take the stage and show the world what the Golden Skyy Brand has to offer.

Love has no Gender, Love has no Race, Love has no Religion, Love has no Boarders, We won't live forever, but our actions will last for eternity!

LOVE WINS

Other Ways You Can Help

We kindly ask all of our Family, Friends, and Fans to please share to the world on all social media platforms as much as they can. 

This is an exciting time for all of us here at Golden Skyy Atelier and we are looking forward to a successful campaign. We thank each and every one of you for taking the time to make your contributions and taking the time to share our cause with the world!

Also, Indiegogo Share tools make it easy to share with your Family, Friends, Fans & Loved ones!

LOVE WINS

story:
When inspiration was ignited passion among life will be full of shiny moment, each of your thoughts and actions today will become tomorrow's story, intelligent ring wake you create more passion, bid farewell to the simple life, let your every day more enjoyable full of surprises.

born for love

Timer ring is a Tiny Wearable Device that you can wear on the Middle or index finger of your hand as a ring and it will make your whole Palm

How Timer ring Makes Your Life Easier!

program lock

user can select a program to be locked from the menu of "program lock".

After the program is locked,user should contact the mobile phone with smart ring to run program.

Automatic running

User can select one or multiple programs in the edition menu of "automatic running" and design operation scripts user can operate it in corresponding smart ring

Business card

user can edit the content of business card and write in the content when the ring enters the NFC range of other mobile phones,the card will automatically import

the first NFC device in the world which can share IMAGE and TEXT card information,is compatible with android and Windows Phone mobile phones


Link sharing

User can edit URL links and import to smart ring,or by explorer sharing function afterwards,wherever user contacts the mobile phones with NFC function,the mobile phones will automatically pop out the content of shared pages

Whisper

The product is the first device in the world which can add 6 images and 2000 characters to a piece of NFC codeword

enables "delete after reading"function,and is compatible with all android and windows phone  phones

Start hide

User can set hiding any application in the mobile phone and run a hidden application by smart ring,or click "run"in this page (this function requires the ROOT authority of mobile phone)

Network disk sharing

User can click the sharing function of network disk,select and write in the smart ring,and then touch the mobile phone of others any or multiple NFC phones will automatically pop out it

The key of intelligent door

User can set smart ring as the key to door according to the matching process of intelligent door lock it supports most intelligent door locks of 13.56MHZ in the market,for example,samsung series


Screen unlock

User can set Smart ring as the way to unlock the screen of mobile phone, no matter the mobile phone already has other unlocking ways, such as gesture code or password. (this function is only available in the mobile phones whose android ROM is not highly customized)

This is how configurable Timer ring is!

For any venture to the risks and challenges. With this in SmartRing, came to one of the toughest challenges yet: to create a ring of small enough to be stylish and durable, but also full of innovative features. We strive to create the best for our customers, it also means that we need the best material to make this ring. The product must be light enough to wear, yet stylish enough to be able to hide it like high technology. After several failed attempts, a lot of our final test, we are finally able to create one of the most innovative product yet

Supply Chain and Logistics

We have access to large quantities of material suppliers, which will help ensure that we are able to quickly increase production. Yet all experience some consumer electronics items from the letters change when the risk to the finished production units. We believe that we have to build and test prototypes and by the reliability and capability, high capacity to reduce this risk of Smart Ring Timer

Long-term relationship in all parts of our trusted suppliers of Smart Ring of the Timer. For security reasons, we will also get an additional backup vendors of key parts, so we do not rely on only one supplier

Risks and challenges

What are the risks and challenges?

In response to customer demand we are going to improve our product line and ongoing product updates functions, in order to achieve our desired results, only better, more practical and more convenient products will be worthy of your own, we strive to user experience, be able to put the product to do better, more powerful!

story:
With over 5 years of research and development plus decades in the textile industry, our company is capable of stretching fabrics to their limits. By pushing the boundaries of these fabrics and what socks could do, we've paved the way for the future of athletics while safeguarding the health of your joints, knees, and feet.  

Sizing:

 

Spring and Flex For What's Next 

 

 

REXY socks not only look good and feel great, but they also keep you stable during high-intensity activities.  Our patent-pending arch-pad design is built to arch your foot ergonomically, amplifying the resistance your body naturally provides with every impact. This pad provides superior shock absorption, ensuring every step feels secure. From your most rigorous workouts to slow and methodical stretching, REXY socks will keep your feet healthy, moving, and invigorated. 

 

Layers of technology built-in:

 

4 way non-slip system:

We know how annoying it can be when your feet slip during exercise. With our patent-pending non-slip technology, we have designed our socks to work and feel like a second skin, in addition to providing the ability to help you stabilize every step, leap, and landing.

 

For all kinds of feet

Compression, compression, compression

Be health-conscious at every stage in life. Regardless of age, our compression socks increase healthy blood circulation throughout your body, preventing unnecessary stress near your feet. Experience less fatigue, speed up recovery and reduce soreness by using our compression technology.

 

Ankle cushion revolution

 

 

Aqua-X will help whisk away moisture!

Aqua-X, a multi-functional yarn is designed to whisk away perspiration. No matter what you're doing, you know your feet will stay dry, clean, and comfortable.

Sweat whisking test

 Absorbs sweat and uses the natural movement of your foot to dry quickly. 

Results

After ~3 minutes,

 

Bright White

Cool Grey

Back in Black

 

Manufacturing

Our team has traveled all across Asia, scouring the earth for the highest quality fabrics.  These numerous adventures helped establish a strong relationship with Sunghwa Co. in South Korea which produces more than  80 million pairs of socks per year. We've lowered your risk of investing in our products tremendously by working with such a prestigious partner. Shop with confidence knowing we'll do everything possible to fulfill every order, from our factory to your doorstep, with no hassle for you. 

 

Going Green

South Korea is an exciting place for manufacturing and design, and REXY is proud to be producing its products there. Within the last 12 years, South Korea was one of the first countries to embrace "green growth" in its nationwide strategy through business partnerships, institutions, and policy implementation. It has committed over $85 billion for clean energy, which should also bolster the local economy. REXY is proud to take part in this ecosystem of growth, and plans to participate in green initiatives with the South Korean government in the future."

 

The Team 

My brother and I grew up working in the family business. We spent countless weekends on the road or at the family office. It's hard to understand the sacrifices made in running a small business, especially at a young age, but that helped light a fire in our hearts that would one day lead us to Rexy. 

 

Risks and challenges

With years of business relationships under our belt and our existing relationships with suppliers in Asia and the Middle East - we've tuned our processes, nurtured our relationships and will do everything within our power to ensure you get a great product.

story:
Let's start with the basics

I'm Stefanie Alther, a 24 year old passionate girl based out of Lincoln, Nebraska with a heart the size of the sun for Bali, and a vision to create an impact to bring an end to baby abandonment.  

After living in Bali in 2015 and being a part of a team that started a baby drop box program, I returned to Nebraska searching for what the next step in this movement could be. I then had the vision to create an organization based in America that would be able to link the women and babies in Bali with women and babies here in the states. Thus, the creation of KNOCK ON.

KNOCK ON is an online baby boutique of products that are handmade in Bali from traditional batik fabric.

These products serve a larger purpose. The proceeds from each purchase will go to support the care of babies who have been given another chance on life through the baby drop box program. These products also will give women the opportunity to join our KNOCK ON workshop where they will learn to be a seamstress and begin making KNOCK ON products.

KNOCK ON baby products are a symbol of support, awareness, and empowerment.

This campaign is an invitation to help us with the funds necessary to start the first products line and open the workshop.

What We Need & What You Get

We want this to be the full force launch & we feel that we have the support to make it happen.

So we need your help to raise $20,000.

Here is the breakdown of the funds:

Product line: $5,000

Workshop:Hard Costs (workshop hub, sewing machines, furniture, etc): $7,000

Operational Costs (trainings, salaries, utilities): $8,000

But this is the coolest part. We want to give you a gift for your donation. We call them perks. It's what we want to give to you as a thank you & help link you to a deeper love for KNOCK ON.

((Check them out on the right))

Take a deeper glimpse

This is Yulia, a mountain moving woman whom I partnered with to start the baby drop box program and the safe house. Take a moment to get a deeper glimpse of Bali.

 

Closing Notes

We will not able to do this without your help. Your support can be massive donations, small donations, sharing this campaign with all of your friends and family, posting the link on allll your social media. Each of these things makes a tremendous impact. This is how the movement to bring an end to baby abandonment will happen.

Check out our website to learn even more!

www.Knockon.org

Thank you,

From KNOCK ON

story:
We have changed the design of the FOCX Everyday Wallet.

Please check the details here: 

https://www.focx-wallet.com/produkt/everyday-bl...

Introducing FOCX™

The materials we use, our love for both detail and shape as well as the clever way we have implemented our ideas make the FOCX Wallet your daily companion with a certain something. Thanks to its light weight and reduced size, its gorgeous feel and minimalist look, the FOCX Everyday Wallet is a champion in its league, both practical and highly comfortable for its owner at any time. The source of our inspiration to create this extraordinary wallet was the admirable and clever fox. The fox is a fast, strong and, as it were, hollywoodlike animal. Moreover, in spite of its predatory tendencies, the fox is just simply cute and sexy. By choosing the FOCX Everyday Wallet, you choose to make an outstanding appearance.

Smart, flexible and minimal.

Our aspiration is to make an outstandingly designed product which is useful, long-lasting, and provides a clever solution to your everyday needs. When creating The FOCX Everyday Wallet, we focused on a minimalist design which, at the same time, would simplify the handling of your cards. It took us many sleepless nights and tough testing to find this new design combining leather components, an elastic band and grosgrain. By launching the FOCX Everyday Wallet, we want to bring a change to the world of wallets.

All good things.

We believe in the uniqueness of each wallet. Therefore, we leave our FOCX Everyday Wallets with a natural finish, giving each piece its own unique look. FOCX Wallets are made from natural cattle hide leather, a wax finish and the toughest and most flexible elastic band available. As a special modern technology feature, we have installed an NFS Tag 215 with more than 500 bytes so that, along with your cards and cash, you can even carry your data with you. The FOCX New Wallet is slim and stylish and yet long-lasting. Why not replace your unwieldy old wallet with a FOCX Everyday Wallet and show off with it?!  

All the materials used – elastic band, grosgrain and high-quality yarn – have undergone tough testing. At times, several dozens of bands an yarns from both German and international manufacturers crowded our workshop. Price did not matter, since we were determined to use only highest-quality materials for our FOCX Everyday Wallets. And we managed!

 
 

 

Setting a new trend.

NFC Technology offers a great deal of interesting possibilities and we believe that this technology will expand over all kinds of areas in the near future. By using it for our FOCX Everyday Wallets, we want to directly participate in setting this trend. Applying NFC technology to wallets seems an obvious step, all the more since it allows for an ideal combination of smartphones and wallets. We always carry both of them with us, thus creating an almost unlimited number of possibilities: whether when muting the volume of your smartphone in a meeting, giving WiFi access to your friends or transferring your contact data to your customers, colleagues or flirts – everything is possible and easy as 1, 2, 3 by simply touching your wallet.

FOCX™ is shielded.

It goes without saying that we have made sure to consider your safety, too. The FOCX blocking card is a state-of-the-art feature, making your bank card data and other confidential digital information a hundred percent safe with the FOCX Wallet. However, in order for you to be able to continue using your card for near-field communication as previously, only the front of your FOCX Wallet is shielded. By inserting your card into the reverse compartment, you can go on opening doors, making payments or doing whatever you like with it. By using the wallet, you decide on how you use your data.

It took us many sleepless nights and tough testing to find this new design combining leather components, an elastic band and grosgrain. By launching the FOCX Everyday Wallet, we want to bring a change to the world of wallets.All good things.We believe in the uniqueness of each wallet. Therefore, we leave our FOCX Everyday Wallets with a natural finish, giving each piece its own unique look. FOCX Wallets are made from natural cattle hide leather, a wax finish and the toughest and most flexible elastic band available. As a special modern technology feature, we have installed an NFS Tag 215 with more than 500 bytes so that, along with your cards and cash, you can even carry your data with you. The FOCX New Wallet is slim and stylish and yet long-lasting. Why not replace your unwieldy old wallet with a FOCX Everyday Wallet and show off with it?!  All the materials used – elastic band, grosgrain and high-quality yarn – have undergone tough testing. At times, several dozens of bands an yarns from both German and international manufacturers crowded our workshop. Price did not matter, since we were determined to use only highest-quality materials for our FOCX Everyday Wallets. And we managed!   Setting a new trend.NFC Technology offers a great deal of interesting possibilities and we believe that this technology will expand over all kinds of areas in the near future. By using it for our FOCX Everyday Wallets, we want to directly participate in setting this trend. Applying NFC technology to wallets seems an obvious step, all the more since it allows for an ideal combination of smartphones and wallets. We always carry both of them with us, thus creating an almost unlimited number of possibilities: whether when muting the volume of your smartphone in a meeting, giving WiFi access to your friends or transferring your contact data to your customers, colleagues or flirts – everything is possible and easy as 1, 2, 3 by simply touching your wallet.FOCX™ is shielded.It goes without saying that we have made sure to consider your safety, too. The FOCX blocking card is a state-of-the-art feature, making your bank card data and other confidential digital information a hundred percent safe with the FOCX Wallet. However, in order for you to be able to continue using your card for near-field communication as previously, only the front of your FOCX Wallet is shielded. By inserting your card into the reverse compartment, you can go on opening doors, making payments or doing whatever you like with it. By using the wallet, you decide on how you use your data.

story:
Short Summary

        Imagine getting yourself to work daily by walking, but with the aid of electricity! This project is aimed at creating a pair of motorized shoes which balance using the power of a gyroscope!

        Our project, codename Blue Lodha, is a pair of motorized shoes, to improve the range and speed of the average person who walks. According to the Pedestrian and Bicycle Information Center (2009), 2.90%, or roughly 3,966,000 Americans walked to work everyday. According to the National Center for Biological Information (2011), the typical pedestrian walked an average between 0.5 and 0.7 miles one way to work. Our project, if successful, will help make walking more feasible and increase the average distance traveled per trip.

        Our project will include the build of two motorized frames which can hold a person. As the testing takes place, we will decide the most optimal location for the gyroscope, whether they should go on the frame or they should be strapped onto the user. The control system will consist of an Arduino to aid in rapid prototyping and will serve as the hub between the user and the shoes.

        If you would like to understand more about the project or see any more detailed information, all of our documentation is available online.

  • Project Proposal
  • All Other Documents

What We Need & What You Get

        A project such as this requires funding. There's a limit to what our school is capable of providing. This is the reason why we came to IndieGoGo. We are hoping to raise enough money to enable us to complete the build of our prototype. The funds will go towards the build of the prototype as well as the test procedures, which includes the tools required that aren't available to us at our school. Any extra money will be donated to the CREST Program, Paradise Valley High School.
        A picture of our budget can be found below, or here.

         We will mention your name and the amount you donated if you donate $10 or more. We will be mailing dog tags as perks for those who donate $25 or more. The dog tags will be laser engraved by us and mailed to you. If 130 people donate $5, we will be past our goal!

Our School

Casey and Devyash attend Paradise Valley High School and are part of the CREST (Center of Research in Engineering, Science and Technology). Below is an introduction to our program.
http://www.pvschools.net/crest

The Impact

        The impact on our project from the funds received will be colossal. The funds will allow us to get hands on experience on power tools.
Other Ways You Can Help

        If you are unable to donate, please help us spread the word. Spreading the word is beneficial to our success because while you may not be able to donate, someone else may be. Please share a link to this project with your friends through the power of social media.

The Team:

Casey:

        I am currently a junior attending Paradise Valley High School, located in Phoenix, Arizona. I am a part of the CREST Program, Center of Research in Science and Technology in the Engineering branch along with Devyash. I am a track and cross country runner but I also enjoy playing basketball in my free time. I have always had an interest in building and destroying things (for educational purposes of course). I am currently in a STEM (Science Technology Engineering and Math) class in which I am working together with my partner towards a scientific inquiry. Our project will involve testing regular shoes and other wheeled devices against our creation.

Devyash:

        I am a junior attending Paradise Valley High School, Phoenix, Arizona. I am a part of the CREST Program, Center of Research in Science and Technology in the Engineering branch along with Casey. I enjoy building and destroying electronics and robotics. I have a passion in Robotics, which led my into FIRST Robotics, in which this is my third year enrolled. I also enjoy programming, using languages such as C/C++, PHP, Web and Java, writing applications which do all sorts of random, small tasks. I also enjoy playing Tennis. I have my own website, http://devyashis.me. I am currently in the CREST course, STEM (Science Technology, Engineering and Math) Collaborative course, which Casey. In this class, I am working with Casey Blue to create an apparatus to improve transportation upon foot. Our project will have it's final conclusions based off benchmarks upon regular shoes as well as other wheeled alternatives.

story:
Did you ever compromise on Fashion for Functionality when selecting your watch?  

We at MUSE believe that Technology can be made Fashionable and choosing your style should be a memorable experience to you than an unwilling trade-off of style for functionality. 

Our in-house designed hybrid watches merge the functionality of a smartwatch and the elegance of a traditional watch, aptly complementing the Fashionista in you. 

You can now Stay fit, Stay relevant and Stay connected with Muse Hybrid smartwatches. 

 

 

With Muse Hybrid smartwatches, you can enjoy -

 

 

 

AS SEEN ON

 

DESIGN

Over the past year, we have designed and perfected every smart feature in the watch for you to enjoy a seamless experience. 

A tiny inner dial houses some of the most sophisticated technology. Muse comes with a Patent-pending, first-of-a-kind smartwatch movement with the highest quality Swiss motors from leading smart module producer from Switzerland - Soprod.

Now you can enjoy a plethora of features without charging the watch for ONE full year!

 

Automatic Activity Recognition

Fitness should have no bounds. Dress up the fitness freak in you and stay fit anytime, anywhere by tracking your activities on the go and watch the activity meter display your goal percentage achieved for the day.  

Cadence | Calories | Strokes | Average Speed

 

UV Alerts

Protect yourself from harmful UV rays and prevent skin aging with our in-built UV alert notifications. 

 

MusePay  

No Phone, No Wallet!

Enjoy hassle-free cashless transactions with a tap of your hand at any one of the 38 Million contactless Mastercard POS terminals across the world with Musepay. 

MusePay is completely safe and uses the same technology as your Debit/Credit cards. 

*Accepted at London Underground

 

Access control

Access your office or home tasks using your watch by programming it to act as your access card. It's that simple!

 

Sleep Tracking  

With ever-growing stress levels, a good night's sleep sometimes is all it takes to ensure sound mental health.

 Get updates and suggestions on your sleep quality after a night’s sleep. 

 

Automatic Timezone update

Watch the Muse Hybrid Smartwatch update its time automatically when you reach a different timezone. 

 

Your Watch. Your Presets. 

Customize the buttons the way you want. Find your phone, snooze alarms, control your music, take as many selfies as you desire, and many more. Just the way you want.  

 

MUSE AI

With a beautiful and easy to use chat interface, Muse AI includes a core collection of personal assistants for your everyday activities like fitness, food, finance, reminders and more.

Intelligent suggestions and personal coach appear just when you need them. You can now focus on important things and leave the rest to your personal assistants.

 

 

 

MUSE IS FOR EVERYONE

 

Each feature in Muse Hybrid Smartwatch is chosen and developed based on our research into the requirements of everyone.   

 

LIMITED EDITION

Muse Hybrid Smartwatches are the most beautiful smartwatches. They come in a limited edition of 2182 pieces of each design. Thereby you have ample choices to make and can be only one in 2182 people in the world to own a specific design.

Muse Grandeur Collection

All Muse Grandeur Watches come with a leather strap. Straps are interchangeable, so you can get other Leather or Milanese straps as add-ons later when we send you our survey link.

 

 

Muse Minimo Collection

All Muse Minimo Watches come with leather straps. You can get other leather and milanese straps of your choice as add-ons later when we send you our survey link.

For more designs, check out our Website and Instapage. 

 

Within 2 weeks of pledging, we will send out a survey to be filled by you. You will be able to pick your choice among these 17 designs in the survey. 

NOTE: Your Indeigogo rewards are EU friendly. Backers from Europe do not have to pay any extra VAT. It is all covered by us.

Shipping to India is free

After the campaign, we will send out a survey. You can then choose your watch design from the respective collection and also add more straps of your choice

 

GALLERY

 

HOW IT WORKS

Smart Controls

Unlock smart controls on the Muse Hybrid Smartwatch with the following gestures-

  1. Single button press
  2. Double button press
  3. Long press of the button
  4. Double tapping on the watch

 

 

Smart Notifications on Notification Window

Call | Find Phone | Forgot phone | Fitness | Food | Reminder(Event) | SOS | UV Sensor 

 

Activity goals/UV Measurement on sub-dial

 

 

Quick Release Strap

 

 

 

WARRANTY

Every Muse Hybrid Smartwatch comes with a two-year international warranty and a Certificate of Authenticity.  

Your Muse Hybrid Smartwatch is warranted for 2 years from the date of purchase against all manufacturing defects. For warranty repair, defected watch must be registered within 30 days by contacting us. In the e-mail, you need to specify your name, order number and a detailed description of the issue. We will then issue a warranty label which you can attach to your postage and send it to us. We will bear all the shipping costs for the postage ONLY for manufacturing defect claims . We then repair the watch and send it back to you. If the damage is permanent, we will replace it with a new watch. Our customer support team will always keep track of your package and inform you about the progress in a timely manner. Typically once we receive the defected piece, we will process your warranty claim within 7 business days. All Manufacturing defects are covered in the warranty.

 

TECH SPECS

 

 

HOW IS MUSE DIFFERENT

 

 

 

PRODUCTION STATUS

We are shipping. Take a look at our Production Process, Quality checks, and Packaging Process. 

 
                                                        
 
For more help, feel free to reach us at support@musewearables.com. We are happy to assist you!
 

ABOUT US

We are a diverse set of young experts who are passionate about technology as well as art. We are friends first and colleagues later. Together, we created Muse Hybrid Smartwatch with a small and efficient team.

Team behind Muse

Featured in

 

PRESS KIT

 Access to photos and videos in high resolution for media publications.

story:
Guy wearing the smart glass? Smart guy wearing the glass!

What Exactly Is MAD Gaze?

MAD Gaze, an AR smart eyewear brand originated in Hong Kong that runs on Android mobile operating system, is leading the trend by her innovative and cutting-edge technology. It has ALL the functions- and MORE- of a smart phone.This state-of-the-art, exclusive wearable tech makes you feel in control of all your surroundings.

MAD Gaze Ares is more than just an Android phone!  

Using Augmented Reality technology (AR), the information about the surrounding real world of the user becomes interactive and digital. It is operated by cursor control and voice control with high recognition by optical tracking and voice sensors embedded. Leaving your hands free to handle the millions of other things you have to do. Ares gives you a reason to keep your head up.  

MAD Gaze Ares can ease and amplify everyday life. We would love to see this affordable luxury electronics delight users and be broadly available among all nations. Now, let’s experience the brand new tech-ruled and premium living standard with MAD Gaze Ares.

What Does MAD Gaze Ares Do?

Our product is truly AMAZING! With similar capabilities and functionalities of a smartphone, MAD Gaze Ares has different hardware specifications, controls, interface, and features to meet the needs of user experience. The following functions are what truly believe make it pop. In reality, though, the potential with MAD Gaze is infinite.

  • Instant Translation - Ever walk around a foreign country and have no idea what is going on? MAD Gaze is going to fix that for you. There is an auto-translate application that translate everything the glass see into the language of your choice. You’ll never want to travel without your MAD Gaze.
  • GPS Navigation - The GPS on MAD Gaze will ensure you never get lost. With the map and directions right in front of you, you will no longer miss a turn. A completely hands-free map creates a safer alternative than a smartphone in situations where having your hand free is quite important. Just envision having a little map in the corner of your eye directing you as you bike, drive, walk, run, kayak, anything!
  • Social - MAD Gaze allows users to make phone calls, text, send multimedia to contacts, access personal data assistant (PDA) and play any media. Seeing as this is the main reason people are on their smart phones all the time, by replacing that phone with MAD Gaze, a lot more time will be spent looking up.
  • Entertainment & Gaming - Imagine playing your favorite game not having to look down at the screen, or using AR to play games where your surrounding real world interacts with you. Suddenly, the game becomes more interactive than idle. The world is enriched. MAD Gaze takes gaming to a whole new, more exciting and entertaining level. As a player, you truly feel in game.


As our future settings will be the world of IoT and augmented reality technology application, Ares is definitely an ideal wearable to help optimizing workflows from daily routines. Ares provides you a total solution and performs specific tasks at the same time, where it allows you to free your hands for other duties and see things at first person perspective. Working multi-task has never been this easy and effective. Most importantly, it is broadly available and value-added to your daily life and business.

These are just a few examples of what MAD Gaze Ares can do. In fact, MAD Gaze Ares is more than that. It can also take photos or record videos with the camera, web browse with broadband internet, use Wi-Fi, and run third party applications. The possibilities are endless. Literally imagine anything you can do with a smart phone and now imagine doing that with your head up and your hands completely free. That’s MAD Gaze!

How Does MAD Gaze Ares Look Like?

MAD Gaze Ares will come with glasses frame for every purchaser to use. The product will be available in matte black with a cool style.

What Is Augmented Reality?

AR is a live direct or indirect view of physical, real-world environments who elements are augmented by a computer-generated sensory input such as sound, video, graphics, or GPS data. Basically, it makes your surrounding world digital and interactive. When you are using Mad Glass and look at a specific object, the device uses AR to display texts, images, audios, videos and 3D animations on the screen.

Is It Easy To Use? YES! We've Developed AR+ Cloud For YOU.

AR may sound somewhat complicated, but MAD Gaze makes it easy to incorporate into your everyday life. In fact, making your own AR application is as easy as managing Facebook.


We have created an AR application generating platform, AR+ Cloud on >>arcloud.madgaze.com which requires NO technical knowledge. You can make an AR app for anything you can think up. MAD Gaze can truly enhance all aspects of your life that you can imagine.

Where To Get The Apps For MAD Gaze?

No worries. We have thought about it and planned it and created MAD Store, an online platform specifically for MAD Gaze users to download apps from there.

Everything You Need At One Spot

There will be variety of apps on MAD Store.You can simply scan the QR codes to download app to your MAD Gaze. Of course, developers can share their good work on MAD Store at >>store.madgaze.com

Technical Details Of MAD Gaze

Hardware Specifications

What Makes MAD Gaze Better Than Its Competitors?

Well, let’s just talk about price for a second. The last smart glasses on the market was highly expensive and made it so only a very few could have access to this technology. Again, we want this product to make your life easier- not break the bank.

And what are you losing from this price drop? Absolutely nothing! In fact, you’re gaining more! Not only is MAD Gaze Ares selling at a really competitive price, it is also compatible with most of the Android apps available in the market!

Our MAD Schedule

MAD Rewards To Indiegogo Backers

Who We Are

Dragon Creative is a global leader in quality application development centered in Hong Kong. We have provided superior services for many famous enterprises. For MAD Gaze we are combing our strongest innovative teams to work on this exciting project. In 2016, we were proud to win the Hong Kong ICT Awards Best Startup Silver Awards. We are also the winner of Hong Kong ICT Awards 2015 Best Innovation Grand Award, Entrepreneurial Innovation Gold Award, and APICTA Awards Merit in Communications for the development of MAD Gaze and our solution.

Dragon Creative Enterprise Solution Limited is founded in May 2013, by Mr. Cheng Man Fai, Jordan, a.k.a. “Father of Smart Glass in Hong Kong” and “IT Rising Star”.

Jordan has foreseen the great needs and wants from the market and has been leading our expert team in developing MAD Gaze and AR+ Cloud, aim to become a world’s top 10 brand and ecosystem of smart glass.

Want To Keep Tabs On MAD Gaze?

Check out madgaze.com, our official website for updates on the development and release of MAD Gaze.

Ares provides you a total solution and performs specific tasks at the same time, where it allows you to free your hands for other duties and see things at first person perspective. Working multi-task has never been this easy and effective. Most importantly, it is broadly available and value-added to your daily life and business.
These are just a few examples of what MAD Gaze Ares can do. In fact, MAD Gaze Ares is more than that. It can also take photos or record videos with the camera, web browse with broadband internet, use Wi-Fi, and run third party applications. The possibilities are endless. Literally imagine anything you can do with a smart phone and now imagine doing that with your head up and your hands completely free. That’s MAD Gaze!How Does MAD Gaze Ares Look Like?MAD Gaze Ares will come with glasses frame for every purchaser to use. The product will be available in matte black with a cool style.
What Is Augmented Reality?AR is a live direct or indirect view of physical, real-world environments who elements are augmented by a computer-generated sensory input such as sound, video, graphics, or GPS data. Basically, it makes your surrounding world digital and interactive. When you are using Mad Glass and look at a specific object, the device uses AR to display texts, images, audios, videos and 3D animations on the screen.
Is It Easy To Use? YES! We've Developed AR+ Cloud For YOU.AR may sound somewhat complicated, but MAD Gaze makes it easy to incorporate into your everyday life. In fact, making your own AR application is as easy as managing Facebook.We have created an AR application generating platform, AR+ Cloud on >>arcloud.madgaze.com which requires NO technical knowledge. You can make an AR app for anything you can think up. MAD Gaze can truly enhance all aspects of your life that you can imagine.Where To Get The Apps For MAD Gaze?No worries. We have thought about it and planned it and created MAD Store, an online platform specifically for MAD Gaze users to download apps from there.Everything You Need At One SpotThere will be variety of apps on MAD Store.You can simply scan the QR codes to download app to your MAD Gaze. Of course, developers can share their good work on MAD Store at >>store.madgaze.com
Technical Details Of MAD GazeHardware Specifications

What Makes MAD Gaze Better Than Its Competitors?Well, let’s just talk about price for a second. The last smart glasses on the market was highly expensive and made it so only a very few could have access to this technology. Again, we want this product to make your life easier- not break the bank.And what are you losing from this price drop? Absolutely nothing! In fact, you’re gaining more! Not only is MAD Gaze Ares selling at a really competitive price, it is also compatible with most of the Android apps available in the market!Our MAD ScheduleMAD Rewards To Indiegogo Backers Who We AreDragon Creative is a global leader in quality application development centered in Hong Kong. We have provided superior services for many famous enterprises. For MAD Gaze we are combing our strongest innovative teams to work on this exciting project. In 2016, we were proud to win the Hong Kong ICT Awards Best Startup Silver Awards. We are also the winner of Hong Kong ICT Awards 2015 Best Innovation Grand Award, Entrepreneurial Innovation Gold Award, and APICTA Awards Merit in Communications for the development of MAD Gaze and our solution.
Dragon Creative Enterprise Solution Limited is founded in May 2013, by Mr. Cheng Man Fai, Jordan, a.k.a. “Father of Smart Glass in Hong Kong” and “IT Rising Star”.Jordan has foreseen the great needs and wants from the market and has been leading our expert team in developing MAD Gaze and AR+ Cloud, aim to become a world’s top 10 brand and ecosystem of smart glass.Want To Keep Tabs On MAD Gaze?Check out madgaze.com, our official website for updates on the development and release of MAD Gaze.

story:
The aviation is one of the most exciting adventures known to humankind. Always at the side of the pilots was their faithful partner, the wristwatch. Our first watch, the Schallmauer is a tribute to the chronographs of the 50s and 60s.

With its 42.5mm case made from 316L surgical stainless steel, the soft, oiled leather strap and the legendary two-counter chronograph dial, the Schallmauer watch seamlessly continues the exciting history of the aviation tradition. And also rewrites them.

 

 

 

The matted dial of the Schallmauer watch is characterized by its clear numbers and the central arrangement of its large totalizers. This ensures optimum readability. 12 ball indices stylishly complete the dial of our watch. The contrasting red date gives the dial, the face of the watch, a special character.

The straight, clear hands emphasize this striking impression and ensure perfect orientation - even at night. The Japanese NEMOTO finish guarantees enormous luminescence...

 

The surface of the case is finished by hand by selected specialists, which make the double-contoured edges on the lugs stand out.

 

 

 

 

The hand-dyed leather with its rich wax feel on the surface comes from the traditional house HORWEEN, Chicago. It is made with proven techniques and formulas that were developed almost 100 years ago and perfect ever since. It gives our watch a very charismatic look.

 
 

 

Do you also love it when you can unpack something you've been looking forward to? We do. So we decided on what we think is a very nice wooden box for our watch. It is painted black, the grain of the oak wood is still visible. When you open the click mechanism, your new watch will look at you on grey velvet. Under the back you will find the warranty card.
 


 

 

For more than twenty years we have been developing watches for customers from all over the world. Guiding and creating their new watch collections, sourcing for the ideal components for them is always an enjoyment for us. Together we support our clients with all our passion, experience, knowledge and ideas - in design, in production, in presentation in the market.

The wish for an own brand and a collection became stronger and stronger. After so many years we asked ourselves: Why not set up something of our own? And why not now?

The answer is VANDAAG. That is north german dialect and means "today". And from today we write our own time. What drives us is our passion for watches.

 

 

 

 



With a VANDAAG watch you will consciously decide for high quality and durability Made in Germany. This promise applies to our watches as well as our service.

The quality of the components used is high. We know this because we have known the suppliers for many years and carefully selected them. The components go through intensive quality control during and after production.

After the assembly by our German master watchmaker, the watches are checked once more before we send them to you. And because we are so sure of our quality, we offer a guarantee of 3 years instead of the usual 2 years.  

Delivery is guaranteed

story:
Our ReflectNow luxury athletic shirts feature inspirational words of affirmation on the front, written backwards so that they can be read in a studio mirror or in the occasional #sweatyselfie. The same word or phrase is written on the back of the garment to share the message with others around you.  Blank shirts, perfect for customizing by studio or gym, and yoga towels are available as well.  

Benefits:

  • Extremely soft to the touch
  • Made from the highest quality sustainable materials
  • Lyocell, a sustainable fabric component, is moisture-wicking, with a 50% higher moisture transfer rate than cotton. It's also durable and anti-bacterial.
  • Just as resistant to wrinkles as they are to limiting beliefs ;)

Kevala is the perfect fit for yoga, cross-training, running... or just being comfortable while looking good! 



Our apparel tops are made from scratch using the following components: 

  • Tencel (Lyocell), a biodegradable material from eucalyptus trees
  • Organic cotton
  • Just a splash of spandex

We continuously strive to be more sustainable, especially in finding natural stretch fibers produced responsibly.


Every kevala purchase will include an automatic donation of 5% to the 50 nonprofits on the 50Give Tour. We volunteered in all 50 states, Canada, D.C., and Mexico. We are revolutionizing local and interest-giving in North America. 

Eventually, every single continent will be represented.



Due to the initial costs in developing and growing Kevala and high minimum order quantities in manufacturing our apparel, we need your support. Here’s how you can support our campaign and be the first to wear Kevala this summer:

1) Select a perk on the right  to start your pre-order. 

2) On the next page, enter your shipping information and payment details. Note: if you would like to contribute more than the cost of the perk you have selected, you can change the amount here. 

3) Complete payment via Paypal or using your credit/debit card. 

4) Go happily about your day, knowing that you've just brought Kevala one huge step closer to processing our first production run and bringing our project to life.




"I had the pleasure of meeting Keith (founder of Kevala) when I dropped in on a yoga class in San Diego. After class he told me about the Kevala project and I was immediately touched by his endeavor; I just had to be involved. I started attending more Kevala Yoga Crawl classes because Keith brings such a great energy and always inspires me to help. In the short time I have known Keith I have witnessed the traits of a giving, caring, and dedicated individual."

-Aubry W.

"Having had the chance to run, do body-pump and yoga in my new racer-back ReflectNow top, I couldn't be happier. I was surprised at how nice and soft it is -- I love it now! And I love the positive feedback loop it helps create."

-Lauren M.



Q: What does Kevala mean?

A: Kevala has many translations. It means fearless love to our team.

Q: How do I get my Kevala apparel top?

A: If the campaign is successful (please spread the word!), we will contact you to confirm shipping details, shirt affirmation and style, and size. We will give you sizing details before you make your sizing choice so that it is a great fit. Blank shirts and towels will be available too.

Q: What color top can I get?

A: The apparel tops for this campaign are the heather gray variety shown in our Indiegogo pictures. Proceeds will go to development of other styles and varieties.

Q: What color towel can I get?

A: The towels for this campaign are gray like that shown in our Indiegogo pictures. Proceeds will go to development of other styles and varieties.

Q: When will I get my order?

A: We will do everything in our power to get your order to you as anticipated in the campaign perks. We will keep you posted along the way to let you know how everything is going!

Please send us any other specific questions to: gogo@positivepresent.com


Please come check us out at the:  Kevala Yoga Crawl 

Kevala Launch Party with Todo Mundo in Solana Beach @ Belly Up on June 8th. Get tickets HERE on Indiegogo - select either Perk:  $15 Kevala Launch Party or $50 Launch Party VIP ticket! Purchased tickets will be available at Will Call with valid ID. 21+ only.


We'd love to hear from you. 

If you have questions we did not answer in our FAQ or you'd like a press kit to help spread the word please contact us at:gogo@positivepresent.com


Thanks for taking the time to check out our campaign! We'd hugely appreciate you sharing it with your friends.

Love - the Kevala family

story:
In Short

Our goal is to offer all women, especially including those that leave a larger footprint, fashionable, beautiful and in-style footwear.

UPDATE II

Name Your Own Shoe Brand?

Today we are launching a competition, and the rules are simple:

Whoever brings in the most contributions by referring other people to our campaign page will win an exclusive opportunity to have a shoe or boot model, of your choice, named by you. For example the name could be "The Sarah Thompson Model". The name is completely up to you. You can design your own logo, or we can help you out.

The competition will end when the campaign ends - August 8. 2014. 

Call out to your friends, brother(s), sister(s), cousins, uncles, aunts and all of their friends and ask them to contribute. Send us the email address they used when contributing to: christine@modesty-shoes.com so that we can keep track on who is the referrer.

Happy referring!

UPDATE I

We are now in the process of setting up our online store. We are adding products that we hope to be offering after the campaign here on IndieGoGo is over, You can take a look at: www.modesty-shoes.com


 

My name is Christine and I’m here because a problem that a friend of mine conveyed for me.

My friend has a shoe size of EU45, (the equivalent to female US14/UK11), and she complained on how hard it is to find nice looking womens shoes or boots that actually looks like they are in this seasons style. In her own words:

“For once I wish I could find a decent pair of everyday shoes that didn’t come from the men’s department, or that didn’t cost €500. Sure, there are lots of stores out there that carry large sizes. But I’m 28 years old, and I would like something that would fit my age and not look like something my grandmother would use. I love shoes, and would give anything to have a wider selection. A nice pair of summer sandals, some high heels (that wasn’t only made for the bedroom), or a nice pair of flat heeled fashion boots that go over my knee.”.



So here I am, together with my husband, hoping to be able to help my friend and others like her.




What We Need & What You Get

The fashion industry has decided that women don’t generally need a larger shoe size than EU41/US11/UK7. Some have up to a size EU42/US12/UK8, but usually carry a very low stock. The fact, as we all know, is that we come in all different shapes and sizes. The clothing industry has realized this, but the footwear industry has not.

We’ve been in contact with three different factories that can make stylish and fashionable models in a size range from EU37 – 45, (US female 5 – 14/UK 3 – 10) with good quality at a reasonable price range. The downside is that the initial order has to be quite large. After that, restocking smaller quantity is no problem, but we would like to be able to give our customers, (and funders), at least 15 – 20 different models to choose from. So we're putting all our savings into this, but need funding to get the business up and running.

We will of course offer worldwide shipping.



We totally depend on YOUR support to get this going, and we want to make it worth your while. That's why we double the amount that you fund us back to you as a giftcard you can use in our store. And for the larger perks we also want to give you an extra discount you can use when the giftcard is empty. We love that you like what we're trying to do, and want you to feel rewarded for helping us!

If you fund us with a perk, you will receive a GIFT VOUCHER for that value that you may use in our shop.

Fund us with a €25 perk - get a €50 value:


Fund us with a €45 perk - get a €90 value: 


Fund us with a €75 perk - get a €150 value:


Sound too good to be true? Well...  

We can do this because:

  • None of us are quitting our daytime jobs the first year, so all profits are going back into the business. 
  • Even if we double back what we get from you, there are still a tiny amount of profit left so we can slowely expand the selection of models.
  • The first year we don't have expences for storage facillities or even an accountant. Friends and family are pulling their weight. 
  • You will be our first customers, and it is far more important for us to make you super happy and hopefully spread the word, than making a profit from day one!

Convinced?



Our Models

Most of the time we probably won’t be able to offer the exact same retail model as you would find in most mainstream shoe stores, but the models that are designed by the factories will be very similar in style. 


Winter Is Coming...

Our main focus we be on boots for the fall/winter season. We will also include some shoes intended for the Holydays.

  • Booties with low, mid and high heels
  • Knee high boots with low-, mid- and high heels
  • "Over the knee" boots - mainly with low heels.

Our video gives a good idea of what to come, (although the "over the knee" boots aren't represented there).


What Happens If Our Goal Isn't Reached?

We’ve asked to be founded €32000. That is a lot of money, and what happens if our goal isn’t reached? The answer is that the store will open, but we have to make the initial selection of models smaller.

What if we get more than we've asked for? Simple! The store will be filled with more models to choose from.





Other Ways You Can Help

Not all are able to contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help. We would really appreciate it if you help us spread the word. Share a link on Facebook or Twitter,

Thank you for looking at this project!

- Christine
